h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ ^a^P2.0001^ea^ ^a^T2.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame kareriku.tikaaya.m. atha kho sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m karerima.n.dalamaa.le sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m pubbenivaasapa.tisa.myuttaa dhammii kathaa udapaadi -- ``itipi pubbenivaaso, itipi pubbenivaaso''ti.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ assosi kho bhagavaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^V2.0002^ea^ ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena karerima.n.dalamaa.lo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi, nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaayanuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa; kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m pacchaabhatta.m ^a^P2.0002^ea^ pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m karerima.n.dalamaa.le sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ^a^T2.0002^ea^ pubbenivaasapa.tisa.myuttaa dhammii kathaa udapaadi -- `itipi pubbenivaaso itipi pubbenivaaso'ti. aya.m kho no, bhante, antaraakathaa vippakataa. atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``iccheyyaatha ^a^M2.0002^ea^ no tumhe, bhikkhave, pubbenivaasapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammi.m katha.m sotu''nti? ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo; etassa, sugata, kaalo; ya.m bhagavaa pubbenivaasapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammi.m katha.m kareyya, bhagavato sutvaa {bhagavato vacana.m sutvaa (syaa0)} bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naathasaadhuka.m manasi karotha bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``ito so, bhikkhave, ekanavutikappe ya.m {ekanavuto kappo (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. ito so, bhikkhave, ekati.mse kappe {ekati.m sakappo (sii0) ekati.m so kappo (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ya.m sikhii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. tasmi~n~neva kho, bhikkhave, ekati.mse kappe vessabhuu bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. imasmi~n~neva {imasmi.m (katthacii)} kho, bhikkhave, bhaddakappe kakusandho bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. imasmi~n~neva kho, bhikkhave, bhaddakappe ko.naagamano bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. imasmi~n~neva kho, bhikkhave, bhaddakappe kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. imasmi~n~neva kho, bhikkhave, bhaddakappe aha.m etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho loke uppanno.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``vipassii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho khattiyo jaatiyaa ^a^T2.0003^ea^ ahosi, khattiyakule udapaadi. sikhii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho khattiyo jaatiyaa ahosi, khattiyakule udapaadi. vessabhuu, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^P2.0003^ea^ khattiyo jaatiyaa ahosi, khattiyakule udapaadi. kakusandho, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho braahma.no jaatiyaa ahosi, braahma.nakule udapaadi. ko.naagamano, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^V2.0003^ea^ braahma.no jaatiyaa ahosi, braahma.nakule udapaadi. kassapo, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho braahma.no jaatiyaa ahosi, braahma.nakule udapaadi. aha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho khattiyo jaatiyaa ahosi.m, khattiyakule uppanno.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``vipassii ^a^M2.0003^ea^, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ko.n.da~n~no gottena ahosi. sikhii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ko.n.da~n~no gottena ahosi. vessabhuu, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ko.n.da~n~no gottena ahosi. kakusandho, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho kassapo gottena ahosi. ko.naagamano, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho kassapo gottena ahosi. kassapo, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho kassapo gottena ahosi. aha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho gotamo gottena ahosi.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asiitivassasahassaani ^a^T2.0004^ea^ aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. sikhissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa sattativassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. vessabhussa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa sa.t.thivassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa cattaaliisavassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ti.msavassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ^a^P2.0004^ea^ ahosi. kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa viisativassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. mayha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi appaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m paritta.m lahuka.m; yo cira.m jiivati, so vassasata.m appa.m vaa bhiyyo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``vipassii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho paa.taliyaa muule abhisambuddho. sikhii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho pu.n.dariikassa muule abhisambuddho. vessabhuu, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho saalassa muule abhisambuddho. kakusandho, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho siriisassa muule abhisambuddho. ko.naagamano, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho udumbarassa muule abhisambuddho. kassapo, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho nigrodhassa muule abhisambuddho. aha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho assatthassa muule abhisambuddho.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``vipassissa ^a^M2.0004^ea^ ^a^V2.0004^ea^, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa kha.n.datissa.m ^a^T2.0005^ea^ naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. sikhissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa abhibhuusambhava.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. vessabhussa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa so.nuttara.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa vidhurasa~njiiva.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa bhiyyosuttara.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m ^a^P2.0005^ea^ bhaddayuga.m. kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa tissabhaaradvaaja.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. mayha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi saariputtamoggallaana.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m, eko ^a^T2.0006^ea^ saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi bhikkhusatasahassa.m, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi asiitibhikkhusahassaani. vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ime tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m.

[03] ``sikhissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi bhikkhusatasahassa.m, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi asiitibhikkhusahassaani, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi sattatibhikkhusahassaani. sikhissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ime tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m.

[03] ``vessabhussa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi asiitibhikkhusahassaani, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi sattatibhikkhusahassaani, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi ^a^M2.0005^ea^ sa.t.thibhikkhusahassaani. vessabhussa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ime tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m.

[03] ``kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi ^a^V2.0005^ea^ cattaaliisabhikkhusahassaani. kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aya.m eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m.

[03] ``ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato ^a^P2.0006^ea^ sammaasambuddhassa eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi ti.msabhikkhusahassaani. ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aya.m eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m.

[03] ``kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi viisatibhikkhusahassaani. kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aya.m eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m.

[03] ``mayha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi eko ^a^T2.0007^ea^ saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani. mayha.m, bhikkhave, aya.m eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asoko naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. sikhissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa khema"nkaro naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. vessabhussa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa upasanto naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa buddhijo naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa sotthijo naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa sabbamitto naama ^a^M2.0006^ea^ bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. mayha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi aanando naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa bandhumaa naama raajaa pitaa ahosi. ^a^P2.0007^ea^ bandhumatii naama devii maataa ahosi janetti {janettii (syaa0)}. bandhumassa ra~n~no bandhumatii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi.

[03] ``sikhissa ^a^V2.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aru.no ^a^T2.0008^ea^ naama raajaa pitaa ahosi. pabhaavatii naama devii maataa ahosi janetti. aru.nassa ra~n~no aru.navatii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi.

[03] ``vessabhussa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa suppatito naama {suppatiito naama (syaa0)} raajaa pitaa ahosi. vassavatii naama {yasavatii naama (syaa0 pii0)} devii maataa ahosi janetti. suppatitassa ra~n~no anoma.m naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi.

[03] ``kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aggidatto naama braahma.no pitaa ahosi. visaakhaa naama braahma.nii maataa ahosi janetti. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena khemo naama raajaa ahosi. khemassa ra~n~no khemavatii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi.

[03] ``ko.naagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ya~n~nadatto naama braahma.no pitaa ahosi. uttaraa naama braahma.nii maataa ahosi janetti. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena sobho naama raajaa ahosi. sobhassa ra~n~no sobhavatii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi.

[03] ``kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa brahmadatto naama braahma.no pitaa ahosi. dhanavatii naama braahma.nii maataa ahosi janetti. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kikii ^a^M2.0007^ea^ naama {ki.m kii naama (syaa0)} raajaa ahosi. kikissa ra~n~no baaraa.nasii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi.

[03] ``mayha.m, bhikkhave, etarahi suddhodano naama raajaa pitaa ahosi. maayaa naama devii maataa ahosi janetti. kapilavatthu naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana ^a^T2.0009^ea^ sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P2.0008^ea^ kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa. yatra hi naama tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte ^a^V2.0007^ea^ jaatitopi anussarissati, naamatopi anussarissati, gottatopi anussarissati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarissati, saavakayugatopi anussarissati, saavakasannipaatatopi anussarissati -- `eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, tathaagatasseva nu kho esaa dhammadhaatu suppa.tividdhaa, yassaa dhammadhaatuyaa suppa.tividdhattaa tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaatitopi anussarati, naamatopi anussarati, gottatopi anussarati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarati, saavakayugatopi anussarati, saavakasannipaatatopi anussarati -- `eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa te ^a^T2.0010^ea^ bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'ti, udaahu devataa tathaagatassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m, yena tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume ^a^P2.0009^ea^ pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaatitopi anussarati, naamatopi anussarati, gottatopi anussarati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarati, saavakayugatopi anussarati, saavakasannipaatatopi anussarati -- `eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa ^a^M2.0008^ea^ te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'''ti. aya~nca hida.m tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m antaraakathaa vippakataa hoti.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena karerima.n.dalamaa.lo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaayanuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa; kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato aya.m antaraakathaa udapaadi -- `acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naama tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaatitopi anussarissati, naamatopi anussarissati, gottatopi anussarissati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarissati, saavakayugatopi anussarissati, saavakasannipaatatopi ^a^T2.0011^ea^ anussarissati -- ``eva.mjaccaa ^a^P2.0010^ea^ te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi ^a^V2.0008^ea^, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii''ti. ki.m nu kho, aavuso, tathaagatasseva nu kho esaa dhammadhaatu suppa.tividdhaa, yassaa dhammadhaatuyaa suppa.tividdhattaa tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaatitopi anussarati, naamatopi anussarati, gottatopi anussarati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarati, saavakayugatopi anussarati, saavakasannipaatatopi anussarati -- ``eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii''ti. udaahu devataa tathaagatassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m, yena tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaatitopi anussarati, naamatopi anussarati, gottatopi anussarati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarati, saavakayugatopi anussarati, saavakasannipaatatopi anussarati -- `eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa ^a^M2.0009^ea^ te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'ti? aya.m kho no, bhante, antaraakathaa vippakataa, atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatassevesaa, bhikkhave, dhammadhaatu suppa.tividdhaa, yassaa dhammadhaatuyaa suppa.tividdhattaa tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaatitopi anussarati, naamatopi anussarati, gottatopi anussarati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarati, saavakayugatopi anussarati, saavakasannipaatatopi anussarati -- `eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'ti. devataapi tathaagatassa etamattha.m aarocesu.m, yena tathaagato atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitivatte jaatitopi anussarati, naamatopi anussarati, gottatopi anussarati, aayuppamaa.natopi anussarati, saavakayugatopi ^a^T2.0012^ea^ anussarati, saavakasannipaatatopi anussarati -- `eva.mjaccaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaa eva.msiilaa eva.mdhammaa eva.mpa~n~naa eva.mvihaarii eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'ti.

[03] ``iccheyyaatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, bhiyyosomattaaya pubbenivaasapa.tisa.myutta.m ^a^P2.0011^ea^ dhammi.m katha.m sotu''nti? ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo; etassa, sugata, kaalo; ya.m bhagavaa bhiyyosomattaaya pubbenivaasapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammi.m katha.m kareyya, bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0009^ea^, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``ito so, bhikkhave, ekanavutikappe ya.m vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. vipassii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho khattiyo jaatiyaa ahosi, khattiyakule udapaadi. vipassii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ko.n.da~n~no gottena ahosi. vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asiitivassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. vipassii, bhikkhave, bhagavaa araha.m ^a^M2.0010^ea^ sammaasambuddho paa.taliyaa muule abhisambuddho. vipassissa, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0013^ea^, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa kha.n.datissa.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi bhikkhusatasahassa.m, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi asiitibhikkhusahassaani. vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ime tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m. vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asoko naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa bandhumaa naama raajaa pitaa ahosi. bandhumatii naama ^a^P2.0012^ea^ devii maataa ahosi janetti. bandhumassa ra~n~no bandhumatii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bodhisatto tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa sato sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkami. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa, esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa maatukucchi.m okkamati. atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa ^a^T2.0014^ea^, yattha pime candimasuuriyaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa aabhaaya naanubhonti, tatthapi appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa, tepi tenobhaasena ^a^V2.0010^ea^ a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti -- `a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaa'ti. aya~nca dasasahassii lokadhaatu sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. appamaa.no ca u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa ^a^M2.0011^ea^ esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, cattaaro na.m devaputtaa catuddisa.m {caatuddisa.m (syaa0)} rakkhaaya upagacchanti -- `maa na.m bodhisatta.m vaa bodhisattamaatara.m vaa manusso vaa amanusso vaa koci vaa vihe.thesii'ti. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, pakatiyaa siilavatii bodhisattamaataa hoti, virataa paa.naatipaataa, virataa adinnaadaanaa, virataa kaamesumicchaacaaraa ^a^P2.0013^ea^, virataa musaavaadaa, virataa suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamaatu purisesu maanasa.m uppajjati kaamagu.nuupasa.mhita.m, anatikkamaniiyaa ca bodhisattamaataa hoti kenaci purisena rattacittena. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto ^a^T2.0015^ea^ hoti, laabhinii bodhisattamaataa hoti pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m. saa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaareti. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamaatu kocideva aabaadho uppajjati. sukhinii bodhisattamaataa hoti akilantakaayaa, bodhisatta~nca bodhisattamaataa tirokucchigata.m passati sabba"ngapacca"ngi.m ahiinindriya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anaavilo sabbaakaarasampanno. tatraassa {tatrassa (syaa0)} sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m vaa. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso hatthe karitvaa paccavekkheyya -- `aya.m kho ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anaavilo sabbaakaarasampanno. tatrida.m sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m vaa'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto ^a^M2.0012^ea^ maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamaatu kocideva aabaadho uppajjati, sukhinii bodhisattamaataa hoti akilantakaayaa ^a^V2.0011^ea^, bodhisatta~nca ^a^P2.0014^ea^ bodhisattamaataa tirokucchigata.m passati sabba"ngapacca"ngi.m ahiinindriya.m. ayamettha dhammataa.
[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, sattaahajaate bodhisatte bodhisattamaataa kaala"nkaroti tusita.m kaaya.m upapajjati. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa ^a^T2.0016^ea^ esaa, bhikkhave, yathaa a~n~naa itthikaa nava vaa dasa vaa maase gabbha.m kucchinaa pariharitvaa vijaayanti, na heva.m bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa vijaayati. daseva maasaani bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa kucchinaa pariharitvaa vijaayati. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yathaa a~n~naa itthikaa nisinnaa vaa nipannaa vaa vijaayanti, na heva.m bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa vijaayati. .thitaava bodhisatta.m bodhisattamaataa vijaayati. ayamettha dhammataa.
[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, devaa pa.thama.m pa.tigga.nhanti, pacchaa manussaa. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, appattova bodhisatto pathavi.m hoti, cattaaro na.m devaputtaa pa.tiggahetvaa maatu purato .thapenti -- `attamanaa, devi, hohi; mahesakkho te putto uppanno'ti. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, visadova nikkhamati amakkhito udena {uddena (syaa0), udarena (katthaci)} amakkhito semhena amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci asucinaa suddho {visuddho (syaa0)} visado. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ma.niratana.m kaasike vatthe nikkhitta.m neva ma.niratana.m kaasika.m vattha.m makkheti, naapi kaasika.m vattha.m ma.niratana.m makkheti. ta.m kissa ^a^T2.0017^ea^ hetu? ubhinna.m suddhattaa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, visadova nikkhamati amakkhito, udena amakkhito ^a^M2.0013^ea^ semhena ^a^P2.0015^ea^ amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci asucinaa suddho visado. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, dve udakassa ^a^V2.0012^ea^ dhaaraa antalikkhaa paatubhavanti -- ekaa siitassa ekaa u.nhassa yena bodhisattassa udakakicca.m karonti maatu ca. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, sampatijaato bodhisatto samehi paadehi pati.t.thahitvaa uttaraabhimukho {uttarenaabhimukho (syaa0) uttarenamukho (ka0)} sattapadaviitihaarena gacchati setamhi chatte anudhaariyamaane, sabbaa ca disaa anuviloketi, aasabhi.m vaaca.m bhaasati `aggohamasmi lokassa, je.t.thohamasmi lokassa, se.t.thohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimaa jaati, natthidaani punabbhavo'ti. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ``dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso ^a^T2.0018^ea^ paatubhavati, atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa, yattha pime candimasuuriyaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa aabhaaya naanubhonti, tatthapi appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa, tepi tenobhaasena a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti -- `a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaa'ti. aya~nca dasasahassii lokadhaatu sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati appamaa.no ca u.laaro obhaaso loke paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. ayamettha dhammataa.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``jaate ^a^P2.0016^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassimhi kumaare bandhumato ra~n~no pa.tivedesu.m -- `putto te, deva {deva te (ka0)}, jaato, ta.m devo passatuu'ti. addasaa kho, bhikkhave, bandhumaa raajaa vipassi.m kumaara.m, disvaa nemitte braahma.ne ^a^M2.0014^ea^ aamantaapetvaa etadavoca -- `passantu bhonto nemittaa braahma.naa kumaara'nti. addasa.msu kho, bhikkhave, nemittaa braahma.naa vipassi.m kumaara.m, disvaa bandhumanta.m raajaana.m etadavocu.m -- `attamano, deva, hohi, mahesakkho te putto uppanno, laabhaa te, mahaaraaja, suladdha.m te, mahaaraaja, yassa te kule evaruupo putto uppanno. aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani sattaratanaani bhavanti. seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva ^a^T2.0019^ea^ ^a^V2.0013^ea^ sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.tacchado.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ `katamehi caaya.m, deva, kumaaro dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaapii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani sattaratanaani bhavanti ^a^P2.0017^ea^. seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.tacchado.
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro suppati.t.thitapaado. ya.m paaya.m, deva, kumaaro suppati.t.thitapaado. idampissa mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.

[03] `imassa, deva {imassa hi deva (?)}, kumaarassa he.t.thaa paadatalesu cakkaani jaataani sahassaaraani sanemikaani sanaabhikaani sabbaakaaraparipuuraani. yampi, imassa ^a^M2.0015^ea^ deva, kumaarassa he.t.thaa paadatalesu cakkaani jaataani sahassaaraani sanemikaani sanaabhikaani sabbaakaaraparipuuraani, idampissa mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.
[01] `aya~nhi ^a^T2.0020^ea^ deva, kumaaro aayatapa.nhii...pe0...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro diigha"ngulii...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro mudutalunahatthapaado...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva kumaaro jaalahatthapaado...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro ussa"nkhapaado...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro e.nija"ngho...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro .thitakova anonamanto ubhohi paa.nitalehi ja.n.nukaani parimasati {paraamasati (ka0)} parimajjati...
[01] `aya~nhi ^a^V2.0014^ea^, deva, kumaaro kosohitavatthaguyho...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro suva.n.nava.n.no ka~ncanasannibhattaco...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro sukhumacchavii; sukhumattaa ^a^P2.0018^ea^ chaviyaa rajojalla.m kaaye na upalimpati {upalippati (syaa0)} ...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro ekekalomo; ekekaani lomaani lomakuupesu jaataani...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro uddhaggalomo; uddhaggaani lomaani jaataani niilaani a~njanava.n.naani ku.n.dalaava.t.taani dakkhi.naava.t.takajaataani...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro brahmujugatto...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro sattussado...
[01] `aya~nhi ^a^T2.0021^ea^, deva, kumaaro siihapubbaddhakaayo...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro citantara.mso {pitantara.mso (syaa0)} ...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro nigrodhaparima.n.dalo yaavatakvassa kaayo taavatakvassa byaamo, yaavatakvassa byaamo, taavatakvassa kaayo...
[01] `aya~nhi ^a^M2.0016^ea^, deva, kumaaro samava.t.takkhandho...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro rasaggasaggii...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro siihahanu...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro cattaaliisadanto...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro samadanto...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro avira.ladanto...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro susukkadaa.tho...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro pahuutajivho...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro brahmassaro karaviikabhaa.nii...
[01] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro abhiniilanetto...
[03] `aya~nhi, deva, kumaaro gopakhumo...

[03] imassa, deva, kumaarassa u.n.naa bhamukantare jaataa odaataa mudutuulasannibhaa. yampi imassa deva kumaarassa u.n.naa bhamukantare jaataa odaataa mudutuulasannibhaa, idampimassa ^a^P2.0019^ea^ mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.
[03] `aya~nhi ^a^T2.0022^ea^ ^a^V2.0015^ea^, deva, kumaaro u.nhiisasiiso. ya.m paaya.m, deva, kumaaro u.nhiisasiiso, idampissa mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ `imehi kho aya.m, deva, kumaaro dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani sattaratanaani bhavanti. seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena {dhammena samena (syaa0)} abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace kho pana ^a^M2.0017^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.tacchado'ti.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumaa raajaa nemitte braahma.ne ahatehi vatthehi acchaadaapetvaa {acchaadetvaa (syaa0)} sabbakaamehi santappesi. atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumaa raajaa vipassissa kumaarassa dhaatiyo upa.t.thaapesi. a~n~naa khiira.m paayenti, a~n~naa nhaapenti, a~n~naa dhaarenti, a~n~naa a"nkena pariharanti. jaatassa kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumaarassa setacchatta.m dhaarayittha divaa ceva ratti~nca -- `maa na.m siita.m vaa ^a^T2.0023^ea^ u.nha.m vaa ti.na.m vaa rajo vaa ussaavo vaa baadhayitthaa'ti. jaato kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro bahuno janassa piyo ahosi manaapo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uppala.m vaa ^a^P2.0020^ea^ paduma.m vaa pu.n.dariika.m vaa bahuno janassa piya.m manaapa.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro bahuno janassa piyo ahosi manaapo. svaassuda.m a"nkeneva a"nka.m parihariyati.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``jaato kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro ma~njussaro ca {kumaaro brahmassaro ma~njussaro ca (sii0 ka0)} ahosi vaggussaro ca madhurassaro ca pemaniyassaro ca. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, himavante pabbate karaviikaa naama saku.najaati ma~njussaraa ca vaggussaraa ca madhurassaraa ca pemaniyassaraa ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro ma~njussaro ca ahosi vaggussaro ca madhurassaro ca pemaniyassaro ca.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``jaatassa ^a^V2.0016^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumaarassa kammavipaakaja.m dibbacakkhu paaturahosi yena suda.m {yena duura.m (syaa0)} samantaa yojana.m passati divaa ceva ratti~nca.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``jaato kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro animisanto pekkhati seyyathaapi devaa taavati.msaa. `animisanto kumaaro pekkhatii'ti kho, bhikkhave {animisanto pekkhati, jaatassa kho pana bhikkhave (ka0)}, vipassissa kumaarassa `vipassii vipassii' tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M2.0018^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bandhumaa raajaa atthakara.ne {a.t.ta kara.ne (syaa0)} nisinno vipassi.m kumaara.m a"nke nisiidaapetvaa atthe anusaasati ^a^P2.0021^ea^. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro pitua"nke nisinno viceyya ^a^T2.0024^ea^ viceyya atthe panaayati ~naayena {a.t.te panaayati ~naa.nena (syaa0)}. viceyya viceyya kumaaro atthe panaayati ~naayenaati kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumaarassa bhiyyosomattaaya `vipassii vipassii' tveva sama~n~naa udapaadi.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumaa raajaa vipassissa kumaarassa tayo paasaade kaaraapesi, eka.m vassika.m eka.m hemantika.m eka.m gimhika.m; pa~nca kaamagu.naani upa.t.thaapesi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro vassike paasaade cattaaro maase {vassike paasaade vassike} nippurisehi tuuriyehi paricaarayamaano na he.t.thaapaasaada.m orohatii''ti.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro bahuuna.m vassaana.m bahuuna.m vassasataana.m bahuuna.m vassasahassaana.m accayena saarathi.m aamantesi -- `yojehi, samma saarathi, bhaddaani bhaddaani yaanaani uyyaanabhuumi.m gacchaama subhuumidassanaayaa'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, saarathi vipassissa kumaarassa pa.tissutvaa bhaddaani bhaddaani yaanaani yojetvaa vipassissa kumaarassa pa.tivedesi -- `yuttaani kho te, deva, bhaddaani bhaddaani yaanaani, yassa daani kaala.m ma~n~nasii'ti ^a^V2.0017^ea^. atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro bhadda.m bhadda.m yaana.m {bhadra.m yaana.m (syaa0), bhadda.m yaana.m (pii0) cattaaro maase (sii0 pii0)} abhiruhitvaa bhaddehi bhaddehi yaanehi uyyaanabhuumi.m niyyaasi.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ``addasaa kho, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro uyyaanabhuumi.m ^a^P2.0022^ea^ niyyanto purisa.m ji.n.na.m gopaanasiva"nka.m bhogga.m {bhagga.m (syaa0)} da.n.daparaayana.m pavedhamaana.m gacchanta.m aatura.m ^a^M2.0019^ea^ gatayobbana.m. disvaa saarathi.m aamantesi -- `aya.m pana, samma saarathi, puriso ki.mkato? kesaapissa na yathaa a~n~nesa.m, kaayopissa ^a^T2.0025^ea^ na yathaa a~n~nesa'nti. `eso kho, deva, ji.n.no naamaa'ti. `ki.m paneso, samma saarathi, ji.n.no naamaa'ti? `eso kho, deva, ji.n.no naama. na daani tena cira.m jiivitabba.m bhavissatii'ti. `ki.m pana, samma saarathi, ahampi jaraadhammo, jara.m anatiito'ti? `tva~nca, deva, maya~ncamha sabbe jaraadhammaa, jara.m anatiitaa'ti. `tena hi, samma saarathi, ala.m daanajja uyyaanabhuumiyaa. itova antepura.m paccaniyyaahii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, saarathi vipassissa kumaarassa pa.tissutvaa tatova antepura.m paccaniyyaasi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro antepura.m gato dukkhii dummano pajjhaayati -- `dhiratthu kira, bho, jaati naama, yatra hi naama jaatassa jaraa pa~n~naayissatii'ti!

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumaa raajaa saarathi.m aamantaapetvaa etadavoca -- `kacci, samma saarathi, kumaaro uyyaanabhuumiyaa abhiramittha? kacci, samma saarathi, kumaaro uyyaanabhuumiyaa attamano ahosii'ti? `na kho, deva, kumaaro uyyaanabhuumiyaa abhiramittha, na kho, deva, kumaaro uyyaanabhuumiyaa attamano ahosii'ti. `ki.m pana, samma saarathi, addasa kumaaro uyyaanabhuumi.m niyyanto'ti? `addasaa ^a^P2.0023^ea^ kho, deva, kumaaro uyyaanabhuumi.m niyyanto purisa.m ji.n.na.m gopaanasiva"nka.m bhogga.m da.n.daparaayana.m pavedhamaana.m gacchanta.m aatura.m gatayobbana.m. disvaa ma.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m pana, samma saarathi, puriso ki.mkato, kesaapissa na yathaa a~n~nesa.m, kaayopissa ^a^T2.0026^ea^ na yathaa a~n~nesa''nti? ``eso kho, deva, ji.n.no naamaa''ti. ``ki.m paneso, samma saarathi, ji.n.no naamaa''ti? ``eso kho, deva, ji.n.no naama na daani tena cira.m jiivitabba.m bhavissatii''ti. ``ki.m pana, samma saarathi, ahampi jaraadhammo, jara.m anatiito''ti? ``tva~nca, deva, maya~ncamha sabbe jaraadhammaa, jara.m anatiitaa''ti.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ``addasaa ^a^M2.0022^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro uyyaanabhuumi.m niyyanto mahaajanakaaya.m sannipatita.m ^a^V2.0020^ea^ naanaarattaana~nca dussaana.m vilaata.m kayiramaana.m. disvaa saarathi.m aamantesi -- `ki.m nu kho, so, samma saarathi, mahaajanakaayo sannipatito naanaarattaana~nca dussaana.m vilaata.m kayiratii'ti? `eso ^a^P2.0026^ea^ kho, deva, kaala"nkato naamaa'ti. `tena hi, samma saarathi, yena so kaala"nkato tena ratha.m pesehii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, saarathi vipassissa kumaarassa pa.tissutvaa yena so kaala"nkato tena ratha.m pesesi. addasaa kho, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro peta.m kaala"nkata.m, disvaa saarathi.m aamantesi -- `ki.m panaaya.m, samma saarathi, kaala"nkato naamaa'ti? `eso kho, deva, kaala"nkato naama. na daani ta.m dakkhanti maataa vaa pitaa vaa a~n~ne vaa ~naatisaalohitaa, sopi na dakkhissati maatara.m vaa pitara.m vaa a~n~ne vaa ~naatisaalohite'ti. `ki.m pana, samma saarathi, ahampi mara.nadhammo mara.na.m anatiito; mampi na dakkhanti devo vaa devii vaa a~n~ne vaa ~naatisaalohitaa; ahampi na dakkhissaami deva.m vaa devi.m vaa a~n~ne vaa ~naatisaalohite'ti? `tva~nca, deva, maya~ncamha sabbe mara.nadhammaa mara.na.m anatiitaa; tampi na dakkhanti devo vaa devii vaa a~n~ne ^a^T2.0030^ea^ vaa ~naatisaalohitaa; tvampi na dakkhissasi deva.m vaa devi.m vaa a~n~ne vaa ~naatisaalohite'ti. `tena hi, samma saarathi, ala.m daanajja uyyaanabhuumiyaa, itova antepura.m paccaniyyaahii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, saarathi vipassissa kumaarassa pa.tissutvaa tatova antepura.m paccaniyyaasi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, vipassii kumaaro antepura.m gato dukkhii dummano pajjhaayati -- `dhiratthu kira, bho, jaati naama, yatra hi naama jaatassa jaraa pa~n~naayissati, byaadhi pa~n~naayissati, mara.na.m pa~n~naayissatii'ti.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ``assosi kho, bhikkhave, bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa mahaajanakaayo caturaasiiti paa.nasahassaani -- `vipassii kira kumaaro kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa ^a^V2.0023^ea^ ^a^P2.0030^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito'ti. sutvaana tesa.m etadahosi -- `na hi nuuna so orako dhammavinayo, na saa orakaa {orikaa (sii0 syaa0)} pabbajjaa, yattha vipassii kumaaro kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. vipassiipi naama kumaaro kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati, kima"nga.m {kima"nga (sii0)} pana maya'nti.

[03] ``atha kho, so bhikkhave, mahaajanakaayo {mahaajanakaayo (syaa0)} caturaasiiti paa.nasahassaani kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa vipassi.m bodhisatta.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajita.m anupabbaji.msu. taaya suda.m, bhikkhave, parisaaya parivuto vipassii bodhisatto gaamanigamajanapadaraajadhaaniisu caarika.m carati.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `na kho meta.m {na kho paneta.m (syaa0)} patiruupa.m yoha.m aaki.n.no viharaami, ya.mnuunaaha.m eko ga.namhaa vuupaka.t.tho vihareyya'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bodhisatto aparena samayena eko ^a^M2.0026^ea^ ga.namhaa vuupaka.t.tho vihaasi ^a^T2.0035^ea^, a~n~neneva taani caturaasiiti pabbajitasahassaani agama.msu, a~n~nena maggena vipassii bodhisatto.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa vaasuupagatassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `kiccha.m vataaya.m loko aapanno, jaayati ca jiiyati ca miiyati ca {jiyyati ca miyyati ca (ka0)} cavati ca upapajjati ca, atha ca panimassa dukkhassa ^a^P2.0031^ea^ nissara.na.m nappajaanaati jaraamara.nassa, kudaassu naama imassa dukkhassa nissara.na.m pa~n~naayissati jaraamara.nassaa'ti?

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa jaraamara.na'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `jaatiyaa kho sati jaraamara.na.m hoti, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na'nti.

[03] ``atha ^a^V2.0024^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati jaati hoti, ki.mpaccayaa jaatii'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `bhave kho sati jaati hoti, bhavapaccayaa jaatii'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, ki.mpaccayaa bhavo'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `upaadaane kho sati bhavo hoti, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati upaadaana.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa ^a^T2.0036^ea^ upaadaana'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `ta.nhaaya kho sati upaadaana.m hoti, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana'nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati ta.nhaa hoti, ki.mpaccayaa ta.nhaa'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa ^a^M2.0027^ea^ bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vedanaaya kho sati ta.nhaa hoti, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati vedanaa hoti, ki.mpaccayaa vedanaa'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa ^a^P2.0032^ea^ yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `phasse kho sati vedanaa hoti, phassapaccayaa vedanaa'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, ki.mpaccayaa phasso'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `sa.laayatane kho sati phasso hoti, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati sa.laayatana.m ^a^V2.0025^ea^ hoti, ki.mpaccayaa sa.laayatana'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho sati sa.laayatana.m hoti, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana'nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati naamaruupa.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa naamaruupa'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa ^a^T2.0037^ea^ bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vi~n~naa.ne kho sati naamaruupa.m hoti, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa'nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho sati vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, ki.mpaccayaa vi~n~naa.na'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho sati vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, naamaruupapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na'nti.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `paccudaavattati kho ida.m vi~n~naa.na.m naamaruupamhaa, naapara.m gacchati. ettaavataa jaayetha ^a^M2.0028^ea^ vaa jiyyetha vaa miyyetha vaa cavetha vaa upapajjetha vaa, yadida.m naamaruupapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa ^a^P2.0033^ea^, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti'.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ```samudayo samudayo'ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati jaraamara.na.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo ^a^T2.0038^ea^ -- `jaatiyaa kho asati jaraamara.na.m na hoti, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^V2.0026^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati jaati na hoti, kissa nirodhaa jaatinirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `bhave kho asati jaati na hoti, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti, kissa nirodhaa bhavanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `upaadaane kho asati bhavo na hoti, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati upaadaana.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa upaadaananirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu ^a^M2.0029^ea^ pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `ta.nhaaya kho asati upaadaana.m na hoti, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati ta.nhaa na hoti, kissa nirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo ^a^P2.0034^ea^ -- `vedanaaya kho asati ta.nhaa na hoti, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati vedanaa na hoti, kissa nirodhaa vedanaanirodho'ti? atha ^a^T2.0039^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `phasse kho asati vedanaa na hoti, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti, kissa nirodhaa phassanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `sa.laayatane kho asati phasso na hoti, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^V2.0027^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati sa.laayatana.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho asati sa.laayatana.m na hoti, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati naamaruupa.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa naamaruupanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `vi~n~naa.ne kho asati naamaruupa.m na hoti, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `kimhi nu kho asati vi~n~naa.na.m na hoti, kissa nirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikaaraa ahu ^a^M2.0030^ea^ pa~n~naaya abhisamayo -- `naamaruupe kho asati vi~n~naa.na.m na hoti, naamaruupanirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho'ti.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi -- `adhigato ^a^T2.0040^ea^ kho myaaya.m maggo sambodhaaya ^a^P2.0035^ea^ yadida.m -- naamaruupanirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti'.
[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ```nirodho nirodho'ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bodhisatto aparena samayena pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii vihaasi -- `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa, iti vedanaaya samudayo, iti vedanaaya attha"ngamo; iti sa~n~naa, iti sa~n~naaya samudayo, iti sa~n~naaya attha"ngamo; iti sa"nkhaaraa, iti sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo, iti sa"nkhaaraana.m ^a^V2.0028^ea^ attha"ngamo; iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti, tassa pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassino viharato na cirasseva anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccii''ti.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^T2.0041^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m dhamma.m deseyya'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa ^a^M2.0031^ea^ bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ^a^P2.0036^ea^ etadahosi -- `adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaaya kho pana pajaaya aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m yadida.m idappaccayataapa.ticcasamuppaado. idampi kho .thaana.m duddasa.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva kho pana dhamma.m deseyya.m, pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m; so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa'ti.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ ``apissu, bhikkhave, vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m imaa anacchariyaa gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --
[21] `kicchena me adhigata.m, hala.m daani pakaasitu.m.
[22] raagadosaparetehi, naaya.m dhammo susambudho..
[21] `pa.tisotagaami.m nipu.na.m, gambhiira.m duddasa.m a.nu.m.
[22] raagarattaa na dakkhanti, tamokhandhena aavu.taa'ti..
[03] ``itiha ^a^V2.0029^ea^, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa pa.tisa~ncikkhato appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaaya.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^T2.0042^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natarassa mahaabrahmuno vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya etadahosi ^a^P2.0037^ea^ -- `nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko, yatra hi naama vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa appossukkataaya citta.m namati {nami (syaa0 ka0), namissati (?)}, no dhammadesanaayaa'ti. atha kho so, bhikkhave, mahaabrahmaa seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya; evameva brahmaloke antarahito vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa purato paaturahosi. atha kho so, bhikkhave, mahaabrahmaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.na.m jaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m ^a^M2.0032^ea^ nihantvaa {nidahanto (syaa0)} yena vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `desetu, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu sugato dhamma.m, santi {santii (syaa0)} sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa; assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro'ti.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte {atha kho (ka0)}, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ta.m mahaabrahmaana.m etadavoca -- `mayhampi kho, brahme, etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m dhamma.m deseyya''nti. tassa mayha.m, brahme, etadahosi -- ``adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaaya kho pana pajaaya aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya ^a^T2.0043^ea^ duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m yadida.m idappaccayataapa.ticcasamuppaado. idampi kho .thaana.m duddasa.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva kho pana dhamma.m deseyya.m, pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m; so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa''ti. apissu ma.m, brahme ^a^P2.0038^ea^, imaa anacchariyaa gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --
[21] ``kicchena me adhigata.m, hala.m daani pakaasitu.m.
[22] raagadosaparetehi, naaya.m dhammo susambudho..
[21] ``pa.tisotagaami.m nipu.na.m, gambhiira.m duddasa.m a.nu.m.
[22] raagarattaa na dakkhanti, tamokhandhena aavu.taa''ti..
[03] `itiha ^a^V2.0030^ea^ me, brahme, pa.tisa~ncikkhato appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaayaa'ti.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, so mahaabrahmaa...pe0... tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, so mahaabrahmaa vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `desetu, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu sugato dhamma.m, santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro'ti.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M2.0033^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho brahmuno ca ajjhesana.m viditvaa sattesu ca kaaru~n~nata.m pa.ticca buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokesi. addasaa kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye {duvi~n~naapaye bhabbe abhabbe (syaa0)} appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine {dassaavino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine {dassaavino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} viharante. seyyathaapi naama uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m ^a^T2.0044^ea^ vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani anto nimuggaposiini. appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani samodaka.m .thitaani. appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaa accuggamma .thitaani anupalittaani udakena. evameva ^a^P2.0039^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, bhikkhave, mahaabrahmaa vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] `sele yathaa pabbatamuddhani.t.thito, yathaapi passe janata.m samantato.
[22] tathuupama.m dhammamaya.m sumedha, paasaadamaaruyha samantacakkhu..
[21] `sokaavati.n.na.m ^a^V2.0031^ea^ {sokaavaki.n.na.m (syaa0)} janatamapetasoko,
[27] avekkhassu jaatijaraabhibhuuta.m.
[26] u.t.thehi ^a^T2.0045^ea^ viira vijitasa"ngaama,
[27] satthavaaha a.na.na vicara loke..
[26] desassu {desetu (syaa0 pii0)} bhagavaa dhamma.m,
[22] a~n~naataaro bhavissantii'ti..
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M2.0034^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ta.m mahaabrahmaana.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] `apaarutaa tesa.m amatassa dvaaraa,
[27] ye sotavanto pamu~ncantu saddha.m.
[26] vihi.msasa~n~nii pagu.na.m na bhaasi.m,
[22] dhamma.m pa.niita.m manujesu brahme'ti..

[03] ``atha kho so, bhikkhave, mahaabrahmaa `kataavakaaso khomhi vipassinaa bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dhammadesanaayaa'ti vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m ^a^P2.0040^ea^ sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tattheva antaradhaayi.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa etadahosi -- `kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m, ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii'ti? atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa etadahosi -- `aya.m kho kha.n.do ca raajaputto tisso ca purohitaputto bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa pa.tivasanti pa.n.ditaa viyattaa medhaavino diigharatta.m apparajakkhajaatikaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m kha.n.dassa ca raajaputtassa, tissassa ca purohitaputtassa pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m ^a^T2.0046^ea^, te ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissantii'ti.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho seyyathaapi naama balavaa ^a^V2.0032^ea^ puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya; evameva bodhirukkhamuule antarahito bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa kheme migadaaye paaturahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho daayapaala.m {migadaayapaala.m (syaa0)} aamantesi -- `ehi tva.m, samma daayapaala, bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m pavisitvaa kha.n.da~nca raajaputta.m tissa~nca purohitaputta.m eva.m vadehi -- vipassii, bhante, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m anuppatto kheme migadaaye viharati, so ^a^M2.0035^ea^ tumhaaka.m dassanakaamo'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, daayapaalo vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa pa.tissutvaa bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m pavisitvaa kha.n.da~nca raajaputta.m tissa~nca purohitaputta.m etadavoca -- `vipassii, bhante, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m anuppatto kheme migadaaye viharati; so tumhaaka.m dassanakaamo'ti.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, kha.n.do ca raajaputto tisso ca ^a^P2.0041^ea^ purohitaputto bhaddaani bhaddaani yaanaani yojaapetvaa bhadda.m bhadda.m yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhaddehi bhaddehi yaanehi bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa niyyi.msu. yena khemo migadaayo tena paayi.msu. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikaava {padikaava (syaa0)} yena vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami.msu. upasa"nkamitvaa vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m ^a^T2.0047^ea^ sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ``tesa.m vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho anupubbi.m katha.m {aanupubbikatha.m (sii0 pii0)} kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa te bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacitte muducitte viniivara.nacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva kha.n.dassa ca raajaputtassa tissassa ca purohitaputtassa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- `ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma'nti.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ``te di.t.thadhammaa pattadhammaa viditadhammaa pariyogaa.lhadhammaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavocu.m -- `abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare ^a^V2.0033^ea^ vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya ``cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii''ti. evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo ^a^M2.0036^ea^ pakaasito. ete maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m ^a^P2.0042^ea^ gacchaama dhamma~nca. labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada'nti.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ``alatthu.m kho ^a^T2.0048^ea^, bhikkhave, kha.n.do ca raajaputto, tisso ca purohitaputto vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike pabbajja.m alatthu.m upasampada.m. te vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi; sa"nkhaaraana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nibbaane {nekkhamme (syaa0)} aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. tesa.m vipassinaa bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassiyamaanaana.m samaadapiyamaanaana.m samuttejiyamaanaana.m sampaha.msiyamaanaana.m nacirasseva anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ``assosi kho, bhikkhave, bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa mahaajanakaayo caturaasiitipaa.nasahassaani -- `vipassii kira bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m anuppatto kheme migadaaye viharati. kha.n.do ca kira raajaputto tisso ca purohitaputto vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa'ti. sutvaana nesa.m etadahosi -- `na hi nuuna so orako dhammavinayo, na saa orakaa pabbajjaa, yattha kha.n.do ca raajaputto tisso ca purohitaputto kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa. kha.n.do ca raajaputto tisso ca purohitaputto kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissanti, kima"nga.m pana maya'nti. atha ^a^T2.0049^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, mahaajanakaayo caturaasiitipaa.nasahassaani bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa nikkhamitvaa yena khemo migadaayo yena vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^P2.0043^ea^ tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ``tesa.m ^a^M2.0037^ea^ vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi. seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa te bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacitte muducitte viniivara.nacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte ^a^V2.0034^ea^, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva tesa.m caturaasiitipaa.nasahassaana.m tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- `ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma'nti.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ``te di.t.thadhammaa pattadhammaa viditadhammaa pariyogaa.lhadhammaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavocu.m -- `abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya ``cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii''ti. evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca {( ) natthi a.t.thakathaaya.m, paa.liya.m pana sabbatthapi dissati}. labheyyaama ^a^T2.0050^ea^ maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m labheyyaama upasampada''nti.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``alatthu.m kho, bhikkhave, taani caturaasiitipaa.nasahassaani vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike pabbajja.m, alatthu.m upasampada.m. te vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi; sa"nkhaaraana.m ^a^P2.0044^ea^ aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nibbaane aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. tesa.m vipassinaa bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassiyamaanaana.m samaadapiyamaanaana.m samuttejiyamaanaana.m sampaha.msiyamaanaana.m nacirasseva anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ``assosu.m kho, bhikkhave, taani purimaani caturaasiitipabbajitasahassaani -- `vipassii kira bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m ^a^M2.0038^ea^ anuppatto kheme migadaaye viharati, dhamma~nca kira desetii'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, taani caturaasiitipabbajitasahassaani yena bandhumatii raajadhaanii yena khemo migadaayo yena vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ ``tesa.m ^a^V2.0035^ea^ vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi. seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa te bhagavaa a~n~naasi kallacitte muducitte ^a^T2.0051^ea^ viniivara.nacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva tesa.m caturaasiitipabbajitasahassaana.m tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- `ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma'nti.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ``te di.t.thadhammaa pattadhammaa viditadhammaa pariyogaa.lhadhammaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavocu.m -- `abhikkanta.m ^a^P2.0045^ea^, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya ``cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii''ti. evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m labheyyaama upasampada''nti.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ ``alatthu.m kho, bhikkhave, taani caturaasiitipabbajitasahassaani vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike pabbajja.m alatthu.m upasampada.m. te vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi; sa"nkhaaraana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nibbaane aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. tesa.m vipassinaa bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassiyamaanaana.m ^a^T2.0052^ea^ samaadapiyamaanaana.m ^a^M2.0039^ea^ samuttejiyamaanaana.m sampaha.msiyamaanaana.m nacirasseva anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ``tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa mahaabhikkhusa"ngho pa.tivasati a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `mahaa kho etarahi bhikkhusa"ngho bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa pa.tivasati a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m, ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuu anujaaneyya.m -- `caratha, bhikkhave, caarika.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya ^a^V2.0036^ea^ atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m; maa ekena dve agamittha; desetha, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0046^ea^, dhamma.m aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetha. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro. api ca channa.m channa.m vassaana.m accayena bandhumatii raajadhaanii upasa"nkamitabbaa paatimokkhuddesaayaa'''ti.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro mahaabrahmaa vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya. evameva brahmaloke antarahito vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa purato ^a^T2.0053^ea^ paaturahosi. atha kho so, bhikkhave, mahaabrahmaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa vipassi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata. mahaa kho, bhante, etarahi bhikkhusa"ngho bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa pa.tivasati a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m, anujaanaatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuu -- ``caratha, bhikkhave, caarika.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m; maa ekena dve agamittha; desetha, bhikkhave, dhamma.m aadikalyaa.na.m ^a^M2.0040^ea^ majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetha. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro''ti {a~n~naataaro (ssabbattha)}. api ca, bhante, maya.m tathaa karissaama yathaa bhikkhuu channa.m channa.m vassaana.m accayena bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m upasa"nkamissanti paatimokkhuddesaayaa'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, so mahaabrahmaa, ida.m vatvaa vipassi.m ^a^P2.0047^ea^ bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tattheva antaradhaayi.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `idha mayha.m, bhikkhave, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- mahaa kho etarahi bhikkhusa"ngho bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa pa.tivasati a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m ^a^T2.0054^ea^. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhikkhuu anujaaneyya.m -- `caratha, bhikkhave, caarika.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m; maa ekena dve agamittha; desetha, bhikkhave, dhamma.m aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetha. santi sattaa ^a^V2.0037^ea^ apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro. api ca, channa.m channa.m vassaana.m accayena bandhumatii raajadhaanii upasa"nkamitabbaa paatimokkhuddesaayaati.

[03] ```atha kho, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro mahaabrahmaa mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva brahmaloke antarahito mama purato paaturahosi. atha kho so, bhikkhave, mahaabrahmaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yenaaha.m tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ma.m etadavoca -- ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata. mahaa kho, bhante, etarahi bhikkhusa"ngho bandhumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa pa.tivasati a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m. anujaanaatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhuu -- `caratha, bhikkhave, caarika.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya ^a^M2.0041^ea^ sukhaaya devamanussaana.m; maa ekena dve agamittha; desetha, bhikkhave, dhamma.m...pe0... santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa ^a^T2.0055^ea^, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro'ti. api ^a^P2.0048^ea^ ca, bhante, maya.m tathaa karissaama, yathaa bhikkhuu channa.m channa.m vassaana.m accayena bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m upasa"nkamissanti paatimokkhuddesaayaa''ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, so mahaabrahmaa, ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tattheva antaradhaayi'.

[03] ```anujaanaami, bhikkhave, caratha caarika.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m; maa ekena dve agamittha; desetha, bhikkhave, dhamma.m aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetha. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro. api ca, bhikkhave, channa.m channa.m vassaana.m accayena bandhumatii raajadhaanii upasa"nkamitabbaa paatimokkhuddesaayaa'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu yebhuyyena ekaaheneva janapadacaarika.m pakkami.msu.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ ``tena kho pana samayena jambudiipe caturaasiiti aavaasasahassaani honti. ekamhi hi vasse nikkhante devataa saddamanussaavesu.m -- `nikkhanta.m kho, maarisaa, eka.m vassa.m; pa~nca daani vassaani sesaani ^a^P2.0049^ea^; pa~ncanna.m vassaana.m accayena bandhumatii raajadhaanii upasa"nkamitabbaa paatimokkhuddesaayaa'ti. dviisu vassesu nikkhantesu... ^a^T2.0056^ea^ tiisu vassesu nikkhantesu... catuusu vassesu nikkhantesu... pa~ncasu vassesu nikkhantesu devataa saddamanussaavesu.m -- `nikkhantaani kho ^a^V2.0038^ea^, maarisaa, pa~ncavassaani; eka.m daani vassa.m sesa.m; ekassa vassassa accayena bandhumatii raajadhaanii upasa"nkamitabbaa paatimokkhuddesaayaa'ti. chasu vassesu nikkhantesu devataa saddamanussaavesu.m -- `nikkhantaani kho, maarisaa, chabbassaani, samayo daani bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m upasa"nkamitu.m paatimokkhuddesaayaa'ti. atha kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu appekacce sakena iddhaanubhaavena appekacce devataana.m iddhaanubhaavena ekaaheneva bandhumati.m raajadhaani.m upasa"nkami.msu paatimokkhuddesaayaati {paatimokkhuddesaaya (?)}.
[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^M2.0042^ea^ suda.m, bhikkhave, vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhikkhusa"nghe eva.m paatimokkha.m uddisati --
[21] `khantii ^a^T2.0057^ea^ parama.m tapo titikkhaa,
[27] nibbaana.m parama.m vadanti buddhaa.
[26] na hi pabbajito paruupaghaatii,
[22] na sama.no {sama.no (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} hoti para.m vihe.thayanto..
[21] `sabbapaapassa akara.na.m, kusalassa upasampadaa.
[22] sacittapariyodapana.m, eta.m buddhaanasaasana.m..
[21] `anuupavaado anuupaghaato {anupavaado anupaghaato (pii0 ka0)}, paatimokkhe ca sa.mvaro.
[27] matta~n~nutaa ^a^P2.0050^ea^ ca bhattasmi.m, panta~nca sayanaasana.m.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, bhikkhave, samaya.m ukka.t.thaaya.m viharaami subhagavane saalaraajamuule. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `na kho so sattaavaaso sulabharuupo, yo mayaa anaavutthapubbo {anajjhaavu.t.thapubbo (ka0 sii0 ka0)} iminaa diighena addhunaa a~n~natra suddhaavaasehi devehi. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena suddhaavaasaa devaa tenupasa"nkameyya'nti. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva ukka.t.thaaya.m subhagavane saalaraajamuule antarahito avihesu devesu paaturahosi.m ^a^V2.0039^ea^. tasmi.m, bhikkhave, devanikaaye anekaani devataasahassaani anekaani devataasatasahassaani {anekaani devataasataani anekaani devataasahassaani (syaa0)} yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^T2.0058^ea^ .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, taa devataa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `ito so, maarisaa, ekanavutikappe ya.m vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. vipassii, maarisaa, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho khattiyo jaatiyaa ahosi, khattiyakule udapaadi. vipassii, maarisaa, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ko.n.da~n~no gottena ahosi ^a^M2.0043^ea^. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asiitivassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. vipassii, maarisaa, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho paa.taliyaa muule abhisambuddho. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa kha.n.datissa.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato ^a^P2.0051^ea^ arahato sammaasambuddhassa tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi bhikkhusatasahassa.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi asiitibhikkhusahassaani. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ime tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asoko naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. vipassissa, maarisa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa bandhumaa naama raajaa pitaa ahosi. bandhumatii naama devii maataa ahosi janetti. bandhumassa ra~n~no bandhumatii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi. vipassissa, maarisaa ^a^T2.0059^ea^, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa eva.m abhinikkhamana.m ahosi eva.m pabbajjaa eva.m padhaana.m eva.m abhisambodhi eva.m dhammacakkappavattana.m. te maya.m, maarisaa, vipassimhi bhagavati brahmacariya.m caritvaa kaamesu kaamacchanda.m viraajetvaa idhuupapannaa'ti ...pe0...

[03] ``tasmi.myeva kho, bhikkhave, devanikaaye anekaani devataasahassaani anekaani devataasatasahassaani {anekaani devataasataani anekaani devataasahassaani (syaa0 evamuparipi)} yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, taa devataa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `imasmi.myeva kho, maarisaa, bhaddakappe bhagavaa etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho loke uppanno. bhagavaa, maarisaa, khattiyo jaatiyaa khattiyakule uppanno. bhagavaa, maarisaa, gotamo gottena. bhagavato, maarisaa, appaka.m ^a^P2.0052^ea^ aayuppamaa.na.m paritta.m lahuka.m ^a^T2.0060^ea^ yo cira.m jiivati, so vassasata.m appa.m vaa bhiyyo. bhagavaa, maarisaa, assatthassa muule abhisambuddho. bhagavato, maarisaa, saariputtamoggallaana.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m ^a^M2.0044^ea^. bhagavato, maarisaa, eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani. bhagavato, maarisaa, aya.m eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi ^a^V2.0040^ea^ sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m. bhagavato, maarisaa, aanando naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. bhagavato, maarisaa, suddhodano naama raajaa pitaa ahosi. maayaa naama devii maataa ahosi janetti. kapilavatthu naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi. bhagavato, maarisaa, eva.m abhinikkhamana.m ahosi eva.m pabbajjaa eva.m padhaana.m eva.m abhisambodhi eva.m dhammacakkappavattana.m. te maya.m, maarisaa, bhagavati brahmacariya.m caritvaa kaamesu kaamacchanda.m viraajetvaa idhuupapannaa'ti.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, avihehi devehi saddhi.m yena atappaa devaa tenupasa"nkami.m...pe0... atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, avihehi ca devehi atappehi ca devehi saddhi.m yena sudassaa devaa tenupasa"nkami.m. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, avihehi ca devehi atappehi ca devehi sudassehi ca devehi saddhi.m yena sudassii devaa tenupasa"nkami.m. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, avihehi ca devehi atappehi ca devehi sudassehi ca devehi sudassiihi ca devehi saddhi.m yena akani.t.thaa devaa tenupasa"nkami.m. tasmi.m, bhikkhave, devanikaaye anekaani devataasahassaani anekaani devataasatasahassaani yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu ^a^T2.0061^ea^.

[03] ``ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, taa devataa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `ito so, maarisaa, ekanavutikappe ya.m vipassii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke udapaadi. vipassii, maarisaa, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho khattiyo jaatiyaa ahosi. khattiyakule udapaadi. vipassii, maarisaa, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ko.n.da~n~no gottena ahosi. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asiitivassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi. vipassii, maarisaa, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho paa.taliyaa muule abhisambuddho. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa kha.n.datissa.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi ^a^M2.0045^ea^ bhikkhusatasahassa.m. eko saavakaana.m sannipaato ahosi asiitibhikkhusahassaani. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ime tayo saavakaana.m sannipaataa ahesu.m sabbesa.myeva khii.naasavaana.m. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa asoko naama bhikkhu upa.t.thaako ahosi aggupa.t.thaako. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa bandhumaa naama raajaa pitaa ahosi bandhumatii naama devii maataa ahosi ^a^V2.0041^ea^ janetti. bandhumassa ra~n~no bandhumatii naama nagara.m raajadhaanii ahosi. vipassissa, maarisaa, bhagavato arahato ^a^T2.0062^ea^ sammaasambuddhassa eva.m abhinikkhamana.m ahosi eva.m pabbajjaa eva.m padhaana.m eva.m abhisambodhi, eva.m dhammacakkappavattana.m. te maya.m, maarisaa, vipassimhi bhagavati brahmacariya.m caritvaa kaamesu kaamacchanda.m viraajetvaa idhuupapannaa'ti. tasmi.myeva kho, bhikkhave, devanikaaye anekaani devataasahassaani anekaani devataasatasahassaani yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu;
