[03] 162^b^.^eb^ atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake aaraame pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m ^a^T2.0116^ea^ aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena ambapaaliyaa ga.nikaaya nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^P2.0098^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho ambapaalii ga.nikaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imaaha.m, bhante, aaraama.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa dammii''ti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa aaraama.m. atha kho bhagavaa ambapaali.m ga.nika.m dhammiyaa kathaaya ^a^V2.0077^ea^ sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. tatrapi suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharanto ambapaalivane etadeva bahula.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m karoti ^a^M2.0084^ea^ -- ``iti siila.m, iti samaadhi, iti pa~n~naa. siilaparibhaavito samaadhi mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso. samaadhiparibhaavitaa pa~n~naa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa. pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m citta.m sammadeva aasavehi vimuccati, seyyathida.m -- kaamaasavaa, bhavaasavaa, avijjaasavaa''ti.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa ambapaalivane yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena ve.luvagaamako {be.luvagaamako (sii0 pii0)} tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando ^a^T2.0117^ea^ bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena ve.luvagaamako tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa ve.luvagaamake viharati. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``etha tumhe, bhikkhave, samantaa vesaali.m yathaamitta.m yathaasandi.t.tha.m yathaasambhatta.m vassa.m upetha {upagacchatha (syaa0)}. aha.m pana idheva ve.luvagaamake vassa.m upagacchaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa samantaa vesaali.m yathaamitta.m yathaasandi.t.tha.m yathaasambhatta.m ^a^P2.0099^ea^ vassa.m upagacchi.msu. bhagavaa pana tattheva ve.luvagaamake vassa.m upagacchi.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato vassuupagatassa kharo aabaadho uppajji, baa.lhaa vedanaa vattanti maara.nantikaa. taa suda.m bhagavaa sato sampajaano adhivaasesi aviha~n~namaano. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``na kho meta.m patiruupa.m, yvaaha.m anaamantetvaa upa.t.thaake anapaloketvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m parinibbaayeyya.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m aabaadha.m viiriyena pa.tipa.naametvaa jiivitasa"nkhaara.m adhi.t.thaaya vihareyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m aabaadha.m viiriyena pa.tipa.naametvaa jiivitasa"nkhaara.m adhi.t.thaaya vihaasi. atha kho bhagavato so aabaadho pa.tipassambhi. atha kho bhagavaa gilaanaa vu.t.thito {gilaanavu.t.thito (saddaniiti)} aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa vihaaraa nikkhamma vihaarapacchaayaaya.m pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^T2.0118^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m ^a^M2.0085^ea^ etadavoca -- ``di.t.tho me, bhante, bhagavato phaasu; di.t.tha.m me, bhante, bhagavato khamaniiya.m, api ca me, bhante, madhurakajaato viya kaayo. disaapi me na pakkhaayanti; dhammaapi ma.m na pa.tibhanti bhagavato gela~n~nena, api ca me, bhante, ahosi kaacideva assaasamattaa ^a^V2.0078^ea^ -- `na taava bhagavaa parinibbaayissati, na yaava bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m aarabbha ki~ncideva udaaharatii'''ti.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m ^a^P2.0100^ea^ panaananda, bhikkhusa"ngho mayi paccaasiisati {paccaasi.msati (sii0 syaa0)}? desito, aananda, mayaa dhammo anantara.m abaahira.m karitvaa. natthaananda, tathaagatassa dhammesu aacariyamu.t.thi. yassa nuuna, aananda, evamassa -- `aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti vaa `mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho'ti vaa, so nuuna, aananda, bhikkhusa"ngha.m aarabbha ki~ncideva udaahareyya. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti vaa `mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho'ti vaa. saki.m {ki.m (sii0 pii0)}, aananda, tathaagato bhikkhusa"ngha.m aarabbha ki~ncideva udaaharissati. aha.m kho panaananda, etarahi ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. aasiitiko me vayo vattati. seyyathaapi, aananda, jajjarasaka.ta.m ve.thamissakena {ve.lumissakena (syaa0), veghamissakena (pii0), vedhamissakena, vekhamissakena (ka0)} yaapeti, evameva kho, aananda, ve.thamissakena ma~n~ne tathaagatassa kaayo yaapeti. yasmi.m, aananda, samaye tathaagato sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa ekaccaana.m vedanaana.m nirodhaa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati, phaasutaro, aananda, tasmi.m samaye tathaagatassa ^a^T2.0119^ea^ kaayo hoti. tasmaatihaananda, attadiipaa viharatha attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa. katha~ncaananda, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no? idhaananda, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati ataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, aananda, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no ^a^M2.0086^ea^. ye ^a^P2.0101^ea^ hi keci, aananda, etarahi vaa mama vaa accayena attadiipaa viharissanti attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, tamatagge me te, aananda, bhikkhuu bhavissanti ye keci sikkhaakaamaa''ti.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0079^ea^ ^a^P2.0102^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ga.nhaahi, aananda, nisiidana.m, yena caapaala.m cetiya.m {paavaala.m (cetiya.m (syaa0)} tenupasa"nkamissaama divaa vihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa nisiidana.m aadaaya bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi. atha ^a^T2.0120^ea^ kho bhagavaa yena caapaala.m cetiya.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho aanando bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``rama.niiyaa, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m gotamaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m sattamba.m {sattambaka.m (pii0)} cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m bahuputta.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m saarandada.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m caapaala.m cetiya.m. yassa ^a^P2.0103^ea^ kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano {aaka"nkhamaano (?)}, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa''ti. evampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavataa o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m; na bhagavanta.m yaaci -- ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti, yathaa ta.m maarena pariyu.t.thitacitto. dutiyampi ^a^M2.0087^ea^ kho bhagavaa...pe0... tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``rama.niiyaa, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m gotamaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m sattamba.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m bahuputta.m ^a^T2.0121^ea^ cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m saarandada.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m caapaala.m cetiya.m. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa''ti. evampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavataa o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m ^a^P2.0104^ea^; na bhagavanta.m yaaci -- ``ti.t.thatu ^a^V2.0080^ea^, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti, yathaa ta.m maarena pariyu.t.thitacitto. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``gaccha tva.m, aananda, yassadaani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ atha kho maaro paapimaa acirapakkante aayasmante aanande yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho maaro paapimaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalo ^a^T2.0122^ea^ daani, bhante, bhagavato. bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me bhikkhuu na saavakaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaanii {uttaani.m (ka0), uttaani (sii0 pii0)} karissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'ti ^a^M2.0088^ea^. etarahi kho pana, bhante, bhikkhuu bhagavato saavakaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa ^a^P2.0105^ea^ saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me bhikkhuniyo na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'ti ^a^T2.0123^ea^. etarahi kho pana, bhante, bhikkhuniyo bhagavato saavikaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo ^a^V2.0081^ea^, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me upaasakaa na saavakaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'ti. etarahi kho pana, bhante, upaasakaa bhagavato saavakaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatudaani ^a^M2.0089^ea^, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani ^a^T2.0124^ea^, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima parinibbaayissaami, yaava me upaasikaa na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'ti. etarahi kho pana, bhante, upaasikaa bhagavato saavikaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m ^a^P2.0106^ea^ uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami ^a^V2.0082^ea^, yaava me ida.m brahmacariya.m na iddha.m ceva bhavissati phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita'nti. etarahi kho pana, bhante, bhagavato brahmacariya.m iddha.m ceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m, yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani, bhante, bhagavato''ti ^a^T2.0125^ea^.

[03] eva.m vutte bhagavaa maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca -- ``appossukko tva.m, paapima, hohi, na cira.m tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m bhavissati. ito ti.n.na.m maasaana.m accayena tathaagato parinibbaayissatii''ti.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa caapaale cetiye sato sampajaano aayusa"nkhaara.m ossaji. ossa.t.the ca bhagavataa aayusa"nkhaare mahaabhuumicaalo ahosi bhi.msanako salomaha.mso {lomaha.mso (syaa0)}, devadundubhiyo {devadudrabhiyo (ka0)} ca phali.msu ^a^M2.0090^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa ^a^P2.0107^ea^ etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``tulamatula~nca sambhava.m, bhavasa"nkhaaramavassaji muni.
[22] ajjhattarato samaahito, abhindi kavacamivattasambhava''nti..

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, mahaa vataaya.m bhuumicaalo; sumahaa vataaya.m bhuumicaalo bhi.msanako salomaha.mso; devadundubhiyo ca phali.msu. ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaayaa''ti?

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante, mahaa vataaya.m, bhante, bhuumicaalo; sumahaa vataaya.m ^a^V2.0083^ea^, bhante, bhuumicaalo bhi.msanako salomaha.mso; devadundubhiyo ca phali.msu. ko nu kho, bhante ^a^T2.0126^ea^, hetu ko paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaayaa''ti?

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha kho ime, aananda, hetuu, a.t.tha paccayaa mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya. katame a.t.tha? aya.m, aananda, mahaapathavii udake pati.t.thitaa, udaka.m vaate pati.t.thita.m, vaato aakaasa.t.tho. hoti kho so, aananda, samayo, ya.m mahaavaataa vaayanti. mahaavaataa vaayantaa udaka.m kampenti. udaka.m kampita.m pathavi.m kampeti. aya.m pa.thamo ^a^P2.0108^ea^ hetu pa.thamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, sama.no vaa hoti braahma.no vaa iddhimaa cetovasippatto, devo vaa mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo, tassa parittaa pathaviisa~n~naa bhaavitaa hoti, appamaa.naa aaposa~n~naa. so ima.m pathavi.m kampeti sa"nkampeti sampakampeti sampavedheti. aya.m dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0091^ea^ capara.m, aananda, yadaa bodhisatto tusitakaayaa cavitvaa sato sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa bodhisatto sato sampajaano maatukucchismaa nikkhamati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa ^a^T2.0127^ea^ tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m pa~ncamo hetu pa~ncamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa tathaagato anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m cha.t.tho hetu cha.t.tho paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0084^ea^ capara.m, aananda, yadaa tathaagato sato sampajaano aayusa"nkhaara.m ossajjati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m sattamo hetu sattamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, yadaa tathaagato anupaadisesaaya ^a^P2.0109^ea^ nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati, tadaaya.m pathavii kampati sa"nkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. aya.m a.t.thamo hetu a.t.thamo paccayo mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaaya. ime kho, aananda, a.t.tha hetuu, a.t.tha paccayaa mahato bhuumicaalassa paatubhaavaayaa''ti.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha kho imaa, aananda, parisaa. katamaa a.t.tha? khattiyaparisaa, braahma.naparisaa, gahapatiparisaa, sama.naparisaa, caatumahaaraajikaparisaa {caatummahaaraajikaparisaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, taavati.msaparisaa, maaraparisaa, brahmaparisaa. abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, aananda ^a^M2.0092^ea^, anekasata.m khattiyaparisa.m upasa"nkamitaa. tatrapi mayaa sannisinnapubba.m ceva sallapitapubba~nca saakacchaa ca samaapajjitapubbaa ^a^T2.0128^ea^. tattha yaadisako tesa.m va.n.no hoti, taadisako mayha.m va.n.no hoti. yaadisako tesa.m saro hoti, taadisako mayha.m saro hoti. dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassemi samaadapemi samuttejemi sampaha.msemi. bhaasamaana~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu kho aya.m bhaasati devo vaa manusso vaa'ti? dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa antaradhaayaami. antarahita~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu kho aya.m antarahito devo vaa manusso vaa'ti? abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, aananda, anekasata.m braahma.naparisa.m...pe0... gahapatiparisa.m... sama.naparisa.m... caatumahaaraajikaparisa.m... taavati.msaparisa.m... maaraparisa.m... brahmaparisa.m upasa"nkamitaa. tatrapi mayaa sannisinnapubba.m ceva sallapitapubba~nca saakacchaa ca samaapajjitapubbaa. tattha yaadisako tesa.m va.n.no hoti, taadisako mayha.m va.n.no hoti. yaadisako tesa.m saro hoti, taadisako mayha.m saro hoti. dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassemi samaadapemi samuttejemi sampaha.msemi. bhaasamaana~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu kho aya.m bhaasati devo vaa manusso vaa'ti? dhammiyaa ^a^P2.0110^ea^ kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa antaradhaayaami. antarahita~nca ma.m na jaananti -- `ko nu kho aya.m antarahito devo vaa manusso vaa'ti? imaa kho, aananda, a.t.tha parisaa.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha ^a^V2.0085^ea^ kho imaani, aananda, abhibhaayatanaani. katamaani a.t.tha ^a^T2.0129^ea^? ajjhatta.m ruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m pa.thama.m abhibhaayatana.m.
[03] ``ajjhatta.m ruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m dutiya.m abhibhaayatana.m.
[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m tatiya.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m ^a^M2.0093^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m catuttha.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati niilaani niilava.n.naani niilanidassanaani niilanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama umaapuppha.m niila.m niilava.n.na.m niilanidassana.m niilanibhaasa.m. seyyathaa vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m niila.m niilava.n.na.m niilanidassana.m niilanibhaasa.m. evameva ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati niilaani niilava.n.naani niilanidassanaani niilanibhaasaani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m pa~ncama.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m ^a^P2.0111^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati piitaani piitava.n.naani piitanidassanaani piitanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama ka.nikaarapuppha.m piita.m piitava.n.na.m piitanidassana.m piitanibhaasa.m. seyyathaa ^a^T2.0130^ea^ vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m piita.m piitava.n.na.m piitanidassana.m piitanibhaasa.m. evameva ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati piitaani piitava.n.naani piitanidassanaani piitanibhaasaani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m cha.t.tha.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m ^a^V2.0086^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati lohitakaani lohitakava.n.naani lohitakanidassanaani lohitakanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama bandhujiivakapuppha.m lohitaka.m lohitakava.n.na.m lohitakanidassana.m lohitakanibhaasa.m. seyyathaa vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m lohitaka.m lohitakava.n.na.m lohitakanidassana.m lohitakanibhaasa.m. evameva ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati lohitakaani lohitakava.n.naani lohitakanidassanaani lohitakanibhaasaani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m sattama.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati odaataani odaatava.n.naani odaatanidassanaani odaatanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama osadhitaarakaa ^a^M2.0094^ea^ odaataa odaatava.n.naa odaatanidassanaa odaatanibhaasaa. seyyathaa vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m odaata.m odaatava.n.na.m odaatanidassana.m odaatanibhaasa.m. evameva ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati odaataani odaatava.n.naani odaatanidassanaani odaatanibhaasaani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m a.t.thama.m abhibhaayatana.m ^a^T2.0131^ea^. imaani kho, aananda, a.t.tha abhibhaayatanaani.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha kho ime, aananda, vimokkhaa. katame a.t.tha? ruupii ruupaani passati, aya.m pa.thamo vimokkho. ajjhatta.m ^a^P2.0112^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati, aya.m dutiyo vimokkho. subhanteva adhimutto hoti, aya.m tatiyo vimokkho. sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m catuttho vimokkho. sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m pa~ncamo vimokkho. sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m cha.t.tho vimokkho. sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m sattamo vimokkho. sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m a.t.thamo vimokkho. ime kho, aananda, a.t.tha vimokkhaa.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m ^a^V2.0087^ea^, aananda, samaya.m uruvelaaya.m viharaami najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha kho, aananda, maaro paapimaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, aananda, maaro paapimaa ma.m ^a^T2.0132^ea^ etadavoca -- `parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa; parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani, bhante, bhagavato'ti. eva.m vutte aha.m, aananda, maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca.m --

[03] ```na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me bhikkhuu na saavakaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa ^a^M2.0095^ea^ saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti ^a^P2.0113^ea^ vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessanti.

[01] ```na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me bhikkhuniyo na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena ^a^T2.0133^ea^ suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessanti.

[03] ```na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me upaasakaa na saavakaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarino, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessanti.

[01] ```na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me upaasikaa na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo, saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti, uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessanti.

[03] ```na ^a^V2.0088^ea^ taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami, yaava me ida.m brahmacariya.m na iddha~nceva bhavissati phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita'nti.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ ``idaaneva kho, aananda, ajja caapaale cetiye maaro paapimaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, aananda, maaro paapimaa ma.m etadavoca -- `parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani, bhante, bhagavato. bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- ``na taavaaha.m, paapima ^a^M2.0096^ea^, parinibbaayissaami ^a^P2.0114^ea^, yaava me bhikkhuu na saavakaa bhavissanti...pe0... yaava me bhikkhuniyo na saavikaa bhavissanti...pe0... yaava me upaasakaa na saavakaa bhavissanti...pe0... yaava me upaasikaa na saavikaa bhavissanti...pe0... yaava me ida.m brahmacariya.m na iddha~nceva bhavissati phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m, yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita''nti. etarahi kho pana, bhante, bhagavato brahmacariya.m ^a^T2.0134^ea^ iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m, yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. parinibbaatudaani, bhante, bhagavaa, parinibbaatu sugato, parinibbaanakaalodaani, bhante, bhagavato'ti.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, aananda, maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca.m -- `appossukko tva.m, paapima, hohi, nacira.m tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m bhavissati. ito ti.n.na.m maasaana.m accayena tathaagato parinibbaayissatii'ti. idaaneva kho, aananda, ajja caapaale cetiye tathaagatena satena sampajaanena aayusa"nkhaaro ossa.t.tho''ti.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P2.0115^ea^ vutte aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti.

[03] ``ala.mdaani, aananda. maa tathaagata.m yaaci, akaalodaani, aananda, tathaagata.m yaacanaayaa''ti. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti.

[03] ``saddahasi ^a^V2.0089^ea^ tva.m, aananda, tathaagatassa bodhi''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``atha ki~ncarahi tva.m, aananda, tathaagata.m yaavatatiyaka.m abhinippii.lesii''ti? ``sammukhaa meta.m, bhante, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano ^a^T2.0135^ea^ kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. so ^a^M2.0097^ea^ aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa'''ti. ``saddahasi tva.m, aanandaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``tasmaatihaananda, tuyheveta.m dukka.ta.m, tuyheveta.m aparaddha.m, ya.m tva.m tathaagatena eva.m o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m, na tathaagata.m yaaci -- `ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti. sace tva.m, aananda, tathaagata.m yaaceyyaasi, dveva te vaacaa tathaagato pa.tikkhipeyya, atha tatiyaka.m adhivaaseyya. tasmaatihaananda, tuyheveta.m dukka.ta.m, tuyheveta.m aparaddha.m.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, aananda, samaya.m raajagahe viharaami gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tatraapi kho taaha.m, aananda, aamantesi.m ^a^P2.0116^ea^ -- `rama.niiya.m, aananda, raajagaha.m, rama.niiyo, aananda, gijjhakuu.to pabbato. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya ^a^T2.0136^ea^ kappaavasesa.m vaa'ti. evampi kho tva.m, aananda, tathaagatena o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m, na tathaagata.m yaaci -- `ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. sace tva.m, aananda, tathaagata.m yaaceyyaasi, dve te vaacaa tathaagato pa.tikkhipeyya, atha tatiyaka.m adhivaaseyya. tasmaatihaananda, tuyheveta.m dukka.ta.m, tuyheveta.m aparaddha.m.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, aananda, samaya.m tattheva raajagahe viharaami gotamanigrodhe...pe0... tattheva raajagahe viharaami corapapaate... tattheva raajagahe viharaami vebhaarapasse sattapa.n.niguhaaya.m... tattheva raajagahe viharaami isigilipasse kaa.lasilaaya.m... tattheva raajagahe viharaami ^a^V2.0090^ea^ siitavane sappaso.n.dikapabbhaare... tattheva raajagahe viharaami tapodaaraame... tattheva raajagahe viharaami ve.luvane kalandakanivaape... tattheva raajagahe viharaami jiivakambavane... tattheva raajagahe viharaami maddakucchismi.m migadaaye ^a^M2.0098^ea^ tatraapi kho taaha.m, aananda, aamantesi.m -- `rama.niiya.m, aananda, raajagaha.m, rama.niiyo gijjhakuu.to pabbato, rama.niiyo gotamanigrodho, rama.niiyo corapapaato, rama.niiyaa vebhaarapasse sattapa.n.niguhaa, rama.niiyaa isigilipasse kaa.lasilaa, rama.niiyo siitavane sappaso.n.dikapabbhaaro ^a^P2.0117^ea^, rama.niiyo tapodaaraamo, rama.niiyo ve.luvane ^a^T2.0137^ea^ kalandakanivaapo, rama.niiya.m jiivakambavana.m, rama.niiyo maddakucchismi.m migadaayo. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa...pe0... aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa'ti. evampi kho tva.m, aananda, tathaagatena o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m, na tathaagata.m yaaci -- `ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. sace tva.m, aananda, tathaagata.m yaaceyyaasi, dveva te vaacaa tathaagato pa.tikkhipeyya, atha tatiyaka.m adhivaaseyya. tasmaatihaananda, tuyheveta.m dukka.ta.m, tuyheveta.m aparaddha.m.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, aananda, samaya.m idheva vesaaliya.m viharaami udene cetiye. tatraapi kho taaha.m, aananda, aamantesi.m -- `rama.niiyaa, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa ^a^T2.0138^ea^ bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa'ti. evampi kho tva.m, aananda, tathaagatena o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m, na tathaagata.m yaaci -- `ti.t.thatu, bhante, bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. sace tva.m, aananda, tathaagata.m yaaceyyaasi, dveva te vaacaa tathaagato pa.tikkhipeyya, atha tatiyaka.m adhivaaseyya, tasmaatihaananda, tuyheveta.m dukka.ta.m, tuyheveta.m aparaddha.m.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m ^a^M2.0099^ea^ ^a^P2.0118^ea^, aananda, samaya.m idheva vesaaliya.m viharaami gotamake cetiye ^a^V2.0091^ea^ ...pe0... idheva vesaaliya.m viharaami sattambe cetiye... idheva vesaaliya.m viharaami bahuputte cetiye... idheva vesaaliya.m viharaami saarandade cetiye... idaaneva kho taaha.m, aananda, ajja caapaale cetiye aamantesi.m -- `rama.niiyaa, aananda, vesaalii, rama.niiya.m udena.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m gotamaka.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m sattamba.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m bahuputta.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m saarandada.m cetiya.m, rama.niiya.m caapaala.m cetiya.m. yassa kassaci, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa ^a^T2.0139^ea^ anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. tathaagatassa kho, aananda, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, so aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, tathaagato kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa'ti. evampi kho tva.m, aananda, tathaagatena o.laarike nimitte kayiramaane o.laarike obhaase kayiramaane naasakkhi pa.tivijjhitu.m, na tathaagata.m yaaci -- `ti.t.thatu bhagavaa kappa.m, ti.t.thatu sugato kappa.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. sace tva.m, aananda, tathaagata.m yaaceyyaasi, dveva te vaacaa tathaagato pa.tikkhipeyya, atha tatiyaka.m adhivaaseyya. tasmaatihaananda, tuyheveta.m dukka.ta.m, tuyheveta.m aparaddha.m.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``nanu eta.m {eva.m (syaa0 pii0)}, aananda, mayaa pa.tikacceva {pa.tigacceva (sii0 pii0)} akkhaata.m -- `sabbeheva piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo a~n~nathaabhaavo. ta.m kutettha, aananda, labbhaa, ya.m ta.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m palokadhamma.m, ta.m vata maa palujjiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati'. ya.m kho paneta.m, aananda, tathaagatena catta.m vanta.m mutta.m pahiina.m pa.tinissa.t.tha.m ossa.t.tho aayusa"nkhaaro, eka.msena vaacaa bhaasitaa -- `na cira.m tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m ^a^P2.0119^ea^ bhavissati. ito ti.n.na.m maasaana.m accayena tathaagato parinibbaayissatii'ti. ta~nca {ta.m vacana.m (sii0)} tathaagato jiivitahetu puna paccaavamissatiiti {paccaagamissatiiti (syaa0 ka0)} neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. aayaamaananda, yena mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho ^a^M2.0100^ea^ aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa ^a^T2.0140^ea^ aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m yena mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``gaccha tva.m, aananda, yaavatikaa bhikkhuu vesaali.m upanissaaya viharanti, te sabbe upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannipaatehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yaavatikaa bhikkhuu vesaali.m upanissaaya viharanti, te sabbe upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannipaatetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^V2.0092^ea^ -- ``sannipatito, bhante, bhikkhusa"ngho, yassadaani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ye te mayaa dhammaa abhi~n~naa desitaa, te vo saadhuka.m uggahetvaa aasevitabbaa bhaavetabbaa bahuliikaatabbaa, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m, tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame ca te, bhikkhave, dhammaa mayaa abhi~n~naa desitaa, ye vo saadhuka.m uggahetvaa aasevitabbaa bhaavetabbaa bahuliikaatabbaa, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m ^a^P2.0120^ea^ addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m, tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya ^a^T2.0141^ea^ devamanussaana.m. seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. ime kho te, bhikkhave, dhammaa mayaa abhi~n~naa desitaa, ye vo saadhuka.m uggahetvaa aasevitabbaa bhaavetabbaa bahuliikaatabbaa, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m, tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``handadaani, bhikkhave, aamantayaami vo, vayadhammaa sa"nkhaaraa, appamaadena sampaadetha. nacira.m tathaagatassa ^a^M2.0101^ea^ parinibbaana.m bhavissati. ito ti.n.na.m maasaana.m accayena tathaagato parinibbaayissatii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa {ito para.m syaamapotthake eva.mpi paa.tho dissati --
[03] daharaapi ca ye vuddhaa, ye baalaa ye ca pa.n.ditaa..
[03] a.d.dhaaceva daliddaa ca, sabbe maccuparaayanaa.
[03] yathaapi kumbhakaarassa, kata.m mattikabhaajana.m..
[03] khuddaka~nca mahanta~nca, ya~nca pakka.m ya~nca aamaka.m.
[03] sabba.m bhedapariyanta.m, eva.m maccaana jiivita.m..
[03] athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa}. --
[21] ``paripakko ^a^T2.0142^ea^ vayo mayha.m, paritta.m mama jiivita.m.
[22] pahaaya vo gamissaami, kata.m me sara.namattano..
[21] ``appamattaa satiimanto, susiilaa hotha bhikkhavo.
[22] susamaahitasa"nkappaa, sacittamanurakkhatha..
[21] ``yo ^a^V2.0093^ea^ ^a^P2.0121^ea^ imasmi.m dhammavinaye, appamatto vihassati.
[22] pahaaya jaatisa.msaara.m, dukkhassanta.m karissatii''ti {viharissati (syaa0), vihessati (sii0)}..
[06] tatiyo bhaa.navaaro.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P2.0122^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto naagaapalokita.m vesaali.m apaloketvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ida.m pacchimaka.m, aananda, tathaagatassa vesaaliyaa dassana.m bhavissati. aayaamaananda, yena bha.n.dagaamo {bha.n.dugaamo (ka0)} tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0102^ea^ kho bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena bha.n.dagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa bha.n.dagaame viharati. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``catunna.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. katamesa.m catunna.m? ariyassa, bhikkhave, siilassa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama.m ceva tumhaaka~nca. ariyassa, bhikkhave, samaadhissa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m ^a^T2.0143^ea^ mama.m ceva tumhaaka~nca. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, pa~n~naaya ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama.m ceva tumhaaka~nca. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, vimuttiyaa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama.m ceva tumhaaka~nca. tayida.m, bhikkhave, ariya.m siila.m anubuddha.m ^a^P2.0123^ea^ pa.tividdha.m, ariyo samaadhi anubuddho pa.tividdho, ariyaa pa~n~naa anubuddhaa pa.tividdhaa, ariyaa vimutti anubuddhaa pa.tividdhaa, ucchinnaa bhavata.nhaa, khii.naa bhavanetti, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``siila.m samaadhi pa~n~naa ca, vimutti ca anuttaraa.
[22] anubuddhaa ime dhammaa, gotamena yasassinaa..
[21] ``iti ^a^V2.0094^ea^ buddho abhi~n~naaya, dhammamakkhaasi bhikkhuna.m.
[22] dukkhassantakaro satthaa, cakkhumaa parinibbuto''ti..

[03] tatraapi suda.m bhagavaa bha.n.dagaame viharanto etadeva bahula.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m karoti -- ``iti siila.m, iti samaadhi, iti pa~n~naa. siilaparibhaavito samaadhi mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso. samaadhiparibhaavitaa pa~n~naa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa. pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m citta.m sammadeva aasavehi vimuccati, seyyathida.m -- kaamaasavaa, bhavaasavaa, avijjaasavaa''ti.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0144^ea^ kho bhagavaa bha.n.dagaame yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena hatthigaamo, yena ambagaamo, yena jambugaamo, yena bhoganagara.m tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho ^a^M2.0103^ea^ bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena bhoganagara.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa bhoganagare viharati aanande {saanandare (ka0)} cetiye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, mahaapadese desessaami, ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P2.0124^ea^, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m, aya.m dhammo aya.m vinayo ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte osaaretabbaani {otaaretabbaani}, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte osaariyamaanaani {otaariyamaanaani} vinaye sandassiyamaanaani na ceva sutte osaranti {otaranti (sii0 pii0 a0 ni0 4.180}, na ca vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m; imassa ca bhikkhuno duggahita'nti. itiheta.m, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha. taani ce sutte osaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani sutte ceva ^a^T2.0145^ea^ osaranti, vinaye ca sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m; imassa ca bhikkhuno suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha.

[03] ``idha ^a^V2.0095^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `amukasmi.m naama aavaase sa"ngho viharati sathero sapaamokkho. tassa me sa"nghassa sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa ^a^T2.0146^ea^ pa.tiggahita.m, aya.m dhammo aya.m vinayo ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte osaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte osaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani na ceva sutte osaranti, na ca vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m; tassa ca sa"nghassa duggahita'nti. itiheta.m, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha. taani ce sutte osaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani sutte ceva ^a^M2.0104^ea^ osaranti vinaye ca sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa ^a^P2.0125^ea^, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m; tassa ca sa"nghassa suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `amukasmi.m naama aavaase sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu viharanti bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa. tesa.m me theraana.m sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo aya.m vinayo ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m...pe0... na ca vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m; tesa~nca theraana.m duggahita'nti. itiheta.m, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha. taani ce sutte osaariyamaanaani...pe0... vinaye ca sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m; tesa~nca theraana.m suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `amukasmi.m naama aavaase eko thero bhikkhu viharati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo. tassa me therassa sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo aya.m vinayo ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte osaaritabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte osaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani na ceva sutte osaranti, na ca vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m; tassa ca therassa duggahita'nti. itiheta.m, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha. taani ca sutte osaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani sutte ceva osaranti, vinaye ca sandissanti ^a^V2.0096^ea^, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa ^a^P2.0126^ea^, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m; tassa ca therassa suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro mahaapadese dhaareyyaathaa''ti.

[03] tatrapi suda.m bhagavaa bhoganagare viharanto ^a^T2.0147^ea^ aanande cetiye etadeva bahula.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammi.m katha.m karoti -- ``iti siila.m, iti samaadhi, iti pa~n~naa. siilaparibhaavito samaadhi mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso ^a^M2.0105^ea^. samaadhiparibhaavitaa pa~n~naa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa. pa~n~naaparibhaavita.m citta.m sammadeva aasavehi vimuccati, seyyathida.m -- kaamaasavaa, bhavaasavaa, avijjaasavaa''ti.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhoganagare yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena paavaa tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena paavaa tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa paavaaya.m viharati cundassa kammaaraputtassa ambavane. assosi kho cundo kammaaraputto -- ``bhagavaa kira paava.m anuppatto, paavaaya.m viharati mayha.m ambavane''ti. atha kho cundo kammaaraputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho cunda.m kammaaraputta.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavato adhivaasana.m ^a^P2.0127^ea^ viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa ^a^T2.0148^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho cundo kammaaraputto tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa pahuuta~nca suukaramaddava.m bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena cundassa kammaaraputtassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa cunda.m kammaaraputta.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m te, cunda, suukaramaddava.m pa.tiyatta.m, tena ma.m parivisa. ya.m pana~n~na.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m, tena bhikkhusa"ngha.m ^a^V2.0097^ea^ parivisaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ya.m ahosi suukaramaddava.m pa.tiyatta.m, tena bhagavanta.m parivisi. ya.m pana~n~na.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m ^a^M2.0106^ea^, tena bhikkhusa"ngha.m parivisi. atha kho bhagavaa cunda.m kammaaraputta.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m te, cunda, suukaramaddava.m avasi.t.tha.m, ta.m sobbhe nikha.naahi. naaha.m ta.m, cunda, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yassa ta.m paribhutta.m sammaa pari.naama.m gaccheyya a~n~natra tathaagatassaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ya.m ahosi suukaramaddava.m avasi.t.tha.m, ta.m sobbhe nikha.nitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m ^a^T2.0149^ea^ kho cunda.m kammaaraputta.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato cundassa kammaaraputtassa bhatta.m bhuttaavissa kharo aabaadho uppajji, lohitapakkhandikaa pabaa.lhaa vedanaa vattanti maara.nantikaa. taa suda.m ^a^P2.0128^ea^ bhagavaa sato sampajaano adhivaasesi aviha~n~namaano. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena kusinaaraa tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi.
[21] cundassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa, kammaarassaati me suta.m.
[22] aabaadha.m samphusii dhiiro, pabaa.lha.m maara.nantika.m..
[21] bhuttassa ca suukaramaddavena,
[27] byaadhippabaa.lho udapaadi satthuno.
[26] virecamaano {viriccamaano (sii0 syaa0 ka0), viri~ncamaano (?)} bhagavaa avoca,
[22] gacchaamaha.m kusinaara.m nagaranti..

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma yena a~n~natara.m rukkhamuula.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, aananda, catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napehi, kilantosmi, aananda, nisiidissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando ^a^V2.0098^ea^ bhagavato pa.tissutvaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napesi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m ^a^T2.0150^ea^ ^a^M2.0107^ea^ aananda.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, aananda, paaniiya.m aahara, pipaasitosmi, aananda, pivissaamii''ti. eva.m vutte aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idaani, bhante, pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani atikkantaani, ta.m cakkacchinna.m udaka.m paritta.m lu.lita.m aavila.m sandati. aya.m, bhante, kakudhaa {kakuthaa (sii0 pii0)} nadii aviduure acchodakaa saatodakaa ^a^P2.0129^ea^ siitodakaa setodakaa {setakaa (sii0)} suppatitthaa rama.niiyaa. ettha bhagavaa paaniiya~nca pivissati, gattaani ca siitii {siita.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} karissatii''ti.

[03] dutiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, aananda, paaniiya.m aahara, pipaasitosmi, aananda, pivissaamii''ti. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idaani, bhante, pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani atikkantaani, ta.m cakkacchinna.m udaka.m paritta.m lu.lita.m aavila.m sandati. aya.m, bhante, kakudhaa nadii aviduure acchodakaa saatodakaa siitodakaa setodakaa suppatitthaa rama.niiyaa. ettha bhagavaa paaniiya~nca pivissati, gattaani ca siitiikarissatii''ti.

[03] tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, aananda, paaniiya.m aahara, pipaasitosmi, aananda, pivissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ^a^T2.0151^ea^ patta.m gahetvaa yena saa nadikaa tenupasa"nkami. atha kho saa nadikaa cakkacchinnaa parittaa lu.litaa aavilaa sandamaanaa, aayasmante aanande upasa"nkamante acchaa vippasannaa anaavilaa sandittha {sandati (syaa0)}. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa. aya~nhi saa nadikaa cakkacchinnaa parittaa lu.litaa aavilaa sandamaanaa mayi upasa"nkamante acchaa vippasannaa anaavilaa sandatii''ti. pattena paaniiya.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa. idaani saa bhante nadikaa cakkacchinnaa parittaa lu.litaa aavilaa sandamaanaa mayi upasa"nkamante acchaa vippasannaa anaavilaa sandittha. pivatu bhagavaa paaniiya.m pivatu sugato paaniiya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa paaniiya.m apaayi.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M2.0108^ea^ ^a^V2.0099^ea^ ^a^P2.0130^ea^ rokho pana samayena pukkuso mallaputto aa.laarassa kaalaamassa saavako kusinaaraaya paava.m addhaanamaggappa.tippanno hoti. addasaa kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m. disvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante, santena vata, bhante, pabbajitaa vihaarena viharanti. bhuutapubba.m, bhante ^a^T2.0152^ea^, aa.laaro kaalaamo addhaanamaggappa.tippanno maggaa okkamma aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho, bhante, pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani aa.laara.m kaalaama.m nissaaya nissaaya atikkami.msu. atha kho, bhante, a~n~nataro puriso tassa saka.tasatthassa {saka.tasatassa (ka0)} pi.t.thito pi.t.thito aagacchanto yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca -- `api, bhante, pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani atikkantaani addasaa'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, addasa'nti. `ki.m pana, bhante, sadda.m assosii'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, sadda.m assosi'nti. `ki.m pana, bhante, sutto ahosii'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, sutto ahosi'nti. `ki.m pana, bhante, sa~n~nii ahosii'ti? `evamaavuso'ti. `so tva.m, bhante, sa~n~nii samaano jaagaro pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani nissaaya nissaaya atikkantaani neva addasa, na pana sadda.m assosi; apisu {api hi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} te, bhante, sa"nghaa.ti rajena oki.n.naa'ti? `evamaavuso'ti. atha kho, bhante, tassa purisassa etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajitaa vihaarena viharanti. yatra hi naama sa~n~nii samaano ^a^P2.0131^ea^ jaagaro pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani nissaaya nissaaya atikkantaani neva dakkhati, na pana sadda.m sossatii'ti! aa.laare kaalaame u.laara.m pasaada.m pavedetvaa pakkaamii''ti.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, pukkusa, katama.m nu kho dukkaratara.m vaa durabhisambhavatara.m vaa -- yo vaa sa~n~nii samaano jaagaro pa~ncamattaani ^a^T2.0153^ea^ saka.tasataani nissaaya nissaaya atikkantaani neva passeyya, na pana sadda.m ^a^M2.0109^ea^ su.neyya; yo vaa sa~n~nii samaano jaagaro deve vassante deve ga.laga.laayante vijjullataasu {vijjutaasu (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} niccharantiisu asaniyaa phalantiyaa neva passeyya, na pana sadda.m su.neyyaa''ti? ``ki~nhi, bhante, karissanti pa~nca vaa saka.tasataani cha vaa saka.tasataani satta vaa saka.tasataani a.t.tha vaa saka.tasataani nava vaa saka.tasataani {nava vaa saka.tasataani dasa vaa saka.tasataani (sii0)}, saka.tasahassa.m vaa saka.tasatasahassa.m vaa. atha kho etadeva dukkaratara.m ceva durabhisambhavatara~nca yo ^a^V2.0100^ea^ sa~n~nii samaano jaagaro deve vassante deve ga.laga.laayante vijjullataasu niccharantiisu asaniyaa phalantiyaa neva passeyya, na pana sadda.m su.neyyaa''ti.

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m, pukkusa, samaya.m aatumaaya.m viharaami bhusaagaare. tena kho pana samayena deve vassante deve ga.laga.laayante vijjullataasu niccharantiisu asaniyaa phalantiyaa aviduure bhusaagaarassa dve kassakaa bhaataro hataa cattaaro ca balibaddaa {balibaddaa (sii0 pii0)}. atha kho, pukkusa, aatumaaya mahaajanakaayo nikkhamitvaa yena te dve kassakaa bhaataro hataa cattaaro ca balibaddaa tenupasa"nkami. tena kho panaaha.m, pukkusa, samayena bhusaagaaraa nikkhamitvaa bhusaagaaradvaare abbhokaase ca"nkamaami. atha kho, pukkusa, a~n~nataro puriso tamhaa mahaajanakaayaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m ^a^T2.0154^ea^ .thita.m kho aha.m, pukkusa, ta.m purisa.m etadavoca.m -- `ki.m nu kho eso, aavuso, mahaajanakaayo sannipatito'ti? `idaani ^a^P2.0132^ea^, bhante, deve vassante deve ga.laga.laayante vijjullataasu niccharantiisu asaniyaa phalantiyaa dve kassakaa bhaataro hataa cattaaro ca balibaddaa. ettheso mahaajanakaayo sannipatito. tva.m pana, bhante, kva ahosii'ti? `idheva kho aha.m, aavuso, ahosi'nti. `ki.m pana, bhante, addasaa'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, addasa'nti. `ki.m pana, bhante, sadda.m assosii'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, sadda.m assosi'nti. `ki.m pana, bhante, sutto ahosii'ti? `na kho aha.m, aavuso, sutto ahosi'nti. `ki.m pana, bhante, sa~n~nii ahosii'ti? `evamaavuso'ti. `so tva.m, bhante, sa~n~nii samaano jaagaro deve vassante deve ga.laga.laayante ^a^M2.0110^ea^ vijjullataasu niccharantiisu asaniyaa phalantiyaa neva addasa, na pana sadda.m assosii'ti? ``evamaavuso''ti?

[03] ``atha kho, pukkusa, purisassa etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajitaa vihaarena viharanti. yatra hi naama sa~n~nii samaano jaagaro deve vassante deve ga.laga.laayante vijjullataasu niccharantiisu asaniyaa phalantiyaa neva dakkhati, na pana sadda.m sossatii'ti {su.nissati (syaa0)}. mayi u.laara.m pasaada.m pavedetvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaamii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte pukkuso mallaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``esaaha.m, bhante, yo me aa.laare kaalaame pasaado ta.m mahaavaate vaa ophu.naami siighasotaaya ^a^T2.0155^ea^ {si"nghasotaaya (ka0)} vaa nadiyaa pavaahemi. abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m ^a^V2.0101^ea^ vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca ^a^P2.0133^ea^ bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ atha kho pukkuso mallaputto a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, bha.ne, si"ngiiva.n.na.m yugama.t.tha.m dhaara.niiya.m aaharaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so puriso pukkusassa mallaputtassa pa.tissutvaa ta.m si"ngiiva.n.na.m yugama.t.tha.m dhaara.niiya.m aahari {aaharasi (ka0)}. atha kho pukkuso mallaputto ta.m si"ngiiva.n.na.m yugama.t.tha.m dhaara.niiya.m bhagavato upanaamesi -- ``ida.m, bhante, si"ngiiva.n.na.m yugama.t.tha.m dhaara.niiya.m, ta.m me bhagavaa pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. ``tena hi, pukkusa, ekena ma.m acchaadehi, ekena aananda''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ekena bhagavanta.m acchaadeti, ekena aayasmanta.m aananda.m. atha kho bhagavaa pukkusa.m mallaputta.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0156^ea^ ^a^M2.0111^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando acirapakkante pukkuse mallaputte ta.m si"ngiiva.n.na.m yugama.t.tha.m dhaara.niiya.m bhagavato kaaya.m upanaamesi. ta.m bhagavato kaaya.m upanaamita.m hataccika.m viya {viitaccika.mviya (sii0 pii0)} khaayati. atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante, yaava parisuddho, bhante, tathaagatassa chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. ida.m, bhante, si"ngiiva.n.na.m yugama.t.tha.m dhaara.niiya.m bhagavato ^a^P2.0134^ea^ kaaya.m upanaamita.m hataccika.m viya khaayatii''ti. ``evameta.m, aananda, evameta.m, aananda dviisu kaalesu ativiya tathaagatassa kaayo parisuddho hoti chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. katamesu dviisu? ya~nca, aananda, ratti.m tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, ya~nca ratti.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati. imesu kho, aananda, dviisu kaalesu ativiya tathaagatassa kaayo parisuddho hoti chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. ``ajja kho, panaananda, rattiyaa pacchime yaame kusinaaraaya.m upavattane mallaana.m saalavane antarena {antare (syaa0)} yamakasaalaana.m tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m bhavissati {bhavissatiiti (ka0)}. aayaamaananda, yena kakudhaa nadii tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi.
[21] si"ngiiva.n.na.m ^a^V2.0102^ea^ yugama.t.tha.m, pukkuso abhihaarayi.
[22] tena acchaadito satthaa, hemava.n.no asobhathaati..

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena kakudhaa nadii tenupasa"nkami ^a^T2.0157^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa kakudha.m nadi.m ajjhogaahetvaa nhatvaa ca pivitvaa ca paccuttaritvaa yena ambavana.m tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m cundaka.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, cundaka, catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napehi, kilantosmi, cundaka, nipajjissaamii''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa cundako bhagavato pa.tissutvaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napesi. atha kho bhagavaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m ^a^P2.0135^ea^ manasikaritvaa. aayasmaa pana cundako tattheva bhagavato purato nisiidi.
[21] gantvaana ^a^M2.0112^ea^ buddho nadika.m kakudha.m,
[27] acchodaka.m saatudaka.m vippasanna.m.
[26] ogaahi satthaa akilantaruupo {sukilantaruupo (sii0 pii0)},
[22] tathaagato appa.timo ca {appa.timodha (pii0)} loke..
[21] nhatvaa ca pivitvaa cudataari satthaa {pivitvaa cundakena, pivitvaa ca uttari (ka0)},
[27] purakkhato bhikkhuga.nassa majjhe.
[26] vattaa {satthaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pavattaa bhagavaa idha dhamme,
[22] upaagami ambavana.m mahesi..
[21] aamantayi cundaka.m naama bhikkhu.m,
[27] catuggu.na.m ^a^T2.0158^ea^ santhara me nipajja.m.
[26] so codito bhaavitattena cundo,
[22] catuggu.na.m santhari khippameva..
[21] nipajji satthaa akilantaruupo,
[22] cundopi tattha pamukhe {samukhe (ka0)} nisiidiiti..

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``siyaa kho {yo kho (ka0)}, panaananda, cundassa ^a^V2.0103^ea^ kammaaraputtassa koci vippa.tisaara.m uppaadeyya -- `tassa te, aavuso cunda, alaabhaa tassa te dulladdha.m, yassa te tathaagato pacchima.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa parinibbuto'ti. cundassa, aananda, kammaaraputtassa eva.m vippa.tisaaro pa.tivinetabbo -- `tassa te, aavuso cunda, laabhaa tassa te suladdha.m, yassa te tathaagato pacchima.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa parinibbuto. sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso cunda, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- dve me pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa ^a^P2.0136^ea^ {samaa samaphalaa (ka0)} samavipaakaa {samasamavipaakaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa ca. katame dve? ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa tathaagato anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati. ime dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ^a^M2.0113^ea^, ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa ca. aayusa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, va.n.nasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, sukhasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, yasasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, saggasa.mvattanika.m ^a^T2.0159^ea^ aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, aadhipateyyasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita'nti. cundassa, aananda, kammaaraputtassa eva.m vippa.tisaaro pa.tivinetabbo''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``dadato pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati,
[27] sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati.
[26] kusalo ca jahaati paapaka.m,
[22] raagadosamohakkhayaa sanibbuto''ti..
[06] catuttho bhaa.navaaro.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P2.0137^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena hira~n~navatiyaa nadiyaa paarima.m tiira.m, yena kusinaaraa upavattana.m mallaana.m saalavana.m tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti ^a^V2.0104^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena hira~n~navatiyaa nadiyaa paarima.m tiira.m, yena kusinaaraa upavattana.m mallaana.m saalavana.m tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, aananda, antarena yamakasaalaana.m uttarasiisaka.m ma~ncaka.m pa~n~napehi, kilantosmi, aananda, nipajjissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa antarena yamakasaalaana.m uttarasiisaka.m ma~ncaka.m pa~n~napesi. atha kho bhagavaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi paade ^a^T2.0160^ea^ paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano.

[03] tena ^a^M2.0114^ea^ kho pana samayena yamakasaalaa sabbaphaaliphullaa honti akaalapupphehi. te tathaagatassa sariira.m okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi mandaaravapupphaani antalikkhaa papatanti, taani tathaagatassa sariira.m okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi candanacu.n.naani antalikkhaa papatanti, taani tathaagatassa sariira.m okiranti ^a^P2.0138^ea^ ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi tuuriyaani antalikkhe vajjanti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi sa"ngiitaani antalikkhe vattanti tathaagatassa puujaaya.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``sabbaphaaliphullaa kho, aananda, yamakasaalaa akaalapupphehi. te tathaagatassa sariira.m okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi mandaaravapupphaani antalikkhaa papatanti, taani tathaagatassa sariira.m okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi candanacu.n.naani antalikkhaa papatanti, taani tathaagatassa sariira.m okiranti ajjhokiranti abhippakiranti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi tuuriyaani antalikkhe vajjanti tathaagatassa puujaaya. dibbaanipi sa"ngiitaani antalikkhe vattanti tathaagatassa puujaaya. na kho, aananda, ettaavataa tathaagato sakkato vaa hoti garukato vaa maanito vaa puujito vaa apacito vaa. yo kho, aananda, bhikkhu ^a^T2.0161^ea^ vaa bhikkhunii vaa upaasako vaa upaasikaa vaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharati saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, so tathaagata.m sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti apaciyati {ida.m pada.m siisyaaipotthakesu na dissati}, paramaaya puujaaya. tasmaatihaananda, dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa viharissaama saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaarinoti. eva~nhi vo, aananda, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V2.0105^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa upavaa.no bhagavato purato .thito hoti bhagavanta.m biijayamaano. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m apasaaresi -- ``apehi, bhikkhu, maa me purato a.t.thaasii''ti. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho ^a^M2.0115^ea^ aayasmaa ^a^P2.0139^ea^ upavaa.no diigharatta.m bhagavato upa.t.thaako santikaavacaro samiipacaarii. atha ca pana bhagavaa pacchime kaale aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m apasaareti -- `apehi bhikkhu, maa me purato a.t.thaasii'ti. ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo, ya.m bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m apasaareti -- `apehi, bhikkhu, maa me purato a.t.thaasii'ti? atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `aya.m, bhante, aayasmaa upavaa.no diigharatta.m bhagavato upa.t.thaako santikaavacaro samiipacaarii. atha ca pana bhagavaa pacchime kaale aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m apasaareti -- ``apehi, bhikkhu, maa me purato a.t.thaasii''ti. ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, ya.m bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m apasaareti -- ``apehi, bhikkhu, maa me purato a.t.thaasii''ti? ``yebhuyyena, aananda, dasasu lokadhaatuusu devataa sannipatitaa ^a^T2.0162^ea^ tathaagata.m dassanaaya. yaavataa, aananda, kusinaaraa upavattana.m mallaana.m saalavana.m samantato dvaadasa yojanaani, natthi so padeso vaalaggako.tinitudanamattopi mahesakkhaahi devataahi apphu.to. devataa, aananda, ujjhaayanti -- `duuraa ca vatamha aagataa tathaagata.m dassanaaya. kadaaci karahaci tathaagataa loke uppajjanti arahanto sammaasambuddhaa. ajjeva rattiyaa pacchime yaame tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m bhavissati. aya~nca mahesakkho bhikkhu bhagavato purato .thito ovaarento, na maya.m labhaama pacchime kaale tathaagata.m dassanaayaa'''ti.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ``katha.mbhuutaa pana, bhante, bhagavaa devataa manasikarotii''ti {manasi karontiiti (syaa0 ka0)}? ``santaananda, devataa aakaase pathaviisa~n~niniyo kese pakiriya kandanti, baahaa paggayha kandanti, chinnapaata.m papatanti {chinna.mpaada.mviya papatanti (syaa0)}, aava.t.tanti, viva.t.tanti -- `atikhippa.m bhagavaa parinibbaayissati, atikhippa.m sugato parinibbaayissati, atikhippa.m cakkhu.m {cakkhumaa (syaa0 ka0)} loke antaradh.maayissatii'ti.

[03] ``santaananda, devataa pathaviya.m pathaviisa~n~niniyo kese pakiriya kandanti, baahaa paggayha kandanti, chinnapaata.m ^a^P2.0140^ea^ papatanti, aava.t.tanti, viva.t.tanti -- `atikhippa.m bhagavaa parinibbaayissati, atikhippa.m sugato parinibbaayissati, atikhippa.m cakkhu.m loke antaradhaayissatii'''ti.
[03] ``yaa ^a^M2.0116^ea^ ^a^V2.0106^ea^ pana taa devataa viitaraagaa, taa sataa sampajaanaa adhivaasenti -- `aniccaa sa"nkhaaraa, ta.m kutettha labbhaa'ti.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ``pubbe ^a^T2.0163^ea^, bhante, disaasu vassa.m vu.t.thaa {vassa.mvutthaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhikkhuu aagacchanti tathaagata.m dassanaaya. te maya.m labhaama manobhaavaniiye bhikkhuu dassanaaya, labhaama payirupaasanaaya. bhagavato pana maya.m, bhante, accayena na labhissaama manobhaavaniiye bhikkhuu dassanaaya, na labhissaama payirupaasanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``cattaarimaani, aananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiyaani sa.mvejaniiyaani .thaanaani. katamaani cattaari? `idha tathaagato jaato'ti, aananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. `idha tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti, aananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. `idha tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita'nti, aananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. `idha tathaagato anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbuto'ti, aananda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. imaani kho ^a^P2.0141^ea^, aananda, cattaari saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiyaani sa.mvejaniiyaani .thaanaani.

[03] ``aagamissanti kho, aananda, saddhaa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo -- `idha tathaagato jaato'tipi, `idha tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'tipi, `idha tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita'ntipi, `idha tathaagato anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbuto'tipi. ye hi keci, aananda, cetiyacaarika.m aahi.n.dantaa pasannacittaa kaala"nkarissanti, sabbe te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissantii''ti.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^T2.0164^ea^ maya.m, bhante, maatugaame pa.tipajjaamaa''ti? ``adassana.m, aanandaa''ti. ``dassane, bhagavaa, sati katha.m pa.tipajjitabba''nti? ``anaalaapo, aanandaa''ti ^a^M2.0117^ea^. ``aalapantena pana, bhante, katha.m pa.tipajjitabba''nti? ``sati, aananda, upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^V2.0107^ea^ maya.m, bhante, tathaagatassa sariire pa.tipajjaamaa''ti? ``abyaava.taa tumhe, aananda, hotha tathaagatassa sariirapuujaaya. i"ngha tumhe, aananda, saaratthe gha.tatha anuyu~njatha {sadatthe anuyu~njatha (sii0 syaa0), sadattha.m anuyu~njatha (pii0), saaratthe anuyu~njatha (ka0)}, saaratthe appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharatha. santaananda, khattiyapa.n.ditaapi braahma.napa.n.ditaapi gahapatipa.n.ditaapi tathaagate abhippasannaa, te tathaagatassa sariirapuuja.m karissantii''ti.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m pana, bhante, tathaagatassa sariire pa.tipajjitabba''nti? ``yathaa kho, aananda, ra~n~no cakkavattissa sariire pa.tipajjanti, eva.m tathaagatassa sariire pa.tipajjitabba''nti. ``katha.m pana, bhante, ra~n~no cakkavattissa sariire pa.tipajjantii''ti? ``ra~n~no, aananda, cakkavattissa sariira.m ahatena vatthena ve.thenti, ahatena vatthena ve.thetvaa vihatena kappaasena ve.thenti, vihatena kappaasena ve.thetvaa ahatena vatthena ^a^P2.0142^ea^ ve.thenti. etenupaayena pa~ncahi yugasatehi ra~n~no cakkavattissa sariira.m {sariire (syaa0 ka0)} ve.thetvaa aayasaaya telado.niyaa pakkhipitvaa a~n~nissaa aayasaaya do.niyaa pa.tikujjitvaa sabbagandhaana.m citaka.m karitvaa ra~n~no cakkavattissa sariira.m jhaapenti. caatumahaapathe {caatummahaapathe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ra~n~no cakkavattissa thuupa.m karonti ^a^T2.0165^ea^. eva.m kho, aananda, ra~n~no cakkavattissa sariire pa.tipajjanti. yathaa kho, aananda, ra~n~no cakkavattissa sariire pa.tipajjanti, eva.m tathaagatassa sariire pa.tipajjitabba.m. caatumahaapathe tathaagatassa thuupo kaatabbo. tattha ye maala.m vaa gandha.m vaa cu.n.naka.m {va.n.naka.m (sii0 pii0)} vaa aaropessanti vaa abhivaadessanti vaa citta.m vaa pasaadessanti tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, aananda, thuupaarahaa. katame cattaaro? tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho thuupaaraho, paccekasambuddho thuupaaraho, tathaagatassa saavako thuupaaraho, raajaa cakkavattii {cakkavatti (syaa0 ka0)} thuupaarahoti.

[03] ``ki~ncaananda ^a^M2.0118^ea^, atthavasa.m pa.ticca tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho thuupaaraho? `aya.m tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa thuupo'ti, aananda, bahujanaa citta.m pasaadenti. te tattha citta.m pasaadetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. ida.m kho, aananda, atthavasa.m pa.ticca tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho thuupaaraho.

[03] ``ki~ncaananda, atthavasa.m pa.ticca paccekasambuddho thuupaaraho? `aya.m tassa bhagavato paccekasambuddhassa ^a^V2.0108^ea^ ^a^P2.0143^ea^ thuupo'ti, aananda, bahujanaa citta.m pasaadenti. te tattha citta.m pasaadetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. ida.m kho, aananda, atthavasa.m pa.ticca paccekasambuddho thuupaaraho.

[03] ``ki~ncaananda, atthavasa.m pa.ticca tathaagatassa saavako ^a^T2.0166^ea^ thuupaaraho? `aya.m tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa saavakassa thuupo'ti aananda, bahujanaa citta.m pasaadenti. te tattha citta.m pasaadetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. ida.m kho, aananda, atthavasa.m pa.ticca tathaagatassa saavako thuupaaraho.

[03] ``ki~ncaananda, atthavasa.m pa.ticca raajaa cakkavattii thuupaaraho? `aya.m tassa dhammikassa dhammara~n~no thuupo'ti, aananda, bahujanaa citta.m pasaadenti. te tattha citta.m pasaadetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. ida.m kho, aananda, atthavasa.m pa.ticca raajaa cakkavattii thuupaaraho. ime kho, aananda cattaaro thuupaarahaa''ti.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando vihaara.m pavisitvaa kapisiisa.m aalambitvaa rodamaano a.t.thaasi -- ``aha~nca vatamhi sekho sakara.niiyo, satthu ca me parinibbaana.m bhavissati, yo mama anukampako''ti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bhikkhave, aanando''ti? ``eso, bhante, aayasmaa aanando vihaara.m pavisitvaa kapisiisa.m aalambitvaa rodamaano .thito -- `aha~nca vatamhi sekho sakara.niiyo, satthu ca me parinibbaana.m bhavissati, yo mama anukampako'''ti. atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena aananda.m aamantehi ^a^M2.0119^ea^ -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso aananda, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P2.0144^ea^, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca ^a^T2.0167^ea^ -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso aananda, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa aanando tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ala.m, aananda, maa soci maa paridevi, nanu eta.m, aananda, mayaa pa.tikacceva akkhaata.m -- `sabbeheva piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo a~n~nathaabhaavo'; ta.m kutettha, aananda, labbhaa. ya.m ta.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m ^a^V2.0109^ea^ palokadhamma.m, ta.m vata tathaagatassaapi sariira.m maa palujjii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. diigharatta.m kho te, aananda, tathaagato paccupa.t.thito mettena kaayakammena hitena sukhena advayena appamaa.nena, mettena vaciikammena hitena sukhena advayena appamaa.nena, mettena manokammena hitena sukhena advayena appamaa.nena. katapu~n~nosi tva.m, aananda, padhaanamanuyu~nja, khippa.m hohisi anaasavo''ti.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tesampi bhagavantaana.m etapparamaayeva upa.t.thaakaa ahesu.m, seyyathaapi mayha.m aanando. yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tesampi bhagavantaana.m etapparamaayeva upa.t.thaakaa bhavissanti, seyyathaapi mayha.m aanando. pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, aanando; medhaavii, bhikkhave, aanando. jaanaati `aya.m kaalo tathaagata.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m bhikkhuuna.m, aya.m kaalo bhikkhuniina.m, aya.m kaalo upaasakaana.m ^a^T2.0168^ea^, aya.m ^a^P2.0145^ea^ kaalo upaasikaana.m, aya.m kaalo ra~n~no raajamahaamattaana.m titthiyaana.m titthiyasaavakaana'nti.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa {abbhutadhammaa (syaa0 ka0)} aanande. katame cattaaro? sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanena saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m ^a^M2.0120^ea^ bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisaa hoti, atha kho aanando tu.nhii hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniiparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanena saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniiparisaa hoti, atha kho aanando tu.nhii hoti. sace, bhikkhave, upaasakaparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanena saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, upaasakaparisaa hoti, atha kho aanando tu.nhii hoti. sace, bhikkhave, upaasikaaparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanena saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce, aanando, dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, upaasikaaparisaa hoti, atha kho aanando tu.nhii hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa aanande.
