[03] 273^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0229^ea^ ^a^M2.0162^ea^ ^a^V2.0148^ea^ ^a^P2.0200^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naatike {naadike (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} viharati gi~njakaavasathe. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa parito parito janapadesu paricaarake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu byaakaroti kaasikosalesu vajjimallesu cetiva.msesu {cetiyava.msesu (ka0)} kurupa~ncaalesu majjhasuurasenesu {macchasurasenesu (syaa0), macchasuurasenesu (sii0 pii0)} -- ``asu amutra upapanno, asu amutra upapanno {upapannoti (ka0)}. paropa~n~naasa naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. saadhikaa navuti naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamino, sakideva {saki.mdeva (ka0)} ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti. saatirekaani pa~ncasataani naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa''ti.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ assosu.m ^a^P2.0201^ea^ kho naatikiyaa paricaarakaa -- ``bhagavaa kira parito parito janapadesu paricaarake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu byaakaroti kaasikosalesu vajjimallesu cetiva.msesu kurupa~ncaalesu majjhasuurasenesu -- `asu amutra upapanno, asu amutra upapanno. paropa~n~naasa naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa ^a^T2.0230^ea^ opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. saadhikaa navuti naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamino sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti. saatirekaani pa~ncasataani naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa ^a^M2.0163^ea^ sotaapannaa ^a^V2.0149^ea^ avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'ti. tena ca naatikiyaa paricaarakaa attamanaa ahesu.m pamuditaa ^a^T2.0231^ea^ piitisomanassajaataa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m {pa~nhaaveyyaakara.na.m (syaa0 ka0)} sutvaa.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ assosi kho aayasmaa aanando -- ``bhagavaa kira parito parito janapadesu paricaarake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu byaakaroti kaasikosalesu vajjimallesu cetiva.msesu kurupa~ncaalesu majjhasuurasenesu -- `asu amutra upapanno, asu amutra upapanno. paropa~n~naasa naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. saadhikaa navuti naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamino sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti. saatirekaani pa~ncasataani naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'ti. tena ca naatikiyaa paricaarakaa attamanaa ahesu.m pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m sutvaa''ti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho ^a^P2.0202^ea^ panaapi ahesu.m maagadhakaa paricaarakaa bahuu ceva ratta~n~nuu ca abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa. su~n~naa ma~n~ne a"ngamagadhaa a"ngamaagadhakehi {a"ngamaagadhikehi (syaa0)} paricaarakehi abbhatiitehi kaala"nkatehi. te kho panaapi {tena kho panaapi (syaa0)} ahesu.m buddhe pasannaa dhamme pasannaa sa"nghe pasannaa siilesu paripuurakaarino. te abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa bhagavataa abyaakataa; tesampissa saadhu veyyaakara.na.m, bahujano pasiideyya, tato gaccheyya sugati.m. aya.m kho panaapi ahosi raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro dhammiko dhammaraajaa hito braahma.nagahapatikaana.m negamaana~nceva jaanapadaana~nca. apissuda.m manussaa kittayamaanaruupaa viharanti -- `eva.m no so dhammiko dhammaraajaa sukhaapetvaa ^a^M2.0164^ea^ kaala"nkato, eva.m maya.m tassa dhammikassa dhammara~n~no vijite phaasu {phaasuka.m (syaa0)} viharimhaa'ti. so kho panaapi ahosi buddhe pasanno dhamme pasanno sa"nghe pasanno siilesu paripuurakaarii. apissuda.m manussaa evamaaha.msu -- `yaava mara.nakaalaapi raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavanta.m kittayamaanaruupo kaala"nkato'ti. so abbhatiito kaala"nkato bhagavataa abyaakato. tassapissa saadhu veyyaakara.na.m bahujano pasiideyya, tato gaccheyya sugati.m. bhagavato kho pana sambodhi magadhesu. yattha kho pana bhagavato sambodhi magadhesu, katha.m tatra bhagavaa ^a^T2.0232^ea^ maagadhake paricaarake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu ^a^V2.0150^ea^ na byaakareyya. bhagavaa ce kho pana maagadhake paricaarake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu na byaakareyya, diinamanaa {ninnamanaa (syaa0), diinamaanaa (sii0 pii0)} tenassu maagadhakaa paricaarakaa; yena kho ^a^P2.0203^ea^ panassu diinamanaa maagadhakaa paricaarakaa katha.m te bhagavaa na byaakareyyaa''ti?

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ idamaayasmaa aanando maagadhake paricaarake aarabbha eko raho anuvicintetvaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `bhagavaa kira parito parito janapadesu paricaarake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu byaakaroti kaasikosalesu vajjimallesu cetiva.msesu kurupa~ncaalesu majjhasuurasenesu -- ``asu amutra upapanno, asu amutra upapanno. paropa~n~naasa naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. saadhikaa navuti naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamino, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti. saatirekaani pa~ncasataani naatikiyaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa ^a^T2.0233^ea^ avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naati. tena ca naatikiyaa paricaarakaa attamanaa ahesu.m pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m sutvaa''ti ^a^M2.0165^ea^. ime kho panaapi, bhante, ahesu.m maagadhakaa paricaarakaa bahuu ceva ratta~n~nuu ca abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa. su~n~naa ma~n~ne a"ngamagadhaa a"ngamaagadhakehi paricaarakehi abbhatiitehi kaala"nkatehi. te kho panaapi, bhante, ahesu.m buddhe pasannaa dhamme pasannaa sa"nghe pasannaa siilesu paripuurakaarino, te abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa bhagavataa abyaakataa. tesampissa saadhu veyyaakara.na.m, bahujano pasiideyya, tato gaccheyya sugati.m. aya.m kho panaapi, bhante, ahosi raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro dhammiko dhammaraajaa hito braahma.nagahapatikaana.m negamaana~nceva ^a^P2.0204^ea^ jaanapadaana~nca. apissuda.m manussaa kittayamaanaruupaa viharanti -- `eva.m no so dhammiko dhammaraajaa sukhaapetvaa kaala"nkato. eva.m maya.m tassa dhammikassa dhammara~n~no vijite phaasu viharimhaa'ti. so kho panaapi, bhante, ahosi buddhe pasanno dhamme pasanno sa"nghe pasanno siilesu paripuurakaarii. apissuda.m manussaa evamaaha.msu -- `yaava mara.nakaalaapi raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro bhagavanta.m kittayamaanaruupo kaala"nkato'ti. so abbhatiito kaala"nkato bhagavataa abyaakato; tassapissa saadhu veyyaakara.na.m, bahujano pasiideyya, tato gaccheyya sugati.m. bhagavato kho pana, bhante, sambodhi magadhesu. yattha kho pana ^a^T2.0234^ea^, bhante, bhagavato sambodhi magadhesu, katha.m tatra bhagavaa maagadhake paricaarake abbhatiite ^a^V2.0151^ea^ kaala"nkate upapattiisu na byaakareyya? bhagavaa ce kho pana, bhante, maagadhake paricaarake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu na byaakareyya diinamanaa tenassu maagadhakaa paricaarakaa; yena kho panassu diinamanaa maagadhakaa paricaarakaa katha.m te bhagavaa na byaakareyyaa''ti. idamaayasmaa aanando maagadhake paricaarake aarabbha bhagavato sammukhaa parikatha.m katvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkante aayasmante aanande pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya naatika.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. naatike pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto paade pakkhaaletvaa gi~njakaavasatha.m pavisitvaa maagadhake paricaarake aarabbha a.t.thi.m katvaa {a.t.thikatvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} manasikatvaa sabba.m cetasaa {sabbacetasaa (pii0)} samannaaharitvaa pa~n~natte aasane ^a^M2.0166^ea^ nisiidi -- ``gati.m nesa.m jaanissaami abhisamparaaya.m, ya.mgatikaa te bhavanto ya.mabhisamparaayaa''ti. addasaa kho bhagavaa maagadhake paricaarake ``ya.mgatikaa te bhavanto ^a^P2.0205^ea^ ya.mabhisamparaayaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito gi~njakaavasathaa nikkhamitvaa vihaarapacchaayaaya.m pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno ^a^T2.0235^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``upasantapadisso {upasantapatiso (ka0)} bhante bhagavaa bhaatiriva bhagavato mukhava.n.no vippasannattaa indriyaana.m. santena nuunajja bhante bhagavaa vihaarena vihaasii''ti? ``yadeva kho me tva.m, aananda, maagadhake paricaarake aarabbha sammukhaa parikatha.m katvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto, tadevaaha.m naatike pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto paade pakkhaaletvaa gi~njakaavasatha.m pavisitvaa maagadhake paricaarake aarabbha a.t.thi.m katvaa manasikatvaa sabba.m cetasaa samannaaharitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.m -- `gati.m nesa.m jaanissaami abhisamparaaya.m, ya.mgatikaa te bhavanto ya.mabhisamparaayaa'ti. addasa.m kho aha.m, aananda, maagadhake paricaarake `ya.mgatikaa te bhavanto ya.mabhisamparaayaa'''ti.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, aananda, antarahito yakkho saddamanussaavesi -- `janavasabho aha.m bhagavaa ^a^V2.0152^ea^; janavasabho aha.m sugataa'ti. abhijaanaasi no tva.m, aananda, ito pubbe evaruupa.m naamadheyya.m suta.m {sutvaa (pii0)} yadida.m janavasabho''ti?

[03] ``na kho aha.m, bhante, abhijaanaami ito pubbe evaruupa.m naamadheyya.m suta.m yadida.m janavasabhoti, api ca me, bhante, lomaani ha.t.thaani `janavasabho'ti naamadheyya.m sutvaa. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `na hi ^a^P2.0206^ea^ nuuna so orako yakkho bhavissati yadida.m evaruupa.m naamadheyya.m supa~n~natta.m yadida.m janavasabho''ti. ``anantaraa kho, aananda, saddapaatubhaavaa u.laarava.n.no ^a^M2.0167^ea^ me yakkho sammukhe paaturahosi ^a^T2.0236^ea^. dutiyampi saddamanussaavesi -- `bimbisaaro aha.m bhagavaa; bimbisaaro aha.m sugataati. ida.m sattama.m kho aha.m, bhante, vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa sahabyata.m upapajjaami, so tato cuto manussaraajaa bhavitu.m pahomi {so tato cuto manussaraajaa, amanussaraajaa divi homi (sii0 pii0)}.
[21] ito satta tato satta, sa.msaaraani catuddasa.
[22] nivaasamabhijaanaami, yattha me vusita.m pure..

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ `diigharatta.m kho aha.m, bhante, avinipaato avinipaata.m sa~njaanaami, aasaa ca pana me santi.t.thati sakadaagaamitaayaa'ti. `acchariyamida.m aayasmato janavasabhassa yakkhassa, abbhutamida.m aayasmato janavasabhassa yakkhassa. ``diigharatta.m kho aha.m, bhante, avinipaato avinipaata.m sa~njaanaamii''ti ca vadesi, ``aasaa ca pana me santi.t.thati sakadaagaamitaayaa''ti ca vadesi, kutonidaana.m panaayasmaa janavasabho yakkho evaruupa.m u.laara.m visesaadhigama.m sa~njaanaatiiti? na a~n~natra, bhagavaa, tava saasanaa, na a~n~natra {a~n~nattha (sii0 pii0)}, sugata, tava saasanaa; yadagge aha.m, bhante, bhagavati ekantikato {ekantato (syaa0), ekantagato (pii0)} abhippasanno, tadagge aha.m, bhante, diigharatta.m ^a^P2.0207^ea^ avinipaato avinipaata.m sa~njaanaami, aasaa ca pana me santi.t.thati sakadaagaamitaaya. idhaaha.m, bhante, vessava.nena mahaaraajena pesito viruu.lhakassa mahaaraajassa santike kenacideva kara.niiyena addasa.m bhagavanta.m antaraamagge gi~njakaavasatha.m ^a^T2.0237^ea^ pavisitvaa maagadhake paricaarake aarabbha a.t.thi.m katvaa manasikatvaa sabba.m cetasaa samannaaharitvaa nisinna.m -- ``gati.m nesa.m jaanissaami abhisamparaaya.m, ya.mgatikaa te bhavanto ya.mabhisamparaayaa''ti. anacchariya.m kho paneta.m, bhante, ya.m vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa tassa.m parisaaya.m bhaasato sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- ``ya.mgatikaa te bhavanto ya.mabhisamparaayaa''ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- bhagavanta~nca dakkhaami, ida~nca bhagavato aarocessaamiiti. ime kho me, bhante, dvepaccayaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m'.

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ `purimaani ^a^M2.0168^ea^ ^a^V2.0153^ea^, bhante, divasaani purimataraani tadahuposathe pannarase vassuupanaayikaaya pu.n.naaya pu.n.namaaya rattiyaa kevalakappaa ca devaa taavati.msaa sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m sannisinnaa honti sannipatitaa. mahatii ca dibbaparisaa {dibbaa parisaa (sii0 pii0)} samantato nisinnaa honti {nisinnaa hoti (sii0), sannisinnaa honti sannipatitaa (ka0)}, cattaaro ca mahaaraajaano catuddisaa nisinnaa honti. puratthimaaya disaaya dhatara.t.tho mahaaraajaa pacchimaabhimukho {pacchaabhimukho (ka0)} nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa; dakkhi.naaya disaaya viruu.lhako mahaaraajaa uttaraabhimukho nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa; pacchimaaya disaaya viruupakkho mahaaraajaa puratthaabhimukho nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa; uttaraaya disaaya vessava.no mahaaraajaa dakkhi.naabhimukho nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa ^a^P2.0208^ea^. yadaa, bhante, kevalakappaa ca devaa taavati.msaa sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m sannisinnaa honti sannipatitaa, mahatii ca dibbaparisaa samantato nisinnaa honti, cattaaro ca mahaaraajaano catuddisaa nisinnaa ^a^T2.0238^ea^ honti. ida.m nesa.m hoti aasanasmi.m; atha pacchaa amhaaka.m aasana.m hoti. ye te, bhante, devaa bhagavati brahmacariya.m caritvaa adhunuupapannaa taavati.msakaaya.m, te a~n~ne deve atirocanti va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. tena suda.m, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa attamanaa honti pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa ``dibbaa vata bho kaayaa paripuurenti, haayanti asurakaayaa''ti. atha kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sampasaada.m viditvaa imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``modanti vata bho devaa, taavati.msaa sahindakaa {saindakaa (sii0)}.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata.m..
[21] nave deve ca passantaa, va.n.navante yasassine {yasassino (syaa0)}.
[22] sugatasmi.m brahmacariya.m, caritvaana idhaagate..
[21] te a~n~ne atirocanti, va.n.nena yasasaayunaa.
[22] saavakaa bhuuripa~n~nassa, visesuupagataa idha..
[21] ida.m ^a^M2.0169^ea^ disvaana nandanti, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata''nti..

[03] `tena ^a^V2.0154^ea^ ^a^P2.0209^ea^ suda.m, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa bhiyyosomattaaya attamanaa honti pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa ``dibbaa vata, bho, kaayaa paripuurenti, haayanti asurakaayaa''ti. atha kho, bhante, yenatthena devaa taavati.msaa sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m sannisinnaa honti sannipatitaa, ta.m attha.m cintayitvaa ta.m attha.m mantayitvaa vuttavacanaapi ta.m {vuttavacanaa naamida.m (ka0)} cattaaro mahaaraajaano ^a^T2.0239^ea^ tasmi.m atthe honti. paccaanusi.t.thavacanaapi ta.m {paccaanusi.t.thavacanaa naamida.m (ka0)} cattaaro mahaaraajaano tasmi.m atthe honti, sakesu sakesu aasanesu .thitaa avipakkantaa {adhipakkantaa (ka0)}.
[21] te vuttavaakyaa raajaano, pa.tiggayhaanusaasani.m.
[22] vippasannamanaa santaa, a.t.tha.msu samhi aasaneti..

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ `atha kho, bhante, uttaraaya disaaya u.laaro aaloko sa~njaayi, obhaaso paaturahosi atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. atha kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- ``yathaa kho, maarisaa, nimittaani dissanti, u.laaro aaloko sa~njaayati, obhaaso paatubhavati, brahmaa paatubhavissati. brahmuno heta.m pubbanimitta.m paatubhaavaaya yadida.m aaloko sa~njaayati obhaaso paatubhavatiiti.
[21] ``yathaa nimittaa dissanti, brahmaa paatubhavissati.
[22] brahmuno heta.m nimitta.m, obhaaso vipulo mahaa''ti..

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ `atha kho, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa yathaasakesu aasanesu nisiidi.msu -- ``obhaasameta.m ~nassaama, ya.mvipaako bhavissati, sacchikatvaava na.m gamissaamaa''ti. cattaaropi mahaaraajaano yathaasakesu aasanesu nisiidi.msu -- ``obhaasameta.m ~nassaama ya.mvipaako bhavissati, sacchikatvaava ^a^M2.0170^ea^ na.m gamissaamaa''ti. ida.m sutvaa devaa taavati.msaa ekaggaa ^a^P2.0210^ea^ samaapajji.msu -- ``obhaasameta.m ~nassaama, ya.mvipaako bhavissati, sacchikatvaava na.m gamissaamaa''ti.

[03] `yadaa, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m ^a^T2.0240^ea^ taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati, o.laarika.m attabhaava.m abhinimminitvaa paatubhavati. yo kho pana, bhante, brahmuno pakativa.n.no anabhisambhavaniiyo so devaana.m taavati.msaana.m cakkhupathasmi.m. yadaa, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati ^a^V2.0155^ea^, so a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. seyyathaapi, bhante, sova.n.no viggaho maanusa.m viggaha.m atirocati; evameva kho, bhante, yadaa brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati, so a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. yadaa, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati, na tassa.m parisaaya.m koci devo abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimanteti. sabbeva tu.nhiibhuutaa pa~njalikaa palla"nkena nisiidanti -- ``yassadaani devassa palla"nka.m icchissati brahmaa sana"nkumaaro, tassa devassa palla"nke nisiidissatii''ti.

[03] `yassa kho pana, bhante, devassa brahmaa sana"nkumaaro palla"nke nisiidati, u.laara.m so labhati devo vedapa.tilaabha.m; u.laara.m so labhati devo somanassapa.tilaabha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto adhunaabhisitto rajjena, u.laara.m so labhati vedapa.tilaabha.m, u.laara.m so labhati somanassapa.tilaabha.m. evameva kho, bhante, yassa devassa brahmaa sana"nkumaaro palla"nke nisiidati, u.laara.m so labhati devo vedapa.tilaabha.m, u.laara.m so labhati devo somanassapa.tilaabha.m. atha ^a^T2.0241^ea^ ^a^P2.0211^ea^, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro o.laarika.m attabhaava.m abhinimminitvaa kumaarava.n.nii {kumaarava.n.no (syaa0 ka0)} hutvaa pa~ncasikho devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaturahosi. so vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe palla"nkena nisiidi. seyyathaapi, bhante, balavaa puriso supaccatthate vaa palla"nke same vaa bhuumibhaage palla"nkena nisiideyya; evameva kho, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe palla"nkena nisiiditvaa devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sampasaada.m viditvaa imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``modanti ^a^M2.0171^ea^ vata bho devaa, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata.m..
[21] ``nave deve ca passantaa, va.n.navante yasassine.
[22] sugatasmi.m brahmacariya.m, caritvaana idhaagate..
[21] ``te a~n~ne atirocanti, va.n.nena yasasaayunaa.
[22] saavakaa bhuuripa~n~nassa, visesuupagataa idha..
[21] ``ida.m ^a^V2.0156^ea^ disvaana nandanti, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata''nti..

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ `imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasittha; imamattha.m, bhante, brahmuno sana"nkumaarassa bhaasato a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato saro hoti vissa.t.tho ca vi~n~neyyo ca ma~nju ca savaniiyo ca bindu ca avisaarii ca gambhiiro ca ninnaadii ca. yathaaparisa.m kho pana, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro sarena vi~n~naapeti; na cassa bahiddhaa parisaaya ^a^T2.0242^ea^ ghoso niccharati. yassa kho pana, bhante, eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato saro hoti, so vuccati ``brahmassaro''ti.

[03] `atha kho, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro tetti.mse attabhaave abhinimminitvaa devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paccekapalla"nkesu ^a^P2.0212^ea^ palla"nkena {paccekapalla"nkena (ka0)} nisiiditvaa deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto devaa taavati.msaa, yaava~nca so bhagavaa bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. ye hi keci, bho, buddha.m sara.na.m gataa dhamma.m sara.na.m gataa sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gataa siilesu paripuurakaarino te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa appekacce paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce tusitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce yaamaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce taavati.msaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti. ye sabbanihiina.m kaaya.m paripuurenti, te gandhabbakaaya.m paripuurentii'''ti.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ `imamattha.m ^a^M2.0172^ea^, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasittha; imamattha.m, bhante, brahmuno sana"nkumaarassa bhaasato ghosoyeva devaa ma~n~nanti -- ``yvaaya.m mama palla"nke svaaya.m ekova bhaasatii''ti.
[21] ekasmi.m bhaasamaanasmi.m, sabbe bhaasanti nimmitaa.
[22] ekasmi.m tu.nhimaasiine, sabbe tu.nhii bhavanti te..
[21] tadaasu ^a^T2.0243^ea^ devaa ma~n~nanti, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] yvaaya.m mama palla"nkasmi.m, svaaya.m ekova bhaasatiiti..

[03] `atha ^a^V2.0157^ea^ kho, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro ekattena attaana.m upasa.mharati, ekattena attaana.m upasa.mharitvaa sakkassa ^a^P2.0213^ea^ devaanamindassa palla"nke palla"nkena nisiiditvaa deve taavati.mse aamantesi --

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto devaa taavati.msaa, yaava supa~n~nattaa cime tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~n~nattaa iddhipahutaaya {iddhibahuliikataaya (syaa0)} iddhivisavitaaya {iddhivisevitaaya (syaa0)} iddhivikubbanataaya. katame cattaaro? idha bho bhikkhu chandasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. viiriyasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. cittasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. viima.msaasamaadhippadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. ime kho, bho, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~n~nattaa iddhipahutaaya iddhivisavitaaya iddhivikubbanataaya.

[03] ```ye hi keci bho atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhosu.m, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. yepi hi keci bho anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhossanti, sabbe ^a^T2.0244^ea^ te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. yepi hi keci bho etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhonti, sabbe te imesa.myeva catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa. passanti no bhonto devaa taavati.msaa mamapima.m ^a^M2.0173^ea^ evaruupa.m iddhaanubhaava''nti? ``eva.m mahaabrahme''ti. ``ahampi kho bho imesa.myeva catunna~nca iddhipaadaana.m ^a^P2.0214^ea^ bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa eva.m mahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo''ti. imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasittha. imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasitvaa deve taavati.mse aamantesi --

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto devaa taavati.msaa, yaava~ncida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena tayo okaasaadhigamaa anubuddhaa sukhassaadhigamaaya. katame tayo? idha bho ekacco sa.msa.t.tho viharati kaamehi sa.msa.t.tho akusalehi dhammehi. so aparena samayena ^a^V2.0158^ea^ ariyadhamma.m su.naati, yoniso manasi karoti, dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjati. so ariyadhammassavana.m aagamma yonisomanasikaara.m dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti.m asa.msa.t.tho viharati kaamehi asa.msa.t.tho akusalehi dhammehi. tassa asa.msa.t.thassa kaamehi asa.msa.t.thassa akusalehi dhammehi uppajjati sukha.m, sukhaa bhiyyo somanassa.m. seyyathaapi, bho, pamudaa paamojja.m {paamujja.m (pii0 ka0)} jaayetha, evameva ^a^T2.0245^ea^ kho, bho, asa.msa.t.thassa kaamehi asa.msa.t.thassa akusalehi dhammehi uppajjati sukha.m, sukhaa bhiyyo somanassa.m. aya.m kho, bho, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thamo okaasaadhigamo anubuddho sukhassaadhigamaaya.

[03] ```puna capara.m, bho, idhekaccassa o.laarikaa kaayasa"nkhaaraa appa.tippassaddhaa honti, o.laarikaa vaciisa"nkhaaraa appa.tippassaddhaa honti, o.laarikaa cittasa"nkhaaraa appa.tippassaddhaa honti. so aparena samayena ariyadhamma.m su.naati, yoniso manasi karoti, dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjati. tassa ariyadhammassavana.m aagamma yonisomanasikaara.m dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti.m o.laarikaa kaayasa"nkhaaraa pa.tippassambhanti, o.laarikaa vaciisa"nkhaaraa pa.tippassambhanti, o.laarikaa cittasa"nkhaaraa ^a^P2.0215^ea^ pa.tippassambhanti. tassa o.laarikaana.m kaayasa"nkhaaraana.m pa.tippassaddhiyaa o.laarikaana.m vaciisa"nkhaaraana.m pa.tippassaddhiyaa o.laarikaana.m cittasa"nkhaaraana.m ^a^M2.0174^ea^ pa.tippassaddhiyaa uppajjati sukha.m, sukhaa bhiyyo somanassa.m. seyyathaapi, bho, pamudaa paamojja.m jaayetha, evameva kho bho o.laarikaana.m kaayasa"nkhaaraana.m pa.tippassaddhiyaa o.laarikaana.m vaciisa"nkhaaraana.m pa.tippassaddhiyaa o.laarikaana.m cittasa"nkhaaraana.m pa.tippassaddhiyaa uppajjati sukha.m, sukhaa bhiyyo somanassa.m. aya.m kho, bho, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dutiyo okaasaadhigamo anubuddho sukhassaadhigamaaya.

[03] ```puna capara.m, bho, idhekacco ^a^T2.0246^ea^ `ida.m kusala'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, `ida.m akusala'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. `ida.m saavajja.m ida.m anavajja.m, ida.m sevitabba.m ida.m na sevitabba.m, ida.m hiina.m ida.m pa.niita.m, ida.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. so aparena samayena ariyadhamma.m su.naati, yoniso manasi karoti, dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjati. so ariyadhammassavana.m aagamma yonisomanasikaara.m dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti.m, `ida.m kusala'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ida.m akusala'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ida.m saavajja.m ida.m anavajja.m, ida.m sevitabba.m ida.m na sevitabba.m, ida.m hiina.m ida.m pa.niita.m, ida.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato avijjaa pahiiyati, vijjaa uppajjati. tassa avijjaaviraagaa vijjuppaadaa uppajjati sukha.m, sukhaa bhiyyo somanassa.m. seyyathaapi, bho, pamudaa paamojja.m jaayetha ^a^V2.0159^ea^, evameva kho, bho, avijjaaviraagaa vijjuppaadaa uppajjati sukha.m, sukhaa bhiyyo somanassa.m. aya.m kho, bho, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena tatiyo okaasaadhigamo anubuddho sukhassaadhigamaaya. ime ^a^T2.0247^ea^ ^a^P2.0216^ea^ kho, bho, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena tayo okaasaadhigamaa anubuddhaa sukhassaadhigamaayaa''ti. imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasittha, imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasitvaa deve taavati.mse aamantesi --

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto devaa taavati.msaa, yaava supa~n~nattaa cime tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa pa~n~nattaa kusalassaadhigamaaya. katame cattaaro? idha ^a^M2.0175^ea^, bho, bhikkhu ajjhatta.m kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ajjhatta.m kaaye kaayaanupassii viharanto tattha sammaa samaadhiyati, sammaa vippasiidati. so tattha sammaa samaahito sammaa vippasanno bahiddhaa parakaaye ~naa.nadassana.m abhinibbatteti. ajjhatta.m vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati...pe0... bahiddhaa paravedanaasu ~naa.nadassana.m abhinibbatteti. ajjhatta.m citte cittaanupassii viharati...pe0... bahiddhaa paracitte ~naa.nadassana.m abhinibbatteti. ajjhatta.m ^a^T2.0248^ea^ dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ajjhatta.m dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharanto tattha sammaa samaadhiyati, sammaa vippasiidati. so tattha sammaa samaahito sammaa vippasanno bahiddhaa paradhammesu ~naa.nadassana.m abhinibbatteti. ime kho, bho, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa pa~n~nattaa kusalassaadhigamaayaa''ti. imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasittha. imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasitvaa deve taavati.mse aamantesi --

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto devaa taavati.msaa, yaava supa~n~nattaa cime tena bhagavataa ^a^V2.0160^ea^ jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena satta samaadhiparikkhaaraa sammaasamaadhissa paribhaavanaaya sammaasamaadhissa paaripuuriyaa. katame satta? sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo ^a^P2.0217^ea^ sammaavaayaamo sammaasati. yaa kho, bho, imehi sattaha"ngehi cittassa ekaggataa parikkhataa, aya.m vuccati, bho, ariyo sammaasamaadhi saupaniso itipi saparikkhaaro itipi. sammaadi.t.thissa bho, sammaasa"nkappo pahoti, sammaasa"nkappassa sammaavaacaa pahoti, sammaavaacassa sammaakammanto pahoti. sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivo pahoti, sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamo pahoti, sammaavaayaamassa sammaasati pahoti ^a^T2.0249^ea^, sammaasatissa sammaasamaadhi pahoti, sammaasamaadhissa sammaa~naa.na.m pahoti, sammaa~naa.nassa sammaavimutti pahoti. ya~nhi ta.m, bho, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhi apaarutaa amatassa ^a^M2.0176^ea^ dvaaraa'ti idameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. svaakkhaato hi, bho, bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko, akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhi apaarutaa amatassa dvaaraa {dvaaraati (syaa0 ka0)}.

[03] ```ye hi keci, bho, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagataa ^a^P2.0218^ea^, ye cime opapaatikaa dhammaviniitaa saatirekaani catuviisatisatasahassaani maagadhakaa paricaarakaa abbhatiitaa kaala"nkataa ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa. atthi cevettha sakadaagaamino.
[21] ``atthaaya.m {athaaya.m (sii0 syaa0)} itaraa pajaa, pu~n~naabhaagaati me mano.
[22] sa"nkhaatu.m nopi sakkomi, musaavaadassa ottappa''nti..

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ `imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhaasittha, imamattha.m, bhante, brahmuno sana"nkumaarassa bhaasato vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m ^a^T2.0250^ea^ vata bho, evaruupopi naama u.laaro satthaa bhavissati, evaruupa.m u.laara.m dhammakkhaana.m, evaruupaa u.laaraa visesaadhigamaa pa~n~naayissantii''ti. atha, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya vessava.na.m mahaaraajaana.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nati bhava.m vessava.no mahaaraajaa atiitampi addhaana.m evaruupo u.laaro satthaa ahosi, evaruupa.m u.laara.m dhammakkhaana.m, evaruupaa u.laaraa visesaadhigamaa pa~n~naayi.msu. anaagatampi ^a^V2.0161^ea^ addhaana.m evaruupo u.laaro satthaa bhavissati, evaruupa.m u.laara.m dhammakkhaana.m, evaruupaa u.laaraa visesaadhigamaa pa~n~naayissantii'''ti.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ```imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m abhaasi, imamattha.m vessava.no mahaaraajaa brahmuno sana"nkumaarassa devaana.m ^a^M2.0177^ea^ taavati.msaana.m bhaasato ^a^P2.0219^ea^ sammukhaa suta.m {sutvaa (sii0 pii0)} sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m saya.m parisaaya.m aarocesi''.

[03] imamattha.m janavasabho yakkho vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa saya.m parisaaya.m bhaasato sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m {pa.tiggahetvaa (sii0 pii0)} bhagavato aarocesi. imamattha.m bhagavaa janavasabhassa yakkhassa sammukhaa sutvaa sammukhaa pa.tiggahetvaa saama~nca abhi~n~naaya aayasmato aanandassa aarocesi, imamatthamaayasmaa aanando bhagavato sammukhaa sutvaa sammukhaa pa.tiggahetvaa aarocesi bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m ^a^T2.0251^ea^ upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m. tayida.m brahmacariya.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasitanti.
[06] janavasabhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0252^ea^ ^a^M2.0178^ea^ ^a^V2.0162^ea^ me ^a^P2.0220^ea^ suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho pa~ncasikho gandhabbaputto abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m gijjhakuu.ta.m pabbata.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho pa~ncasikho gandhabbaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ya.m kho me, bhante, devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m, aarocemi ta.m bhagavato''ti. ``aarocehi me tva.m, pa~ncasikhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ ``purimaani, bhante, divasaani purimataraani tadahuposathe pannarase pavaara.naaya pu.n.naaya pu.n.namaaya rattiyaa kevalakappaa ca devaa taavati.msaa sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m sannisinnaa honti sannipatitaa; mahatii ca dibbaparisaa samantato nisinnaa honti, cattaaro ca mahaaraajaano catuddisaa nisinnaa honti; puratthimaaya disaaya dhatara.t.tho mahaaraajaa pacchimaabhimukho nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa; dakkhi.naaya disaaya viruu.lhako mahaaraajaa uttaraabhimukho nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa; pacchimaaya disaaya viruupakkho ^a^P2.0221^ea^ mahaaraajaa puratthaabhimukho nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa; uttaraaya disaaya vessava.no mahaaraajaa dakkhi.naabhimukho nisinno hoti deve purakkhatvaa. yadaa bhante, kevalakappaa ca devaa ^a^T2.0253^ea^ taavati.msaa sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m sannisinnaa honti sannipatitaa, mahatii ca dibbaparisaa samantato nisinnaa honti, cattaaro ca mahaaraajaano catuddisaa nisinnaa honti, ida.m nesa.m hoti aasanasmi.m; atha pacchaa amhaaka.m aasana.m hoti.

[03] ``ye te, bhante, devaa bhagavati brahmacariya.m caritvaa adhunuupapannaa taavati.msakaaya.m, te a~n~ne ^a^V2.0163^ea^ deve atirocanti va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. tena suda.m, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa attamanaa honti pamuditaa ^a^M2.0179^ea^ piitisomanassajaataa; `dibbaa vata, bho, kaayaa paripuurenti, haayanti asurakaayaa'ti.
[03] 295^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sampasaada.m viditvaa imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] `modanti vata bho devaa, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata.m..
[21] nave deve ca passantaa, va.n.navante yasassine.
[22] sugatasmi.m brahmacariya.m, caritvaana idhaagate..
[21] te a~n~ne atirocanti, va.n.nena yasasaayunaa.
[22] saavakaa bhuuripa~n~nassa, visesuupagataa idha..
[21] ida.m disvaana nandanti, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata'nti..

[03] ``tena suda.m ^a^P2.0222^ea^, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa bhiyyoso mattaaya attamanaa honti pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa; `dibbaa vata, bho, kaayaa ^a^T2.0254^ea^ paripuurenti, haayanti asurakaayaa'''ti.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sampasaada.m viditvaa deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- `iccheyyaatha no tumhe, maarisaa, tassa bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne sotu'nti? `icchaama maya.m, maarisa, tassa bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne sotu'nti. atha kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo devaana.m taavati.msaana.m bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne payirudaahaasi -- `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto devaa taavati.msaa? yaava~nca so bhagavaa bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. eva.m ^a^V2.0164^ea^ bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanna.m bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``svaakkhaato ^a^M2.0180^ea^ kho pana tena bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhi. eva.m opaneyyikassa dhammassa desetaara.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``ida.m kusalanti kho pana tena bhagavataa supa~n~natta.m, ida.m akusalanti supa~n~natta.m. ida.m saavajja.m ^a^P2.0223^ea^ ida.m anavajja.m, ida.m sevitabba.m ida.m na sevitabba.m, ida.m hiina.m ida.m pa.niita.m, ida.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaganti supa~n~natta.m. eva.m kusalaakusalasaavajjaanavajjasevitabbaasevitabbahiina-pa.niitaka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagaana.m ^a^T2.0255^ea^ dhammaana.m pa~n~napetaara.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``supa~n~nattaa kho pana tena bhagavataa saavakaana.m nibbaanagaaminii pa.tipadaa, sa.msandati nibbaana~nca pa.tipadaa ca. seyyathaapi naama ga"ngodaka.m yamunodakena sa.msandati sameti, evameva supa~n~nattaa tena bhagavataa saavakaana.m nibbaanagaaminii pa.tipadaa, sa.msandati nibbaana~nca pa.tipadaa ca. eva.m nibbaanagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya pa~n~napetaara.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``abhinipphanno {abhinippanno (pii0 ka0)} kho pana tassa bhagavato laabho abhinipphanno siloko, yaava ma~n~ne khattiyaa sampiyaayamaanaruupaa viharanti, vigatamado kho pana so bhagavaa aahaara.m aahaareti. eva.m vigatamada.m aahaara.m aaharayamaana.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva ^a^P2.0224^ea^ atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``laddhasahaayo kho pana so bhagavaa sekhaana~nceva pa.tipannaana.m khii.naasavaana~nca vusitavata.m. te bhagavaa apanujja ekaaraamata.m anuyutto viharati. eva.m ekaaraamata.m anuyutta.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``yathaavaadii ^a^V2.0165^ea^ kho pana so bhagavaa tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii, iti yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii ^a^T2.0256^ea^ tathaavaadii. eva.m dhammaanudhammappa.tipanna.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``ti.n.navicikiccho ^a^M2.0181^ea^ kho pana so bhagavaa vigatakatha.mkatho pariyositasa"nkappo ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya.m. eva.m ti.n.navicikiccha.m vigatakatha.mkatha.m pariyositasa"nkappa.m ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa'ti.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ ``ime kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo devaana.m taavati.msaana.m bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne payirudaahaasi. tena suda.m, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa bhiyyoso mattaaya attamanaa honti pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne sutvaa. tatra, bhante, ekacce devaa evamaaha.msu -- `aho vata, maarisaa, cattaaro sammaasambuddhaa loke uppajjeyyu.m dhamma~nca deseyyu.m yathariva bhagavaa. tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. ekacce devaa evamaaha.msu -- `ti.t.thantu, maarisaa, cattaaro sammaasambuddhaa, aho vata, maarisaa, tayo sammaasambuddhaa loke uppajjeyyu.m dhamma~nca deseyyu.m yathariva bhagavaa. tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. ekacce devaa evamaaha.msu -- `ti.t.thantu, maarisaa, tayo ^a^T2.0257^ea^ sammaasambuddhaa, aho vata, maarisaa, dve sammaasambuddhaa loke uppajjeyyu.m dhamma~nca deseyyu.m yathariva bhagavaa. tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte ^a^P2.0225^ea^, bhante, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse etadavoca -- `a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, maarisaa, anavakaaso, ya.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa dve arahanto sammaasambuddhaa apubba.m acarima.m uppajjeyyu.m, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. aho vata, maarisaa, so bhagavaa appaabaadho appaata"nko cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.theyya. tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti. atha kho, bhante, yenatthena devaa taavati.msaa sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m sannisinnaa honti sannipatitaa, ta.m attha.m cintayitvaa ta.m attha.m mantayitvaa vuttavacanaapi ta.m cattaaro mahaaraajaano tasmi.m atthe honti. paccaanusi.t.thavacanaapi ^a^M2.0182^ea^ ta.m cattaaro mahaaraajaano tasmi.m atthe honti, sakesu sakesu aasanesu .thitaa avipakkantaa.
[21] te ^a^V2.0166^ea^ vuttavaakyaa raajaano, pa.tiggayhaanusaasani.m.
[22] vippasannamanaa santaa, a.t.tha.msu samhi aasaneti..

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhante, uttaraaya disaaya u.laaro aaloko sa~njaayi, obhaaso paaturahosi atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. atha kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- `yathaa kho, maarisaa, nimittaani dissanti, u.laaro aaloko sa~njaayati, obhaaso paatubhavati ^a^T2.0258^ea^, brahmaa paatubhavissati; brahmuno heta.m pubbanimitta.m paatubhaavaaya, yadida.m aaloko sa~njaayati obhaaso paatubhavatiiti.
[21] `yathaa nimittaa dissanti, brahmaa paatubhavissati.
[22] brahmuno heta.m nimitta.m, obhaaso vipulo mahaa'ti..

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P2.0226^ea^ kho, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa yathaasakesu aasanesu nisiidi.msu -- `obhaasameta.m ~nassaama, ya.mvipaako bhavissati, sacchikatvaava na.m gamissaamaa'ti. cattaaropi mahaaraajaano yathaasakesu aasanesu nisiidi.msu -- `obhaasameta.m ~nassaama, ya.mvipaako bhavissati, sacchikatvaava na.m gamissaamaa'ti. ida.m sutvaa devaa taavati.msaa ekaggaa samaapajji.msu -- `obhaasameta.m ~nassaama, ya.mvipaako bhavissati, sacchikatvaava na.m gamissaamaa'ti.

[03] ``yadaa, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati, o.laarika.m attabhaava.m abhinimminitvaa paatubhavati. yo kho pana, bhante, brahmuno pakativa.n.no, anabhisambhavaniiyo so devaana.m taavati.msaana.m cakkhupathasmi.m. yadaa, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati, so a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. seyyathaapi, bhante, sova.n.no viggaho maanusa.m viggaha.m atirocati, evameva kho, bhante, yadaa brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m ^a^M2.0183^ea^ taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati, so a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. yadaa, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paatubhavati, na tassa.m parisaaya.m koci devo abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa ^a^T2.0259^ea^ aasanena vaa nimanteti. sabbeva tu.nhiibhuutaa pa~njalikaa palla"nkena nisiidanti -- `yassadaani devassa palla"nka.m icchissati brahmaa sana"nkumaaro, tassa devassa palla"nke nisiidissatii'ti. yassa kho pana, bhante, devassa brahmaa sana"nkumaaro ^a^V2.0167^ea^ palla"nke nisiidati, u.laara.m so labhati devo vedapa.tilaabha.m, u.laara.m so labhati devo somanassapa.tilaabha.m ^a^P2.0227^ea^. seyyathaapi, bhante, raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto adhunaabhisitto rajjena, ^b^u.laara.m so labhati vedapa.tilaabha.m, u.laara.m so labhati somanassapa.tilaabha.m,^eb^ evameva kho, bhante, yassa devassa brahmaa sana"nkumaaro palla"nke nisiidati, u.laara.m so labhati devo vedapa.tilaabha.m, u.laara.m so labhati devo somanassapa.tilaabha.m. atha, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sampasaada.m viditvaa antarahito imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] `modanti vata bho devaa, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata.m..
[21] `nave deve ca passantaa, va.n.navante yasassine.
[22] sugatasmi.m brahmacariya.m, caritvaana idhaagate..
[21] `te a~n~ne atirocanti, va.n.nena yasasaayunaa.
[22] saavakaa bhuuripa~n~nassa, visesuupagataa idha..
[21] `ida.m disvaana nandanti, taavati.msaa sahindakaa.
[22] tathaagata.m namassantaa, dhammassa ca sudhammata'nti..

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ ``imamattha.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro abhaasittha. imamattha.m, bhante ^a^T2.0260^ea^, brahmuno sana"nkumaarassa bhaasato a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato saro hoti vissa.t.tho ca vi~n~neyyo ca ma~nju ca savaniiyo ca bindu ca avisaarii ca gambhiiro ca ninnaadii ca. yathaaparisa.m kho pana, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro sarena vi~n~naapeti, na cassa bahiddhaa parisaaya ghoso niccharati. yassa kho pana, bhante, eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato saro hoti, so vuccati `brahmassaro'ti. atha kho, bhante, devaa taavati.msaa brahmaana.m sana"nkumaara.m etadavocu.m ^a^M2.0184^ea^ -- `saadhu, mahaabrahme, etadeva maya.m sa"nkhaaya modaama; atthi ^a^P2.0228^ea^ ca sakkena devaanamindena tassa bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhuccaa va.n.naa bhaasitaa; te ca maya.m sa"nkhaaya modaamaa'ti.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^V2.0168^ea^, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `saadhu, devaanaminda, mayampi tassa bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne su.neyyaamaa'ti. `eva.m mahaabrahme'ti kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo brahmuno sana"nkumaarassa bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne payirudaahaasi.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nati, bhava.m mahaabrahmaa? yaava~nca so bhagavaa bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. eva.m bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanna.m bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``svaakkhaato kho pana tena bhagavataa dhammo ^a^T2.0261^ea^ sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhi. eva.m opaneyyikassa dhammassa desetaara.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``ida.m kusala'nti kho pana tena bhagavataa supa~n~natta.m, `ida.m akusala'nti supa~n~natta.m, `ida.m saavajja.m ida.m anavajja.m, ida.m sevitabba.m ida.m na sevitabba.m, ida.m hiina.m ida.m pa.niita.m, ida.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga'nti supa~n~natta.m. eva.m kusalaakusalasaavajjaanavajjasevitabbaasevitabbahiinapa.niitaka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagaana.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naapetaara.m. iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva ^a^P2.0229^ea^ atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``supa~n~nattaa kho pana tena bhagavataa saavakaana.m nibbaanagaaminii pa.tipadaa sa.msandati nibbaana~nca pa.tipadaa ca. seyyathaapi naama ga"ngodaka.m yamunodakena sa.msandati ^a^M2.0185^ea^ sameti, evameva supa~n~nattaa tena bhagavataa saavakaana.m nibbaanagaaminii pa.tipadaa sa.msandati nibbaana~nca pa.tipadaa ca. eva.m nibbaanagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya pa~n~naapetaara.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``abhinipphanno ^a^T2.0262^ea^ kho pana tassa bhagavato laabho abhinipphanno siloko, yaava ma~n~ne khattiyaa ^a^V2.0169^ea^ sampiyaayamaanaruupaa viharanti. vigatamado kho pana so bhagavaa aahaara.m aahaareti. eva.m vigatamada.m aahaara.m aaharayamaana.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``laddhasahaayo kho pana so bhagavaa sekhaana~nceva pa.tipannaana.m khii.naasavaana~nca vusitavata.m, te bhagavaa apanujja ekaaraamata.m anuyutto viharati. eva.m ekaaraamata.m anuyutta.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``yathaavaadii kho pana so bhagavaa tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii; iti yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. eva.m dhammaanudhammappa.tippanna.m iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa.

[03] ``ti.n.navicikiccho kho pana so bhagavaa vigatakatha.mkatho pariyositasa"nkappo ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya.m ^a^P2.0230^ea^. eva.m ti.n.navicikiccha.m vigatakatha.mkatha.m pariyositasa"nkappa.m ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya.m. iminaapa"ngena samannaagata.m satthaara.m neva atiita.mse samanupassaama, na panetarahi, a~n~natra tena bhagavataa'ti.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ ``ime kho, bhante, sakko devaanamindo brahmuno sana"nkumaarassa bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne payirudaahaasi. tena suda.m, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro attamano hoti pamudito piitisomanassajaato bhagavato a.t.tha yathaabhucce va.n.ne sutvaa. atha, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro o.laarika.m attabhaava.m abhinimminitvaa kumaarava.n.nii hutvaa pa~ncasikho devaana.m taavati.msaana.m paaturahosi ^a^T2.0263^ea^. so vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe palla"nkena nisiidi. seyyathaapi, bhante, balavaa ^a^M2.0186^ea^ puriso supaccatthate vaa palla"nke same vaa bhuumibhaage palla"nkena nisiideyya, evameva kho, bhante, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe palla"nkena nisiiditvaa deve taavati.mse aamantesi --

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto devaa taavati.msaa, yaava diigharatta.m mahaapa~n~nova so bhagavaa ahosi. bhuutapubba.m, bho, raajaa disampati naama ahosi. disampatissa ra~n~no govindo ^a^V2.0170^ea^ naama braahma.no purohito ahosi. disampatissa ra~n~no re.nu naama kumaaro putto ahosi. govindassa braahma.nassa jotipaalo naama maa.navo putto ahosi. iti re.nu ca raajaputto jotipaalo ca maa.navo a~n~ne ca cha khattiyaa iccete a.t.tha sahaayaa ahesu.m. atha ^a^P2.0231^ea^ kho, bho, ahorattaana.m accayena govindo braahma.no kaalamakaasi. govinde braahma.ne kaala"nkate raajaa disampati paridevesi -- ``yasmi.m vata, bho, maya.m samaye govinde braahma.ne sabbakiccaani sammaa vossajjitvaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarema, tasmi.m no samaye govindo braahma.no kaala"nkato''ti. eva.m vutte bho re.nu raajaputto raajaana.m disampati.m etadavoca -- ``maa kho tva.m, deva, govinde braahma.ne kaala"nkate atibaa.lha.m paridevesi. atthi, deva, govindassa braahma.nassa jotipaalo naama maa.navo ^a^T2.0264^ea^ putto pa.n.ditataro ceva pitaraa, alamatthadasataro ceva pitaraa; yepissa pitaa atthe anusaasi, tepi jotipaalasseva maa.navassa anusaasaniyaa''ti. ``eva.m kumaaraa''ti? ``eva.m devaa''ti.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, raajaa disampati a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yena jotipaalo naama maa.navo tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa jotipaala.m maa.nava.m eva.m vadehi -- `bhavamatthu bhavanta.m jotipaala.m, raajaa disampati bhavanta.m jotipaala.m maa.nava.m aamantayati, raajaa disampati bhoto jotipaalassa maa.navassa dassanakaamo'''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho, bho, so puriso disampatissa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa yena ^a^M2.0187^ea^ jotipaalo maa.navo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa jotipaala.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``bhavamatthu bhavanta.m jotipaala.m, raajaa disampati bhavanta.m jotipaala.m maa.nava.m aamantayati ^a^P2.0232^ea^, raajaa disampati bhoto jotipaalassa maa.navassa dassanakaamo''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho bho jotipaalo maa.navo tassa purisassa pa.tissutvaa yena raajaa disampati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa disampatinaa ra~n~naa saddhi.m sammodi; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho, bho, jotipaala.m maa.nava.m raajaa disampati etadavoca -- ``anusaasatu no bhava.m jotipaalo, maa no bhava.m jotipaalo anusaasaniyaa paccabyaahaasi. pettike ta.m .thaane .thapessaami, govindiye ^a^T2.0265^ea^ abhisi~ncissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho, bho, so jotipaalo maa.navo disampatissa ra~n~no paccassosi. atha kho, bho, raajaa disampati jotipaala.m maa.nava.m govindiye abhisi~nci, ta.m pettike .thaane .thapesi. abhisitto jotipaalo maa.navo govindiye pettike .thaane .thapito yepissa pitaa atthe anusaasi tepi atthe anusaasati, yepissa pitaa atthe naanusaasi, tepi ^a^V2.0171^ea^ atthe anusaasati; yepissa pitaa kammante abhisambhosi, tepi kammante abhisambhoti, yepissa pitaa kammante naabhisambhosi, tepi kammante abhisambhoti. tamena.m manussaa evamaaha.msu -- ``govindo vata, bho, braahma.no, mahaagovindo vata, bho, braahma.no''ti. iminaa kho eva.m, bho, pariyaayena jotipaalassa maa.navassa govindo mahaagovindotveva sama~n~naa udapaadi.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena te cha khattiyaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te cha khattiye etadavoca -- ``disampati kho, bho, raajaa ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato ^a^P2.0233^ea^ vayoanuppatto, ko nu kho pana, bho, jaanaati jiivita.m? .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m disampatimhi ra~n~ne kaala"nkate raajakattaaro re.nu.m raajaputta.m rajje abhisi~nceyyu.m. aayantu, bhonto, yena re.nu raajaputto tenupasa"nkamatha; upasa"nkamitvaa re.nu.m raajaputta.m eva.m vadetha -- ``maya.m kho bhoto re.nussa sahaayaa piyaa manaapaa appa.tikuulaa, ya.msukho bhava.m ^a^M2.0188^ea^ ta.msukhaa maya.m, ya.mdukkho bhava.m ta.mdukkhaa maya.m. disampati kho, bho, raajaa ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, ko nu kho pana, bho, jaanaati jiivita.m? .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m disampatimhi ra~n~ne kaala"nkate raajakattaaro bhavanta.m re.nu.m rajje abhisi~nceyyu.m. sace bhava.m re.nu rajja.m labhetha, sa.mvibhajetha no rajjenaa''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho, bho, te cha khattiyaa mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena re.nu raajaputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa re.nu.m raajaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``maya.m kho bhoto re.nussa sahaayaa piyaa manaapaa appa.tikuulaa ^a^T2.0266^ea^; ya.msukho bhava.m ta.msukhaa maya.m, ya.mdukkho bhava.m ta.mdukkhaa maya.m. disampati kho, bho, raajaa ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, ko nu kho pana bho jaanaati jiivita.m? .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m disampatimhi ra~n~ne kaala"nkate raajakattaaro bhavanta.m re.nu.m rajje abhisi~nceyyu.m. sace bhava.m re.nu rajja.m labhetha, sa.mvibhajetha no rajjenaa''ti. ``ko nu kho, bho, a~n~no mama vijite sukho bhavetha {sukhaa bhaveyyaatha (ka0), sukha.m bhaveyyaatha, sukhamedheyyaatha (sii0 pii0),sukha medhetha (?)}, a~n~natra bhavantebhi? sacaaha.m, bho, rajja.m labhissaami, sa.mvibhajissaami vo rajjenaa'''ti.

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P2.0234^ea^ kho, bho, ahorattaana.m accayena raajaa disampati kaalamakaasi. disampatimhi ra~n~ne kaala"nkate raajakattaaro re.nu.m raajaputta.m rajje abhisi~nci.msu. abhisitto re.nu rajjena ^a^T2.0267^ea^ pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti. atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena te cha khattiyaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te cha khattiye etadavoca ^a^V2.0172^ea^ -- ``disampati kho, bho, raajaa kaala"nkato. abhisitto re.nu rajjena pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti. ko nu kho pana, bho, jaanaati, madaniiyaa kaamaa? aayantu, bhonto, yena re.nu raajaa tenupasa"nkamatha; upasa"nkamitvaa re.nu.m raajaana.m eva.m vadetha -- disampati kho, bho, raajaa kaala"nkato, abhisitto bhava.m re.nu rajjena, sarati bhava.m ta.m vacana'''nti?

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ```eva.m ^a^M2.0189^ea^, bho''ti kho, bho, te cha khattiyaa mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena re.nu raajaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa re.nu.m raajaana.m etadavocu.m -- ``disampati kho, bho, raajaa kaala"nkato, abhisitto bhava.m re.nu rajjena, sarati bhava.m ta.m vacana''nti? ``saraamaha.m, bho, ta.m vacana.m {vacananti (syaa0 ka0)}. ko nu kho, bho, pahoti ima.m mahaapathavi.m uttarena aayata.m dakkhi.nena saka.tamukha.m sattadhaa sama.m suvibhatta.m vibhajitu''nti? ``ko nu kho, bho, a~n~no pahoti, a~n~natra mahaagovindena braahma.nenaa''ti? atha kho, bho, re.nu raajaa a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yena mahaagovindo braahma.no tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m eva.m vadehi -- `raajaa ta.m, bhante, re.nu aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P2.0235^ea^ devaa''ti kho, bho, so puriso re.nussa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa ^a^T2.0268^ea^ yena mahaagovindo braahma.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``raajaa ta.m, bhante, re.nu aamantetii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no tassa purisassa pa.tissutvaa yena re.nu raajaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa re.nunaa ra~n~naa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho, bho, mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m re.nu raajaa etadavoca -- ``etu, bhava.m govindo, ima.m mahaapathavi.m uttarena aayata.m dakkhi.nena saka.tamukha.m sattadhaa sama.m suvibhatta.m vibhajatuu''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho mahaagovindo braahma.no re.nussa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa ima.m mahaapathavi.m uttarena aayata.m dakkhi.nena saka.tamukha.m sattadhaa sama.m suvibhatta.m vibhaji. sabbaani saka.tamukhaani pa.t.thapesi {a.t.thapesi (sii0 pii0)}. tatra suda.m majjhe re.nussa ra~n~no janapado hoti.
[03] 309^b^.^eb^ dantapura.m kali"ngaana.m {kaali"ngaana.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}, assakaana~nca potana.m.
[22] mahesaya.m {maahissati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} avantiina.m, soviiraana~nca roruka.m..
[21] mithilaa ca videhaana.m, campaa a"ngesu maapitaa.
[22] baaraa.nasii ca kaasiina.m, ete govindamaapitaati..

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M2.0190^ea^ ^a^V2.0173^ea^ ^a^P2.0236^ea^ kho, bho, te cha khattiyaa yathaasakena laabhena attamanaa ahesu.m paripu.n.nasa"nkappaa -- ``ya.m vata no ahosi icchita.m, ya.m aaka"nkhita.m, ya.m adhippeta.m, ya.m abhipatthita.m, ta.m no laddha''nti.
[21] ``sattabhuu ^a^T2.0269^ea^ brahmadatto ca, vessabhuu bharato saha.
[22] re.nu dve dhatara.t.thaa ca, tadaasu.m satta bhaaradhaa'ti..
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, te cha khattiyaa yena mahaagovindo braahma.no tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``yathaa kho bhava.m govindo re.nussa ra~n~no sahaayo piyo manaapo appa.tikuulo. evameva kho bhava.m govindo amhaakampi sahaayo piyo manaapo appa.tikuulo, anusaasatu no bhava.m govindo; maa no bhava.m govindo anusaasaniyaa paccabyaahaasii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho mahaagovindo braahma.no tesa.m channa.m khattiyaana.m paccassosi. atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no satta ca raajaano khattiye muddhaavasitte rajje {muddhaabhisitte rajjena (syaa0)} anusaasi, satta ca braahma.namahaasaale satta ca nhaatakasataani mante vaacesi.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P2.0237^ea^ kho, bho, mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa aparena samayena eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchi {abbhugga~nchi (sii0 pii0)} -- ``sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmaana.m passati, sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmunaa saakaccheti sallapati mantetii''ti. atha kho, bho, mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``mayha.m kho eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmaana.m passati, sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmunaa saakaccheti ^a^T2.0270^ea^ sallapati mantetii'ti. na kho panaaha.m brahmaana.m passaami, na brahmunaa saakacchemi, na brahmunaa sallapaami ^a^M2.0191^ea^, na brahmunaa mantemi. suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyati, karu.na.m ^a^V2.0174^ea^ jhaana.m jhaayati, so brahmaana.m passati brahmunaa saakaccheti brahmunaa sallapati brahmunaa mantetii'ti. ya.mnuunaaha.m vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyeyya.m, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayeyya''nti.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena re.nu raajaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa re.nu.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``mayha.m kho, bho, eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmaana.m passati, sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmunaa saakaccheti sallapati mantetii'ti. na kho panaaha.m, bho, brahmaana.m passaami, na brahmunaa saakacchemi, na brahmunaa sallapaami, na brahmunaa mantemi. suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyati, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayati, so brahmaana.m passati, brahmunaa saakaccheti brahmunaa sallapati brahmunaa mantetii'ti. icchaamaha.m, bho, vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyitu.m, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayitu.m; namhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo a~n~natra ekena bhattaabhihaarenaa''ti. ``yassadaani bhava.m govindo kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P2.0238^ea^ kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena ^a^T2.0271^ea^ te cha khattiyaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te cha khattiye etadavoca -- ``mayha.m kho, bho, eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmaana.m passati, sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmunaa saakaccheti sallapati mantetii'ti. na kho panaaha.m, bho, brahmaana.m passaami, na brahmunaa saakacchemi, na brahmunaa sallapaami, na brahmunaa mantemi. suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m, `yo vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyati, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayati, so brahmaana.m passati brahmunaa saakaccheti brahmunaa sallapati brahmunaa mantetii'ti. icchaamaha.m, bho, vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyitu.m, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayitu.m; namhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo a~n~natra ekena bhattaabhihaarenaa''ti. ``yassadaani bhava.m govindo kaala.m ma~n~natii'''ti.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M2.0192^ea^ kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena te satta ca braahma.namahaasaalaa satta ca nhaatakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te satta ca braahma.namahaasaale satta ca nhaatakasataani etadavoca -- ``mayha.m kho, bho, eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmaana.m passati, sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmunaa saakaccheti sallapati mantetii'ti. na kho panaaha.m, bho, brahmaana.m passaami, na brahmunaa saakacchemi, na brahmunaa ^a^V2.0175^ea^ sallapaami, na brahmunaa mantemi. suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m ^a^T2.0272^ea^ mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyati, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayati, so brahmaana.m passati, brahmunaa saakaccheti, brahmunaa sallapati, brahmunaa mantetii'ti. tena hi, bho, yathaasute yathaapariyatte mante vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karotha, a~n~nama~n~na~nca mante vaacetha; icchaamaha.m, bho, vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyitu.m, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayitu.m; namhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo a~n~natra ekena bhattaabhihaarenaa''ti. ``yassa daani bhava.m govindo kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P2.0239^ea^ kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena cattaariisaa bhariyaa saadisiyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa cattaariisaa bhariyaa saadisiyo etadavoca -- ``mayha.m kho, bhotii, eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmaana.m passati, sakkhi mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmunaa saakaccheti sallapati mantetii'ti. na kho panaaha.m, bhotii, brahmaana.m passaami, na brahmunaa saakacchemi, na brahmunaa sallapaami, na brahmunaa mantemi. suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m `yo vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyati, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayati, so brahmaana.m passati, brahmunaa saakaccheti, brahmunaa sallapati, brahmunaa mantetiiti, icchaamaha.m, bhotii, vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyitu.m, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayitu.m; namhi kenaci upasa"nkamitabbo a~n~natra ekena bhattaabhihaarenaa''ti. ``yassa daani bhava.m govindo kaala.m ^a^T2.0273^ea^ ma~n~natii'''ti.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no puratthimena nagarassa nava.m sandhaagaara.m kaaraapetvaa vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyi, karu.na.m ^a^M2.0193^ea^ jhaana.m jhaayi; naassudha koci upasa"nkamati {upasa"nkami (pii0)} a~n~natra ekena bhattaabhihaarena. atha kho, bho, mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa catunna.m maasaana.m accayena ahudeva ukka.n.thanaa ahu paritassanaa -- ``suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo vassike cattaaro maase pa.tisalliiyati, karu.na.m jhaana.m jhaayati, so brahmaana.m passati, brahmunaa saakaccheti brahmunaa sallapati brahmunaa mantetii'ti. na kho panaaha.m brahmaana.m passaami, na brahmunaa saakacchemi na brahmunaa sallapaami na brahmunaa mantemii'''ti.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^V2.0176^ea^ kho, bho, brahmaa sana"nkumaaro mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya ^a^P2.0240^ea^ seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva, brahmaloke antarahito mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa sammukhe paaturahosi. atha kho, bho, mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa ahudeva bhaya.m ahu chambhitatta.m ahu lomaha.mso yathaa ta.m adi.t.thapubba.m ruupa.m disvaa. atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato brahmaana.m sana"nkumaara.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ```va.n.navaa ^a^T2.0274^ea^ yasavaa sirimaa, ko nu tvamasi maarisa.
[22] ajaanantaa ta.m pucchaama, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya''nti..
[21] ``ma.m ve kumaara.m jaananti, brahmaloke sanantana.m {sanantica (ka0)}.
[22] sabbe jaananti ma.m devaa, eva.m govinda jaanahi''..
[21] ```aasana.m udaka.m pajja.m, madhusaaka~nca {madhupaaka~nca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} brahmuno.
[22] agghe bhavanta.m pucchaama, aggha.m kurutu no bhava.m''..
[21] ``pa.tigga.nhaama te aggha.m, ya.m tva.m govinda bhaasasi.
[27] di.t.thadhammahitatthaaya, samparaaya sukhaaya ca.
[22] kataavakaaso pucchassu, ya.m ki~nci abhipatthita''nti..

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``kataavakaaso khomhi brahmunaa sana"nkumaarena. ki.m nu kho aha.m brahmaana.m sana"nkumaara.m ^a^M2.0194^ea^ puccheyya.m di.t.thadhammika.m vaa attha.m samparaayika.m vaa'ti? atha ^a^P2.0241^ea^ kho, bho, mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- `kusalo kho aha.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m atthaana.m, a~n~nepi ma.m di.t.thadhammika.m attha.m pucchanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m brahmaana.m sana"nkumaara.m samparaayika~n~neva attha.m puccheyya'nti. atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no brahmaana.m sana"nkumaara.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``pucchaami ^a^V2.0177^ea^ brahmaana.m sana"nkumaara.m,
[27] ka"nkhii aka"nkhi.m paravediyesu.
[26] kattha.t.thito kimhi ca sikkhamaano,
[22] pappoti ^a^T2.0275^ea^ macco amata.m brahmaloka''nti..
[21] ``hitvaa mamatta.m manujesu brahme,
[27] ekodibhuuto karu.nedhimutto {karu.naadhimutto (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
[26] niraamagandho virato methunasmaa,
[27] ettha.t.thito ettha ca sikkhamaano.
[22] pappoti macco amata.m brahmaloka''nti..

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ``hitvaa mamatta'nti aha.m bhoto aajaanaami. idhekacco appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, `iti hitvaa mamatta'nti aha.m bhoto aajaanaami. `ekodibhuuto'ti ^a^P2.0242^ea^ aha.m bhoto aajaanaami. idhekacco vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m, iti ekodibhuuto'ti aha.m bhoto aajaanaami. `karu.nedhimutto'ti aha.m bhoto aajaanaami. idhekacco karu.naasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadhotiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m karu.naasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena ^a^T2.0276^ea^ averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. iti `karu.nedhimutto'ti aha.m bhoto aajaanaami. aamagandhe ca kho aha.m bhoto bhaasamaanassa na aajaanaami.
[21] ``ke ^a^M2.0195^ea^ aamagandhaa manujesu brahme,
[27] ete avidvaa idha bruuhi dhiira.
[26] kenaava.taa {kenaavu.taa (syaa0)} vaati pajaa kurutu {kururuu (syaa0), kuru.t.tharuu (pii0), kuruuru (?)},
[22] aapaayikaa nivutabrahmalokaa''ti..
[21] ``kodho ^a^P2.0243^ea^ mosavajja.m nikati ca dubbho,
[27] kadariyataa atimaano usuuyaa.
[26] icchaa ^a^V2.0178^ea^ vivicchaa parahe.thanaa ca,
[27] lobho ca doso ca mado ca moho.
[26] etesu yuttaa aniraamagandhaa,
[22] aapaayikaa nivutabrahmalokaa''ti..

[03] ``yathaa kho aha.m bhoto aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa aajaanaami. te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa. pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. ``yassadaani bhava.m govindo kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena re.nu raajaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa re.nu.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``a~n~na.m daani bhava.m purohita.m pariyesatu, yo bhoto rajja.m anusaasissati. icchaamaha.m, bho ^a^T2.0277^ea^, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa. pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti.
[21] ``aamantayaami raajaana.m, re.nu.m bhuumipati.m aha.m.
[22] tva.m pajaanassu rajjena, naaha.m porohicce rame''..
[21] ``sace te uuna.m kaamehi, aha.m paripuurayaami te.
[27] yo ta.m hi.msati vaaremi, bhuumisenaapati aha.m.
[22] tuva.m pitaa aha.m putto, maa no govinda paajahi'' {paajehi (a.t.thakathaaya.m sa.mva.n.nitapaa.thantara.m)}..
[21] ``namatthi uuna.m kaamehi, hi.msitaa me na vijjati.
[22] amanussavaco sutvaa, tasmaaha.m na gahe rame''..
[21] ``amanusso ^a^M2.0196^ea^ ^a^P2.0244^ea^ katha.mva.n.no, ki.m te attha.m abhaasatha.
[22] ya~nca sutvaa jahaasi no, gehe amhe ca kevalii''..
[21] ``upavutthassa ^a^V2.0179^ea^ me pubbe, yi.t.thukaamassa me sato.
[22] aggi pajjalito aasi, kusapattaparitthato''..
[21] ``tato me brahmaa paaturahu, brahmalokaa sanantano.
[22] so me pa~nha.m viyaakaasi, ta.m sutvaa na gahe rame''..
[21] ``saddahaami aha.m bhoto, ya.m tva.m govinda bhaasasi.
[22] amanussavaco sutvaa, katha.m vattetha a~n~nathaa..
[21] ``te ta.m anuvattissaama, satthaa govinda no bhava.m.
[27] ma.ni ^a^T2.0278^ea^ yathaa ve.luriyo, akaaco vimalo subho.
[22] eva.m suddhaa carissaama, govindassaanusaasane''ti..
[03] ```sace bhava.m govindo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati, mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama. atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena te cha khattiyaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te cha khattiye etadavoca -- ``a~n~na.m daani bhavanto purohita.m pariyesantu, yo bhavantaana.m rajje anusaasissati. icchaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa. pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. atha kho, bho, te cha khattiyaa ekamanta.m apakkamma eva.m ^a^P2.0245^ea^ samacintesu.m -- ``ime kho braahma.naa naama dhanaluddhaa; ya.mnuuna maya.m mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m dhanena sikkheyyaamaa''ti. te mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``sa.mvijjati kho, bho, imesu sattasu rajjesu pahuuta.m saapateyya.m, tato bhoto yaavatakena attho, taavataka.m aahariiyata''nti. ``ala.m, bho, mamapida.m pahuuta.m saapateyya.m bhavantaana.myeva vaahasaa. tamaha.m sabba.m pahaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaami. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ^a^M2.0197^ea^ ajjhaavasataa, pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. atha kho, bho, te cha khattiyaa ekamanta.m apakkamma eva.m samacintesu.m ^a^T2.0279^ea^ -- ``ime ^a^V2.0180^ea^ kho braahma.naa naama itthiluddhaa; ya.mnuuna maya.m mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m itthiihi sikkheyyaamaa''ti. te mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``sa.mvijjanti kho, bho, imesu sattasu rajjesu pahuutaa itthiyo, tato bhoto yaavatikaahi attho, taavatikaa aaniiyata''nti. ``ala.m, bho, mamapimaa {mamapitaa (ka0), mamapi (sii0)} cattaariisaa bhariyaa saadisiyo. taapaaha.m sabbaa pahaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaami. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa, pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariyanti''.
[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ``sace ^a^P2.0246^ea^ bhava.m govindo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati, mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatiiti.
[21] ``sace jahatha kaamaani, yattha satto puthujjano.
[22] aarambhavho da.lhaa hotha, khantibalasamaahitaa..
[21] ``esa maggo ujumaggo, esa maggo anuttaro.
[22] saddhammo sabbhi rakkhito, brahmalokuupapattiyaati..
[03] ``tena hi bhava.m govindo satta vassaani aagametu. sattanna.m vassaana.m accayena mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ```aticira.m kho, bho, satta vassaani, naaha.m sakkomi, bhavante, satta vassaani aagametu.m. ko ^a^T2.0280^ea^ nu kho pana, bho, jaanaati jiivitaana.m! gamaniiyo samparaayo, mantaaya.m {mantaaya (bahuusu)} boddhabba.m, kattabba.m kusala.m, caritabba.m brahmacariya.m, natthi jaatassa amara.na.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa, pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya'''nti. ``tena hi bhava.m govindo chabbassaani aagametu...pe0... pa~nca vassaani aagametu... cattaari vassaani aagametu... tii.ni vassaani aagametu... dve vassaani aagametu... eka.m vassa.m ^a^M2.0198^ea^ aagametu, ekassa vassassa accayena mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ```aticira.m kho, bho, eka.m vassa.m, naaha.m sakkomi bhavante ^a^P2.0247^ea^ eka.m vassa.m aagametu.m. ko nu kho pana, bho, jaanaati jiivitaana.m! gamaniiyo samparaayo, mantaaya.m boddhabba.m, kattabba.m kusala.m ^a^V2.0181^ea^, caritabba.m brahmacariya.m, natthi jaatassa amara.na.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa, pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. ``tena hi bhava.m govindo satta maasaani aagametu, sattanna.m maasaana.m accayena mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ```aticira.m kho, bho, satta maasaani, naaha.m sakkomi bhavante satta maasaani aagametu.m. ko nu kho pana, bho, jaanaati jiivitaana.m. gamaniiyo samparaayo, mantaaya.m boddhabba.m ^a^T2.0281^ea^, kattabba.m kusala.m, caritabba.m brahmacariya.m, natthi jaatassa amara.na.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa, pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti.

[03] ```tena hi bhava.m govindo cha maasaani aagametu...pe0... pa~nca maasaani aagametu... cattaari maasaani aagametu... tii.ni maasaani aagametu... dve maasaani aagametu... eka.m maasa.m aagametu... addhamaasa.m aagametu, addhamaasassa accayena mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ```aticira.m kho, bho, addhamaaso, naaha.m sakkomi bhavante addhamaasa.m aagametu.m. ko nu kho pana, bho, jaanaati jiivitaana.m! gamaniiyo samparaayo, mantaaya.m boddhabba.m, kattabba.m kusala.m, caritabba.m brahmacariya.m, natthi jaatassa amara.na.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa, pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. ``tena ^a^P2.0248^ea^ hi bhava.m govindo sattaaha.m aagametu, yaava maya.m sake puttabhaataro rajjena {rajje (syaa0)} anusaasissaama, sattaahassa ^a^M2.0199^ea^ accayena mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti. ``na cira.m kho, bho, sattaaha.m, aagamessaamaha.m bhavante sattaaha''nti.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena te satta ca braahma.namahaasaalaa ^a^T2.0282^ea^ satta ca nhaatakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te satta ca braahma.namahaasaale satta ca nhaatakasataani ^a^V2.0182^ea^ etadavoca -- ``a~n~na.m daani bhavanto aacariya.m pariyesantu, yo bhavantaana.m mante vaacessati. icchaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa. te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa, pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. ``maa bhava.m govindo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji. pabbajjaa, bho, appesakkhaa ca appalaabhaa ca; brahma~n~na.m mahesakkha~nca mahaalaabha~ncaa''ti. ``maa bhavanto eva.m avacuttha -- ``pabbajjaa appesakkhaa ca appalaabhaa ca, brahma~n~na.m mahesakkha~nca mahaalaabha~ncaa''ti. ko nu kho, bho, a~n~natra mayaa mahesakkhataro vaa mahaalaabhataro vaa! aha~nhi, bho, etarahi raajaava ra~n~na.m brahmaava braahma.naana.m {brahmaana.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} devataava gahapatikaana.m. tamaha.m sabba.m pahaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaami. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ^a^P2.0249^ea^ ajjhaavasataa. pabbajissaamaha.m, bho, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. ``sace bhava.m govindo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati, mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no yena cattaariisaa bhariyaa ^a^T2.0283^ea^ saadisiyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa cattaariisaa bhariyaa saadisiyo etadavoca -- ``yaa bhotiina.m icchati, sakaani vaa ~naatikulaani gacchatu a~n~na.m vaa bhattaara.m pariyesatu. icchaamaha.m, bhotii, agaarasmaa ^a^M2.0200^ea^ anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. yathaa kho pana me suta.m brahmuno aamagandhe bhaasamaanassa, te na sunimmadayaa agaara.m ajjhaavasataa. pabbajissaamaha.m, bhotii, agaarasmaa anagaariya''nti. ``tva~n~neva no ~naati ~naatikaamaana.m, tva.m pana bhattaa bhattukaamaana.m. sace bhava.m govindo agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati, mayampi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaama, atha yaa te gati, saa no gati bhavissatii''ti.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bho, mahaagovindo braahma.no tassa sattaahassa accayena kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji. pabbajita.m pana mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m satta ca raajaano khattiyaa muddhaavasittaa satta ca braahma.namahaasaalaa satta ca nhaatakasataani cattaariisaa ca bhariyaa saadisiyo anekaani ca khattiyasahassaani anekaani ^a^V2.0183^ea^ ca braahma.nasahassaani anekaani ca gahapatisahassaani anekehi ca itthaagaarehi itthiyo kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa mahaagovinda.m braahma.na.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajita.m anupabbaji.msu. taaya suda.m, bho, parisaaya parivuto mahaagovindo braahma.no gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu ^a^P2.0250^ea^ caarika.m carati. ya.m kho pana, bho, tena samayena mahaagovindo braahma.no ^a^T2.0284^ea^ gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upasa"nkamati, tattha raajaava hoti ra~n~na.m, brahmaava braahma.naana.m, devataava gahapatikaana.m. tena kho pana samayena manussaa khipanti vaa upakkhalanti vaa te evamaaha.msu -- ``namatthu mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa, namatthu satta purohitassaa'''ti.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ``mahaagovindo, bho, braahma.no mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa vihaasi, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa vihaasi. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... abyaapajjena pharitvaa vihaasi saavakaana~nca brahmalokasahabyataaya magga.m desesi.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^M2.0201^ea^ kho pana, bho, tena samayena mahaagovindassa braahma.nassa saavakaa sabbena sabba.m saasana.m aajaani.msu. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m brahmaloka.m upapajji.msu. ye na sabbena sabba.m saasana.m aajaani.msu, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa appekacce paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu; appekacce nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu; appekacce tusitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu; appekacce yaamaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m ^a^P2.0251^ea^ upapajji.msu; appekacce taavati.msaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu; appekacce caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajji.msu; ye sabbanihiina.m kaaya.m paripuuresu.m ^a^T2.0285^ea^ te gandhabbakaaya.m paripuuresu.m. iti kho, bho {pana (syaa0 ka0)}, sabbesa.myeva tesa.m kulaputtaana.m amoghaa pabbajjaa ahosi ava~njhaa saphalaa saudrayaa'''ti.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ``sarati ta.m bhagavaa''ti? ``saraamaha.m, pa~ncasikha. aha.m tena samayena mahaagovindo braahma.no ahosi.m. aha.m tesa.m saavakaana.m brahmalokasahabyataaya magga.m desesi.m. ta.m kho pana me, pa~ncasikha, brahmacariya.m na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva brahmalokuupapattiyaa.
