[03] ida.m ^a^V2.0184^ea^ kho pana me, pa~ncasikha, brahmacariya.m ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. katama~nca ta.m, pa~ncasikha, brahmacariya.m ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. ida.m kho ta.m, pa~ncasikha, brahmacariya.m ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ ``ye kho pana me, pa~ncasikha, saavakaa sabbena sabba.m saasana.m aajaananti, te aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^P2.0252^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti; ye na sabbena ^a^T2.0286^ea^ sabba.m saasana.m aajaananti, te pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa ^a^M2.0202^ea^ opapaatikaa honti tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. ye na sabbena sabba.m saasana.m aajaananti, appekacce ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamino honti sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti {karonti (sii0 pii0)}. ye na sabbena sabba.m saasana.m aajaananti, appekacce ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa honti avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa. iti kho, pa~ncasikha, sabbesa.myeva imesa.m kulaputtaana.m amoghaa pabbajjaa {pabbajaa ahosi (ka0)} ava~njhaa saphalaa saudrayaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano pa~ncasikho gandhabbaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayiiti.
[06] mahaagovindasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0287^ea^ ^a^M2.0203^ea^ ^a^V2.0185^ea^ me ^a^P2.0253^ea^ suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m mahaavane mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi; dasahi ca lokadhaatuuhi devataa yebhuyyena sannipatitaa honti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. atha kho catunna.m suddhaavaasakaayikaana.m devataana.m {devaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m mahaavane mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi; dasahi ca lokadhaatuuhi devataa yebhuyyena sannipatitaa honti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. ya.mnuuna mayampi yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato santike pacceka.m gaatha.m {paccekagaatha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0), paccekagaathaa (ka0 sii0)} bhaaseyyaamaa''ti.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ atha kho taa devataa seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya ^a^P2.0254^ea^, evameva suddhaavaasesu devesu antarahitaa bhagavato purato paaturahesu.m. atha kho taa devataa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho ekaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``mahaasamayo pavanasmi.m, devakaayaa samaagataa.
[22] aagatamha ^a^T2.0288^ea^ ima.m dhammasamaya.m, dakkhitaaye aparaajitasa"ngha''nti..
[03] atha kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``tatra bhikkhavo samaadaha.msu, cittamattano ujuka.m aka.msu {ujukamaka.msu (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
[22] saarathiiva nettaani gahetvaa, indriyaani rakkhanti pa.n.ditaa''ti..
[03] atha ^a^V2.0186^ea^ kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``chetvaa khiila.m chetvaa paligha.m, indakhiila.m uuhacca {uhacca (ka0)} manejaa.
[22] te caranti suddhaa vimalaa, cakkhumataa sudantaa susunaagaa''ti..
[03] atha ^a^M2.0204^ea^ ^a^P2.0255^ea^ kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``yekeci buddha.m sara.na.m gataase, na te gamissanti apaayabhuumi.m.
[22] pahaaya maanusa.m deha.m, devakaaya.m paripuuressantii''ti..

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, dasasu lokadhaatuusu devataa sannipatitaa honti {( ) sii0 ipotthakesu natthi}, tathaagata.m dassanaaya bhikkhusa"ngha~nca ^a^T2.0289^ea^. yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tesampi bhagavantaana.m eta.mparamaayeva {etaparamaayeva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} devataa sannipatitaa ahesu.m seyyathaapi mayha.m etarahi. yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tesampi bhagavantaana.m eta.mparamaayeva devataa sannipatitaa bhavissanti seyyathaapi mayha.m etarahi. aacikkhissaami, bhikkhave, devakaayaana.m naamaani; kittayissaami, bhikkhave, devakaayaana.m naamaani; desessaami, bhikkhave, devakaayaana.m naamaani. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m.
[03] 334^b^.^eb^ bhagavaa etadavoca --
[21] ``silokamanukassaami, yattha bhummaa tadassitaa.
[22] ye sitaa girigabbhara.m, pahitattaa samaahitaa..
[21] ``puthuusiihaava salliinaa, lomaha.msaabhisambhuno.
[22] odaatamanasaa suddhaa, vippasannamanaavilaa'' {vippasannaamanaavilaa (pii0 ka0)}..
[21] bhiyyo ^a^V2.0187^ea^ ^a^P2.0256^ea^ pa~ncasate ~natvaa, vane kaapilavatthave.
[22] tato aamantayii satthaa, saavake saasane rate..

[22] te ca aatappamakaru.m, sutvaa buddhassa saasana.m..
[21] tesa.m paaturahu ~naa.na.m, amanussaanadassana.m.
[22] appeke satamaddakkhu.m, sahassa.m atha sattari.m..
[21] sata.m ^a^M2.0205^ea^ eke sahassaana.m, amanussaanamaddasu.m.

[21] ta~nca sabba.m abhi~n~naaya, vavatthitvaana {vavakkhitvaana (sii0 syaa0 pii0), avekkhitvaana (.tiikaa)} cakkhumaa.
[22] tato aamantayii satthaa, saavake saasane rate..
[21] ``devakaayaa abhikkantaa, te vijaanaatha bhikkhavo.
[22] ye voha.m kittayissaami, giraahi anupubbaso..
[03] 335^b^.^eb^``sattasahassaa te yakkhaa, bhummaa kaapilavatthavaa.
[27] iddhimanto jutimanto, va.n.navanto yasassino.
[22] modamaanaa abhikkaamu.m, bhikkhuuna.m samiti.m vana.m..
[21] ``chasahassaa hemavataa, yakkhaa naanattava.n.nino.
[27] iddhimanto jutiimanto {jutiimanto (sii0 pii0)}, va.n.navanto yasassino.
[22] modamaanaa abhikkaamu.m, bhikkhuuna.m samiti.m vana.m..
[21] ``saataagiraa tisahassaa, yakkhaa naanattava.n.nino.
[27] iddhimanto jutimanto, va.n.navanto yasassino.
[22] modamaanaa abhikkaamu.m, bhikkhuuna.m samiti.m vana.m..
[21] ``iccete ^a^V2.0188^ea^ so.lasasahassaa, yakkhaa naanattava.n.nino.
[27] iddhimanto jutimanto, va.n.navanto yasassino.
[22] modamaanaa abhikkaamu.m, bhikkhuuna.m samiti.m vana.m..
[21] ``vessaamittaa ^a^P2.0257^ea^ pa~ncasataa, yakkhaa naanattava.n.nino.
[27] iddhimanto jutimanto, va.n.navanto yasassino.
[22] modamaanaa ^a^T2.0291^ea^ abhikkaamu.m, bhikkhuuna.m samiti.m vana.m..
[21] ``kumbhiiro raajagahiko, vepullassa nivesana.m.
[27] bhiyyo na.m satasahassa.m, yakkhaana.m payirupaasati.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^``purima~nca disa.m raajaa, dhatara.t.tho pasaasati.

[22] kumbha.n.daana.m adhipati, mahaaraajaa yasassiso..

[27] iddhimanto jutimanto, va.n.navanto yasassino.

[22] maayaa ku.te.n.du vi.te.n.du {ve.te.n.du (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, vi.tucca {vi.tuu ca (syaa0)} vi.tu.to saha..

[03] 338^b^.^eb^``athaagu.m ^a^V2.0190^ea^ naagasaa naagaa, vesaalaa sahatacchakaa.
[22] kambalassataraa ^a^T2.0293^ea^ aagu.m, paayaagaa saha ~naatibhi..
[21] ``yaamunaa dhatara.t.thaa ca, aaguu naagaa yasassino.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0298^ea^ ^a^M2.0211^ea^ ^a^V2.0194^ea^ ^a^P2.0264^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu viharati, paaciinato raajagahassa ambasa.n.daa naama braahma.nagaamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasaalaguhaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena sakkassa devaanamindassa ussukka.m udapaadi bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. atha kho sakkassa devaanamindassa etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti? addasaa kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavanta.m magadhesu viharanta.m paaciinato raajagahassa ambasa.n.daa naama braahma.nagaamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasaalaguhaaya.m. disvaana deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- ``aya.m, maarisaa, bhagavaa magadhesu viharati, paaciinato raajagahassa ambasa.n.daa naama braahma.nagaamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasaalaguhaaya.m. yadi pana, maarisaa, maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyyaama arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti? ``eva.m bhaddantavaa''ti kho devaa taavati.msaa sakkassa devaanamindassa paccassosu.m.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ atha kho sakko devaanamindo pa~ncasikha.m gandhabbadevaputta.m {gandhabbaputta.m (syaa0)} aamantesi -- ``aya.m, taata pa~ncasikha, bhagavaa magadhesu viharati paaciinato raajagahassa ambasa.n.daa naama braahma.nagaamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasaalaguhaaya.m. yadi pana ^a^T2.0299^ea^, taata pa~ncasikha, maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyyaama arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti? ``eva.m bhaddantavaa''ti kho pa~ncasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa beluvapa.n.duvii.na.m aadaaya sakkassa devaanamindassa anucariya.m upaagami.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ atha kho sakko devaanamindo devehi taavati.msehi parivuto pa~ncasikhena gandhabbadevaputtena purakkhato seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya; evameva devesu taavati.msesu antarahito magadhesu paaciinato raajagahassa ambasa.n.daa naama braahma.nagaamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate paccu.t.thaasi. tena kho pana ^a^V2.0195^ea^ samayena vediyako pabbato ^a^M2.0212^ea^ atiriva obhaasajaato hoti ambasa.n.daa ca braahma.nagaamo yathaa ta.m devaana.m devaanubhaavena. apissuda.m parito gaamesu manussaa evamaaha.msu -- ``aadittassu naamajja vediyako pabbato jhaayatisu {jhaayatassu (syaa0), pajjhaayitassu (sii0 pii0)} naamajja vediyako pabbato jalatisu {jalatassu (syaa0), jalitassu (sii0 pii0)} naamajja vediyako pabbato ki.msu naamajja vediyako pabbato atiriva obhaasajaato ambasa.n.daa ca braahma.nagaamo''ti sa.mviggaa lomaha.t.thajaataa ahesu.m.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ atha kho sakko devaanamindo pa~ncasikha.m gandhabbadevaputta.m aamantesi -- ``durupasa"nkamaa ^a^P2.0265^ea^ kho, taata pa~ncasikha, tathaagataa maadisena, jhaayii jhaanarataa, tadantara.m {tadanantara.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)} pa.tisalliinaa. yadi pana tva.m, taata pa~ncasikha, bhagavanta.m pa.thama.m pasaadeyyaasi, tayaa, taata, pa.thama.m pasaadita.m pacchaa maya.m ^a^T2.0300^ea^ ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyyaama arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. ``eva.m bhaddantavaa''ti kho pa~ncasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa beluvapa.n.duvii.na.m aadaaya yena indasaalaguhaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ``ettaavataa me bhagavaa neva atiduure bhavissati naaccaasanne, sadda~nca me sossatii''ti ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte bhagavaa pa~ncasikha.m gandhabbadevaputta.m etadavoca -- ``sa.msandati ^a^T2.0302^ea^ kho te, pa~ncasikha, tantissaro giitassarena, giitassaro ca tantissarena; na ca pana {neva pana (syaa0)} te pa~ncasikha, tantissaro giitassara.m ativattati, giitassaro ca tantissara.m. kadaa sa.myuu.lhaa pana te, pa~ncasikha, imaa gaathaa buddhuupasa~nhitaa dhammuupasa~nhitaa ^a^M2.0214^ea^ sa"nghuupasa~nhitaa arahantuupasa~nhitaa kaamuupasa~nhitaa''ti? ``ekamida.m, bhante, samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho ^a^P2.0268^ea^. tena kho panaaha.m, bhante, samayena bhaddaa naama suuriyavacchasaa timbaruno gandhabbara~n~no dhiitaa, tamabhika"nkhaami. saa kho pana, bhante, bhaginii parakaaminii hoti; sikha.n.dii naama maatalissa sa"ngaahakassa putto, tamabhika"nkhati. yato kho aha.m, bhante, ta.m bhagini.m naalattha.m kenaci pariyaayena. athaaha.m beluvapa.n.duvii.na.m aadaaya yena timbaruno gandhabbara~n~no nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa beluvapa.n.duvii.na.m assaavesi.m, imaa ca gaathaa abhaasi.m buddhuupasa~nhitaa dhammuupasa~nhitaa sa"nghuupasa~nhitaa arahantuupasa~nhitaa kaamuupasa~nhitaa --
[21] ``vande te pitara.m bhadde, timbaru.m suuriyavacchase.
[22] yena jaataasi kalyaa.nii, aanandajananii mama.. ...pe0...
[21] saala.mva na cira.m phulla.m, pitara.m te sumedhase.
[22] vandamaano namassaami, yassaa setaadisii pajaa''ti..

[03] ``eva.m vutte, bhante, bhaddaa suuriyavacchasaa ma.m etadavoca -- `na kho me, maarisa, so bhagavaa sammukhaa di.t.tho api ca sutoyeva me so bhagavaa ^a^T2.0303^ea^ devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m upanaccantiyaa. yato kho tva.m, maarisa, ta.m bhagavanta.m kittesi, hotu no ajja samaagamo'ti. soyeva ^a^P2.0269^ea^ no, bhante, tassaa bhaginiyaa saddhi.m samaagamo ahosi. na ca daani tato pacchaa''ti.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0198^ea^ kho sakkassa devaanamindassa etadahosi -- ``pa.tisammodati pa~ncasikho gandhabbadevaputto bhagavataa, bhagavaa ca pa~ncasikhenaa''ti. atha kho sakko devaanamindo pa~ncasikha.m gandhabbadevaputta.m aamantesi -- ``abhivaadehi me tva.m, taata pa~ncasikha, bhagavanta.m -- `sakko, bhante, devaanamindo saamacco saparijano bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti''. ``eva.m bhaddantavaa''ti kho pa~ncasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadeti -- ``sakko, bhante, devaanamindo saamacco saparijano bhagavato ^a^M2.0215^ea^ paade sirasaa vandatii''ti. ``eva.m sukhii hotu, pa~ncasikha, sakko devaanamindo saamacco saparijano; sukhakaamaa hi devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa ye ca~n~ne santi puthukaayaa''ti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ eva~nca pana tathaagataa evaruupe mahesakkhe yakkhe abhivadanti. abhivadito sakko devaanamindo bhagavato indasaalaguha.m pavisitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. devaapi taavati.msaa indasaalaguha.m pavisitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. pa~ncasikhopi gandhabbadevaputto indasaalaguha.m pavisitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena indasaalaguhaa ^a^T2.0304^ea^ visamaa santii samaa samapaadi, sambaadhaa santii urundaa {uruddaa (ka0)} samapaadi, andhakaaro guhaaya.m antaradhaayi, aaloko udapaadi yathaa ta.m devaana.m ^a^P2.0270^ea^ devaanubhaavena.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- ``acchariyamida.m aayasmato kosiyassa, abbhutamida.m aayasmato kosiyassa taava bahukiccassa bahukara.niiyassa yadida.m idhaagamana''nti. ``cirapa.tikaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitukaamo; api ca devaana.m taavati.msaana.m kehici kehici {kehici (syaa0)} kiccakara.niiyehi byaava.to; evaaha.m naasakkhi.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. ekamida.m, bhante, samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati sala.laagaarake. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, saavatthi.m agamaasi.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. tena kho pana, bhante, samayena bhagavaa a~n~natarena samaadhinaa nisinno hoti, bhuujati {bhu~njatii ca (sii0 pii0), bhujagii (syaa0)} ca naama vessava.nassa mahaaraajassa paricaarikaa bhagavanta.m paccupa.t.thitaa hoti, pa~njalikaa namassamaanaa ti.t.thati. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, bhuujati.m etadavoca.m ^a^V2.0199^ea^ -- `abhivaadehi me tva.m, bhagini, bhagavanta.m -- ``sakko, bhante, devaanamindo ^a^T2.0305^ea^ saamacco saparijano bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii''ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, saa bhuujati ma.m etadavoca -- `akaalo kho, maarisa, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya; pa.tisalliino bhagavaa'ti. `tena ^a^P2.0271^ea^ hii, bhagini, yadaa bhagavaa tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thito hoti, atha mama vacanena bhagavanta.m abhivaadehi -- ``sakko, bhante, devaanamindo ^a^M2.0216^ea^ saamacco saparijano bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii''ti. kacci me saa, bhante, bhaginii bhagavanta.m abhivaadesi? sarati bhagavaa tassaa bhaginiyaa vacana''nti? ``abhivaadesi ma.m saa, devaanaminda, bhaginii, saraamaha.m tassaa bhaginiyaa vacana.m. api caaha.m aayasmato nemisaddena {cakkanemisaddena (syaa0)} tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thito''ti. ``ye te, bhante, devaa amhehi pa.thamatara.m taavati.msakaaya.m upapannaa, tesa.m me sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `yadaa tathaagataa loke uppajjanti arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, dibbaa kaayaa paripuurenti, haayanti asurakaayaa'ti. ta.m me ida.m, bhante, sakkhidi.t.tha.m yato tathaagato loke uppanno araha.m sammaasambuddho, dibbaa kaayaa paripuurenti, haayanti asurakaayaati.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ ``idheva, bhante, kapilavatthusmi.m gopikaa naama sakyadhiitaa ahosi buddhe pasannaa dhamme pasannaa sa"nghe pasannaa siilesu paripuurakaarinii. saa itthitta.m {itthicitta.m (syaa0)} viraajetvaa purisatta.m {purisacitta.m (syaa0)} bhaavetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa. devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m amhaaka.m puttatta.m ajjhupagataa. tatrapi na.m eva.m jaananti -- `gopako devaputto, gopako devaputto'ti. a~n~nepi, bhante, tayo bhikkhuu bhagavati brahmacariya.m caritvaa hiina.m gandhabbakaaya.m upapannaa. te pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarayamaanaa amhaaka.m upa.t.thaana.m aagacchanti amhaaka.m paaricariya.m. te amhaaka.m upa.t.thaana.m aagate amhaaka.m paaricariya.m gopako devaputto pa.ticodesi ^a^P2.0272^ea^ -- `kutomukhaa naama tumhe ^a^T2.0306^ea^, maarisaa, tassa bhagavato dhamma.m assuttha {aayuhittha (syaa0)} -- aha~nhi naama itthikaa samaanaa buddhe pasannaa dhamme pasannaa sa"nghe pasannaa siilesu paripuurakaarinii itthitta.m viraajetvaa purisatta.m bhaavetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa, devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m sakkassa devaanamindassa puttatta.m ajjhupagataa. idhaapi ma.m eva.m jaananti ``gopako devaputto gopako devaputto'ti. tumhe pana, maarisaa, bhagavati brahmacariya.m caritvaa hiina.m gandhabbakaaya.m upapannaa. duddi.t.tharuupa.m vata, bho, addasaama, ye maya.m addasaama ^a^M2.0217^ea^ sahadhammike hiina.m gandhabbakaaya.m upapanne'ti. tesa.m, bhante, gopakena devaputtena pa.ticoditaana.m dve ^a^V2.0200^ea^ devaa di.t.theva dhamme sati.m pa.tilabhi.msu kaaya.m brahmapurohita.m, eko pana devo kaame ajjhaavasi.
[03] 354^b^.^eb^```upaasikaa cakkhumato ahosi.m,
[27] naamampi mayha.m ahu `gopikaa'ti.
[26] buddhe ca dhamme ca abhippasannaa,
[22] sa"ngha~ncupa.t.thaasi.m pasannacittaa..
[21] ```tasseva buddhassa sudhammataaya,
[27] sakkassa puttomhi mahaanubhaavo.
[26] mahaajutiiko tidivuupapanno,
[22] jaananti ma.m idhaapi `gopako'ti..
[21] ```athaddasa.m ^a^T2.0307^ea^ bhikkhavo di.t.thapubbe,
[27] gandhabbakaayuupagate vasiine.
[26] imehi te gotamasaavakaase,
[22] ye ca maya.m pubbe manussabhuutaa..
[21] ```annena paanena upa.t.thahimhaa,
[27] paaduupasa"ngayha sake nivesane.
[26] kutomukhaa ^a^P2.0273^ea^ naama ime bhavanto,
[22] buddhassa dhammaani pa.tiggahesu.m {buddhassa dhamma.m na pa.tiggahesu.m (syaa0)}..
[21] ```paccatta.m veditabbo hi dhammo,
[27] sudesito cakkhumataanubuddho.
[26] aha~nhi tumheva upaasamaano,
[22] sutvaana ariyaana subhaasitaani..
[21] ```sakkassa ^a^V2.0201^ea^ puttomhi mahaanubhaavo,
[27] mahaajutiiko tidivuupapanno.
[26] tumhe pana se.t.thamupaasamaanaa,
[22] anuttara.m brahmacariya.m caritvaa..
[21] ```hiina.m ^a^M2.0218^ea^ kaaya.m upapannaa bhavanto,
[27] anaanulomaa bhavatuupapatti.
[26] duddi.t.tharuupa.m vata addasaama,
[22] sahadhammike hiinakaayuupapanne..
[21] ```gandhabbakaayuupagataa ^a^T2.0308^ea^ bhavanto,
[27] devaanamaagacchatha paaricariya.m.
[26] agaare vasato mayha.m,
[22] ima.m passa visesata.m..
[21] ```itthii hutvaa svajja pumomhi devo,
[27] dibbehi kaamehi sama"ngibhuuto'.
[26] te coditaa gotamasaavakena,
[22] sa.mvegamaapaadu samecca gopaka.m..
[21] ```handa viyaayaama {vigaayaama (syaa0), vitaayaama (pii0)} byaayaama {viyaayamaama (sii0 pii0)},
[27] maa no maya.m parapessaa ahumhaa'.
[26] tesa.m ^a^P2.0274^ea^ duve viiriyamaarabhi.msu,
[22] anussara.m gotamasaasanaani..
[21] ``idheva cittaani viraajayitvaa,
[27] kaamesu aadiinavamaddasa.msu.
[26] te kaamasa.myojanabandhanaani,
[22] paapimayogaani duraccayaani..
[21] ``naagova ^a^V2.0202^ea^ sannaani gu.naani {sandaanagu.naani (sii0 pii0), santaani gu.naani (syaa0)} chetvaa,
[27] deve taavati.mse atikkami.msu.
[26] saindaa devaa sapajaapatikaa,
[22] sabbe sudhammaaya sabhaayupavi.t.thaa..
[21] ``tesa.m ^a^T2.0309^ea^ nisinnaana.m abhikkami.msu,
[27] viiraa viraagaa viraja.m karontaa.
[26] te disvaa sa.mvegamakaasi vaasavo,
[22] devaabhibhuu devaga.nassa majjhe..
[21] ```imehi ^a^M2.0219^ea^ te hiinakaayuupapannaa,
[27] deve taavati.mse abhikkamanti'.
[26] sa.mvegajaatassa vaco nisamma,
[22] so gopako vaasavamajjhabhaasi..
[21] ```buddho janindatthi manussaloke,
[27] kaamaabhibhuu sakyamuniiti ~naayati.
[26] tasseva te puttaa satiyaa vihiinaa,
[22] coditaa mayaa te satimajjhalatthu.m..
[21] ```ti.n.na.m ^a^P2.0275^ea^ tesa.m aavasinettha {avasiinettha (pii0)} eko,
[27] gandhabbakaayuupagato vasiino.
[26] dve ca sambodhipathaanusaarino,
[22] devepi hii.lenti samaahitattaa..
[21] ```etaadisii dhammappakaasanettha,
[27] na tattha ki.mka"nkhati koci saavako.
[26] niti.n.naogha.m vicikicchachinna.m,
[22] buddha.m namassaama jina.m janinda.m'..
[21] ``ya.m ^a^T2.0310^ea^ ^a^V2.0203^ea^ te dhamma.m idha~n~naaya,
[27] visesa.m ajjhaga.msu {ajjhagama.msu (syaa0)} te.
[26] kaaya.m brahmapurohita.m,
[22] duve tesa.m visesaguu..
[21] ``tassa dhammassa pattiyaa,
[27] aagatamhaasi maarisa.
[26] kataavakaasaa bhagavataa,
[22] pa~nha.m pucchemu maarisaa''ti..

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``diigharatta.m visuddho kho aya.m yakkho {sakko (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, ya.m ki~nci ma.m pa~nha.m pucchissati, sabba.m ta.m atthasa~nhita.myeva pucchissati, no anatthasa~nhita.m. ya~ncassaaha.m pu.t.tho byaakarissaami, ta.m khippameva aajaanissatii''ti.
[03] 356^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0220^ea^ kho bhagavaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``puccha vaasava ma.m pa~nha.m, ya.m ki~nci manasicchasi.
[22] tassa tasseva pa~nhassa, aha.m anta.m karomi te''ti..
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.
[03] 357^b^.^eb^ kataavakaaso ^a^P2.0276^ea^ sakko devaanamindo bhagavataa ima.m bhagavanta.m {devaanamindo bhagavanta.m ima.m (sii0 pii0)} pa.thama.m pa~nha.m apucchi --

[03] ``ki.m sa.myojanaa nu kho, maarisa, devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa ye ^a^T2.0311^ea^ ca~n~ne santi puthukaayaa, te -- `averaa ada.n.daa asapattaa abyaapajjaa viharemu averino'ti iti ca nesa.m hoti, atha ca pana saveraa sada.n.daa sasapattaa sabyaapajjaa viharanti saverino''ti? ittha.m sakko devaanamindo bhagavanta.m pa~nha.m {ima.m pa.thama.m pa~nha.m (sii0 pii0)} apucchi. tassa bhagavaa pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaasi --

[03] ``issaamacchariyasa.myojanaa kho, devaanaminda, devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa ye ca~n~ne ^a^V2.0204^ea^ santi puthukaayaa, te -- `averaa ada.n.daa asapattaa abyaapajjaa viharemu averino'ti iti ca nesa.m hoti, atha ca pana saveraa sada.n.daa sasapattaa sabyaapajjaa viharanti saverino''ti. ittha.m bhagavaa sakkassa devaanamindassa pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaasi. attamano sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandi anumodi -- ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata. ti.n.naa mettha ka"nkhaa vigataa katha.mkathaa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m sutvaa''ti.
[03] 358^b^.^eb^ itiha sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa ^a^P2.0277^ea^ anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari.m {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pa~nha.m apucchi --

[03] ``issaamacchariya.m pana, maarisa, ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava.m; kismi.m sati issaamacchariya.m hoti; kismi.m asati issaamacchariya.m na hotii''ti? ``issaamacchariya.m kho, devaanaminda, piyaappiyanidaana.m piyaappiyasamudaya.m piyaappiyajaatika.m piyaappiyapabhava.m; piyaappiye sati issaamacchariya.m hoti, piyaappiye asati issaamacchariya.m na hotii''ti.

[03] ``piyaappiya.m ^a^M2.0221^ea^ kho pana, maarisa, ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava.m; kismi.m sati piyaappiya.m hoti; kismi.m asati piyaappiya.m na hotii''ti? ``piyaappiya.m kho, devaanaminda, chandanidaana.m chandasamudaya.m chandajaatika.m chandapabhava.m; chande sati piyaappiya.m hoti; chande asati piyaappiya.m na hotii''ti.

[03] ``chando kho pana, maarisa, ki.mnidaano ki.msamudayo ki.mjaatiko ki.mpabhavo; kismi.m sati chando ^a^T2.0312^ea^ hoti; kismi.m asati chando na hotii''ti? ``chando kho, devaanaminda, vitakkanidaano vitakkasamudayo vitakkajaatiko vitakkapabhavo; vitakke sati chando hoti; vitakke asati chando na hotii''ti.

[03] ``vitakko kho pana, maarisa, ki.mnidaano ki.msamudayo ki.mjaatiko ki.mpabhavo; kismi.m sati vitakko hoti; kismi.m asati vitakko na hotii''ti? ``vitakko kho, devaanaminda, papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaanidaano papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudayo papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaajaatiko papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaapabhavo; papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaaya sati vitakko hoti; papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaaya asati vitakko na hotii''ti.
[03] ``katha.m ^a^V2.0205^ea^ pa.tipanno pana, maarisa, bhikkhu papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaanirodhasaaruppagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pa.tipanno hotii''ti?

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ ``somanassa.mpaaha.m ^a^P2.0278^ea^ {paha.m (sii0 pii0), caaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. domanassa.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. upekkha.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ ``somanassa.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa somanassa.m `ima.m kho me somanassa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupa.m somanassa.m na sevitabba.m. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa somanassa.m `ima.m kho ^a^T2.0313^ea^ me somanassa.m sevato ^a^M2.0222^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupa.m somanassa.m sevitabba.m. tattha ya.m ce savitakka.m savicaara.m, ya.m ce avitakka.m avicaara.m, ye avitakke avicaare, te {se (sii0 pii0)} pa.niitatare. somanassa.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ ``domanassa.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami sevitabbampi ^a^P2.0279^ea^, asevitabbampiiti. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa domanassa.m `ima.m kho me domanassa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupa.m domanassa.m na sevitabba.m. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa domanassa.m `ima.m kho me domanassa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupa.m domanassa.m sevitabba.m. tattha ya.m ce savitakka.m savicaara.m, ya.m ce avitakka.m avicaara.m, ye avitakke avicaare, te pa.niitatare. domanassa.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampii'ti iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ ``upekkha.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa upekkha.m `ima.m kho me upekkha.m sevato ^a^T2.0314^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupaa upekkhaa ^a^V2.0206^ea^ na sevitabbaa. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa upekkha.m `ima.m kho me upekkha.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupaa upekkhaa sevitabbaa. tattha ya.m ce savitakka.m savicaara.m, ya.m ce avitakka.m avicaara.m, ye avitakke avicaare, te pa.niitatare. upekkha.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m pa.tipanno kho, devaanaminda, bhikkhu papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaanirodhasaaruppagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pa.tipanno hotii''ti. ittha.m bhagavaa sakkassa devaanamindassa pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaasi. attamano sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m ^a^M2.0223^ea^ abhinandi anumodi -- ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata, ti.n.naa mettha ka"nkhaa vigataa katha.mkathaa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m sutvaa''ti.
[03] 364^b^.^eb^ itiha sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi --

[03] ``katha.m pa.tipanno pana, maarisa, bhikkhu paatimokkhasa.mvaraaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti? ``kaayasamaacaara.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. vaciisamaacaara.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. pariyesana.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabba''mpi.

[03] ``kaayasamaacaara.mpaaha.m ^a^P2.0280^ea^, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami sevitabbampi asevitabbampiiti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa kaayasamaacaara.m `ima.m kho me kaayasamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo kaayasamaacaaro na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa kaayasamaacaara.m `ima.m kho me kaayasamaacaara.m ^a^T2.0315^ea^ sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo kaayasamaacaaro sevitabbo. kaayasamaacaara.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``vaciisamaacaara.mpaaha.m ^a^V2.0207^ea^, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampii'ti. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa vaciisamaacaara.m `ima.m kho me vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo vaciisamaacaaro na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa vaciisamaacaara.m `ima.m kho me vaciisamaacaara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo vaciisamaacaaro sevitabbo. vaciisamaacaara.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``pariyesana.mpaaha.m ^a^M2.0224^ea^, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa pariyesana.m `ima.m kho me pariyesana.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupaa pariyesanaa na sevitabbaa. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa pariyesana.m `ima.m ^a^T2.0316^ea^ kho me pariyesana.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupaa pariyesanaa sevitabbaa. pariyesana.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiiti iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^P2.0281^ea^ pa.tipanno kho, devaanaminda, bhikkhu paatimokkhasa.mvaraaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. ittha.m bhagavaa sakkassa devaanamindassa pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaasi. attamano sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandi anumodi -- ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata. ti.n.naa mettha ka"nkhaa vigataa katha.mkathaa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m sutvaa''ti.
[03] 365^b^.^eb^ itiha sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi --

[03] ``katha.m pa.tipanno pana, maarisa, bhikkhu indriyasa.mvaraaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti? ``cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. sotavi~n~neyya.m sadda.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. ghaanavi~n~neyya.m gandha.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. jivhaavi~n~neyya.m ^a^V2.0208^ea^ rasa.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. kaayavi~n~neyya.m pho.t.thabba.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampi. manovi~n~neyya.m dhamma.mpaaha.m, devaanaminda, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi, asevitabbampii''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, sakko devaanamindo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa"nkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. yathaaruupa.m, bhante, cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupa.m cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m ^a^M2.0225^ea^ na sevitabba.m ^a^P2.0282^ea^. yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupa.m cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m sevitabba.m. yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, sotavi~n~neyya.m ^a^T2.0317^ea^ sadda.m sevato...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyya.m gandha.m sevato... jivhaavi~n~neyya.m rasa.m sevato... kaayavi~n~neyya.m pho.t.thabba.m sevato... manovi~n~neyya.m dhamma.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupo manovi~n~neyyo dhammo na sevitabbo. yathaaruupa~nca kho, bhante, manovi~n~neyya.m dhamma.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupo manovi~n~neyyo dhammo sevitabbo.
[03] ``imassa kho me, bhante, bhagavataa sa"nkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanato ti.n.naa mettha ka"nkhaa vigataa katha.mkathaa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m sutvaa''ti.
[03] 366^b^.^eb^ itiha sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi --

[03] ``sabbeva nu kho, maarisa, sama.nabraahma.naa ekantavaadaa ekantasiilaa ekantachandaa ekantaajjhosaanaa''ti? ``na kho, devaanaminda, sabbe sama.nabraahma.naa ekantavaadaa ekantasiilaa ekantachandaa ekantaajjhosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``kasmaa pana, maarisa, na sabbe sama.nabraahma.naa ekantavaadaa ekantasiilaa ekantachandaa ekantaajjhosaanaa''ti? ``anekadhaatu naanaadhaatu kho, devaanaminda, loko. tasmi.m anekadhaatunaanaadhaatusmi.m loke ya.m yadeva sattaa dhaatu.m abhinivisanti, ta.m tadeva thaamasaa paraamaasaa ^a^V2.0209^ea^ abhinivissa voharanti -- `idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. tasmaa ^a^T2.0318^ea^ na sabbe sama.nabraahma.naa ekantavaadaa ekantasiilaa ekantachandaa ekantaajjhosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``sabbeva nu kho, maarisa, sama.nabraahma.naa accantani.t.thaa ^a^P2.0283^ea^ accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaanaa''ti? ``na kho, devaanaminda, sabbe sama.nabraahma.naa accantani.t.thaa accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``kasmaa ^a^M2.0226^ea^ pana, maarisa, na sabbe sama.nabraahma.naa accantani.t.thaa accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaanaa''ti? ``ye kho, devaanaminda, bhikkhuu ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttaa te accantani.t.thaa accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaanaa. tasmaa na sabbe sama.nabraahma.naa accantani.t.thaa accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaanaa''ti.

[03] ittha.m bhagavaa sakkassa devaanamindassa pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaasi. attamano sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandi anumodi -- ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata. ti.n.naa mettha ka"nkhaa vigataa katha.mkathaa bhagavato pa~nhaveyyaakara.na.m sutvaa''ti.
[03] 367^b^.^eb^ itiha sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ejaa, bhante, rogo, ejaa ga.n.do, ejaa salla.m, ejaa ima.m purisa.m parika.d.dhati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyaa. tasmaa aya.m puriso uccaavacamaapajjati ^a^T2.0319^ea^. yesaaha.m, bhante, pa~nhaana.m ito bahiddhaa a~n~nesu sama.nabraahma.nesu okaasakammampi naalattha.m, te me bhagavataa byaakataa. diigharattaanusayita~nca pana {diigharattaanupassataa, ya~nca pana (syaa0), diigharattaanusayino, ya~nca pana (sii0 pii0)} me vicikicchaakatha.mkathaasalla.m, ta~nca bhagavataa abbu.lha''nti.

[03] ``abhijaanaasi ^a^P2.0284^ea^ no tva.m, devaanaminda, ime pa~nhe a~n~ne sama.nabraahma.ne pucchitaa''ti? ``abhijaanaamaha.m, bhante, ime pa~nhe a~n~ne sama.nabraahma.ne pucchitaa''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana te, devaanaminda, byaaka.msu? sace te agaru bhaasassuu''ti. ``na kho me, bhante, garu yatthassa bhagavaa nisinno bhagavantaruupo vaa''ti. ``tena hi, devaanaminda, bhaasassuu''ti. ``yesvaaha.m {yesaaha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, bhante ^a^V2.0210^ea^, ma~n~naami sama.nabraahma.naa aara~n~nikaa pantasenaasanaati, tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa ime pa~nhe pucchaami, te mayaa pu.t.thaa na sampaayanti, asampaayantaa mama.myeva pa.tipucchanti -- `ko naamo aayasmaa'ti? tesaaha.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi -- `aha.m kho, maarisa, sakko devaanamindo'ti. te mama.myeva uttari pa.tipucchanti -- `ki.m panaayasmaa, devaanaminda {devaanamindo (sii0 pii0)}, kamma.m katvaa ima.m .thaana.m patto'ti? tesaaha.m yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m desemi. te taavatakeneva attamanaa ^a^M2.0227^ea^ honti -- `sakko ca no devaanamindo di.t.tho, ya~nca no apucchimhaa, ta~nca no byaakaasii'ti. te a~n~nadatthu mama.myeva saavakaa sampajjanti, na caaha.m tesa.m. aha.m kho pana, bhante, bhagavato saavako sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti ^a^T2.0320^ea^.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ ``abhijaanaasi no tva.m, devaanaminda, ito pubbe evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha''nti? ``abhijaanaamaha.m ^a^P2.0285^ea^, bhante, ito pubbe evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha''nti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, devaanaminda, abhijaanaasi ito pubbe evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha''nti?

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhante, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho {samuupabbu.lho (sii0 pii0)} ahosi. tasmi.m kho pana, bhante, sa"ngaame devaa jini.msu, asuraa paraajayi.msu {paraaji.msu (sii0 pii0)}. tassa mayha.m, bhante, ta.m sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamassa etadahosi -- `yaa ceva daani dibbaa ojaa yaa ca asuraa ojaa, ubhayameta.m {ubhayamettha (syaa0)} devaa paribhu~njissantii'ti. so kho pana me, bhante, vedapa.tilaabho somanassapa.tilaabho sada.n.daavacaro sasatthaavacaro na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yo kho pana me aya.m, bhante, bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa vedapa.tilaabho somanassapa.tilaabho, so ada.n.daavacaro asatthaavacaro ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattatii''ti.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana tva.m, devaanaminda, atthavasa.m sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedesii''ti? ``cha kho aha.m, bhante, atthavase sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[21] ``idheva ^a^T2.0321^ea^ ^a^V2.0211^ea^ ti.t.thamaanassa, devabhuutassa me sato.
[22] punaraayu ca me laddho, eva.m jaanaahi maarisa..
[03] ``ima.m ^a^M2.0228^ea^ kho aha.m, bhante, pa.thama.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano ^a^P2.0286^ea^ evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[21] ``cutaaha.m diviyaa kaayaa, aayu.m hitvaa amaanusa.m.
[22] amuu.lho gabbhamessaami, yattha me ramatii mano..
[03] ``ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, dutiya.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[21] ``svaaha.m amuu.lhapa~n~nassa {amuu.lhapa~nhassa (?)}, vihara.m saasane rato.
[22] ~naayena viharissaami, sampajaano pa.tissato..
[03] ``ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, tatiya.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[21] ``~naayena me carato ca, sambodhi ce bhavissati.
[22] a~n~naataa viharissaami, sveva anto bhavissati..
[03] ``ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, catuttha.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[21] ``cutaaha.m maanusaa kaayaa, aayu.m hitvaana maanusa.m.
[22] puna devo bhavissaami, devalokamhi uttamo..
[03] ``ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, pa~ncama.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[21] ``te ^a^T2.0322^ea^ ^a^V2.0212^ea^ {ye (?)} pa.niitataraa devaa, akani.t.thaa yasassino.
[22] antime vattamaanamhi, so nivaaso bhavissati..
[03] ``ima.m ^a^P2.0287^ea^ kho aha.m, bhante, cha.t.tha.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[03] ``ime kho aha.m, bhante, cha atthavase sampassamaano evaruupa.m vedapa.tilaabha.m somanassapa.tilaabha.m pavedemi.
[03] 370^b^.^eb^``apariyositasa"nkappo ^a^M2.0229^ea^, vicikiccho katha.mkathii.
[22] vicari.m diighamaddhaana.m, anvesanto tathaagata.m..
[21] ``yassu ma~n~naami sama.ne, pavivittavihaarino.
[22] sambuddhaa iti ma~n~naano, gacchaami te upaasitu.m..
[21] ```katha.m aaraadhanaa hoti, katha.m hoti viraadhanaa'.
[22] iti pu.t.thaa na sampaayanti {sambhonti (syaa0)}, magge pa.tipadaasu ca..
[21] ``tyassu yadaa ma.m jaananti, sakko devaanamaagato.
[22] tyassu mameva pucchanti, `ki.m katvaa paapu.nii ida.m'..
[21] ``tesa.m yathaasuta.m dhamma.m, desayaami jane suta.m {janesuta (ka0 sii0)}.
[22] tena attamanaa honti, `di.t.tho no vaasavoti ca'..
[21] ``yadaa ca buddhamaddakkhi.m, vicikicchaavitaara.na.m.
[22] somhi viitabhayo ajja, sambuddha.m payirupaasiya {payirupaasayi.m (syaa0 ka0)}..
[21] ``ta.nhaasallassa hantaara.m, buddha.m appa.tipuggala.m.
[22] aha.m ^a^T2.0323^ea^ vande mahaaviira.m, buddhamaadiccabandhuna.m..
[21] ``ya.m ^a^P2.0288^ea^ ^a^V2.0213^ea^ karomasi brahmuno, sama.m devehi maarisa.
[22] tadajja tuyha.m kassaama {dassaama (syaa0 ka0)}, handa saama.m karoma te..
[21] ``tvameva asi {tuvamevasi (pii0)} sambuddho, tuva.m satthaa anuttaro.
[22] sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi te pa.tipuggalo''ti..

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ atha kho sakko devaanamindo pa~ncasikha.m gandhabbaputta.m aamantesi -- ``bahuupakaaro kho mesi tva.m, taata pa~ncasikha, ya.m tva.m bhagavanta.m pa.thama.m pasaadesi. tayaa, taata, pa.thama.m pasaadita.m pacchaa maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamimhaa arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m. pettike vaa .thaane .thapayissaami ^a^M2.0230^ea^, gandhabbaraajaa bhavissasi, bhadda~nca te suuriyavacchasa.m dammi, saa hi te abhipatthitaa''ti.
[03] atha kho sakko devaanamindo paa.ninaa pathavi.m paraamasitvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti.

[03] imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane sakkassa devaanamindassa viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti. a~n~nesa~nca asiitiyaa devataasahassaana.m ^a^P2.0289^ea^, iti ye sakkena devaanamindena ajjhi.t.thapa~nhaa pu.t.thaa ^a^T2.0324^ea^, te bhagavataa byaakataa. tasmaa imassa veyyaakara.nassa sakkapa~nhaatveva adhivacananti.
[06] sakkapa~nhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0325^ea^ ^a^M2.0231^ea^ ^a^V2.0214^ea^ me ^a^P2.0290^ea^ suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kuruusu viharati kammaasadhamma.m naama kuruuna.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhaddante''ti {bhadanteti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ``ekaayano aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa, sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa.

[03] ``katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m, vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m, citte cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m, dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.
[06] uddeso ni.t.thito.

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^V2.0215^ea^ ^a^P2.0291^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati, satova passasati. diigha.m ^a^T2.0326^ea^ vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati. rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati. `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati ^a^M2.0232^ea^, `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho bhamakaaro vaa bhamakaarantevaasii vaa diigha.m vaa a~nchanto `diigha.m a~nchaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa a~nchanto `rassa.m a~nchaamii'ti pajaanaati evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati. `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. iti ^a^P2.0292^ea^ ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati. samudayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati. `atthi kaayo'ti vaa ^a^T2.0327^ea^ panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci loke upaadiyati. evampi kho {evampi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.
[06] aanaapaanapabba.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V2.0216^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto vaa `gacchaamii'ti pajaanaati, .thito vaa `.thitomhii'ti pajaanaati, nisinno vaa `nisinnomhii'ti pajaanaati, sayaano vaa `sayaanomhii'ti pajaanaati, yathaa yathaa vaa panassa kaayo pa.nihito hoti, tathaa tathaa na.m pajaanaati. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii ^a^M2.0233^ea^ viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati. samudayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati. `atthi kaayo'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.
[06] iriyaapathapabba.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii ^a^T2.0328^ea^ hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti. iti ^a^P2.0293^ea^ ajjhatta.m vaa...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V2.0217^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco, ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m, hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m, anta.m antagu.na.m ^a^M2.0234^ea^ udariya.m kariisa.m {kariisa.m matthalu"nga.m (ka0)}, pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo, assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta'nti.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati sattasu bojjha"ngesu. katha~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati sattasu bojjha"ngesu? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m satisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m satisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m satisambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m satisambojjha"ngo'ti ^a^V2.0226^ea^ pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa satisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.

[03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa ^a^M2.0242^ea^ dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.

[03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m viiriyasambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m viiriyasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m viiriyasambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m viiriyasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.

[03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m piitisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m piitisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m piitisambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m piitisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.

[03] ``santa.m ^a^P2.0304^ea^ vaa ajjhatta.m passaddhisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m passaddhisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m passaddhisambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m passaddhisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.

[03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m samaadhisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m samaadhisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m samaadhisambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m samaadhisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.

[03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m upekkhaasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati ^a^V2.0227^ea^, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m upekkhaasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa ^a^T2.0340^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.

[03] ``iti ajjhatta.m vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati. samudayadhammaanupassii ^a^M2.0243^ea^ vaa dhammesu viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati `atthi dhammaa'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati sattasu bojjha"ngesu.
[06] bojjha"ngapabba.m ni.t.thita.m. {bojjha"ngapabba.m ni.t.thita.m, pa.thamabhaa.navaara.m (syaa0)}

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati catuusu ariyasaccesu. katha~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati catuusu ariyasaccesu? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^T2.0341^ea^ ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ^a^P2.0305^ea^, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m? jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, mara.nampi dukkha.m, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, appiyehi sampayogopi dukkho, piyehi vippayogopi dukkho {appiyehi...pe0... vippayogo dukkhotipaa.tho ceva ta.mniddeso ca katthaci na dissati, a.t.thakathaaya.mpi ta.msa.mva.n.nanaa natthi}, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m, ^b^sa"nkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa^eb^ {pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaapi (ka0)} ^b^dukkhaa.^eb^

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, jaati? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaati sa~njaati okkanti abhinibbatti khandhaana.m paatubhaavo aayatanaana.m pa.tilaabho, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, jaati.

[03] 389. ``katamaa ^a^M2.0244^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, jaraa? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, jaraa.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, mara.na.m? ya.m {a.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa} tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhaa tamhaa sattanikaayaa cuti cavanataa bhedo antaradhaana.m maccu mara.na.m kaalakiriyaa khandhaana.m bhedo ka.levarassa nikkhepo jiivitindriyassupacchedo, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, mara.na.m.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, soko? yo kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena ^a^P2.0306^ea^ dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa soko socanaa socitatta.m antosoko antoparisoko, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, soko.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, paridevo? yo kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aadevo paridevo aadevanaa paridevanaa aadevitatta.m paridevitatta.m, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave paridevo.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^T2.0342^ea^, bhikkhave, dukkha.m? ya.m kho, bhikkhave, kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayika.m asaata.m kaayasamphassaja.m dukkha.m asaata.m vedayita.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha.m.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^V2.0229^ea^, bhikkhave, domanassa.m? ya.m kho, bhikkhave, cetasika.m dukkha.m cetasika.m asaata.m manosamphassaja.m dukkha.m asaata.m vedayita.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, domanassa.m.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, upaayaaso? yo kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aayaaso upaayaaso aayaasitatta.m upaayaasitatta.m, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, upaayaaso.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^M2.0245^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho? idha yassa te honti ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa ruupaa saddaa gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa dhammaa, ye vaa panassa te honti anatthakaamaa ahitakaamaa aphaasukakaamaa ayogakkhemakaamaa, yaa tehi saddhi.m sa"ngati samaagamo samodhaana.m missiibhaavo, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, piyehi vippayogo dukkho? idha yassa te honti i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa ruupaa saddaa gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa dhammaa, ye vaa panassa te honti atthakaamaa hitakaamaa phaasukakaamaa yogakkhemakaamaa maataa vaa pitaa vaa bhaataa vaa bhaginii vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatisaalohitaa vaa, yaa tehi saddhi.m asa"ngati asamaagamo asamodhaana.m amissiibhaavo, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, piyehi vippayogo dukkho.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^T2.0343^ea^ ^a^P2.0307^ea^, bhikkhave, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m? jaatidhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- `aho vata maya.m na jaatidhammaa assaama, na ca vata no jaati aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. jaraadhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- `aho vata maya.m na jaraadhammaa assaama, na ca vata no jaraa aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. byaadhidhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati `aho vata maya.m na byaadhidhammaa assaama, na ca vata no byaadhi aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. mara.nadhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati `aho vata maya.m na mara.nadhammaa assaama, na ca vata no mara.na.m aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m ^a^V2.0230^ea^ icchaa uppajjati `aho vata maya.m na sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa assaama, na ca vata no sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa aagaccheyyu'nti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ ``katame ^a^M2.0246^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sa"nkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa"nkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^P2.0308^ea^, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo (syaa0)} ariyasacca.m? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (sii0 pii0)} nandiiraagasahagataa {nandiraagasahagataa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa bhavata.nhaa vibhavata.nhaa.

[03] ``saa kho panesaa, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa kattha uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, kattha nivisamaanaa nivisati? ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ^a^T2.0344^ea^ ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] ``ki~nca loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m? cakkhu loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. sota.m loke...pe0... ghaana.m loke... jivhaa loke... kaayo loke... mano loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
[03] ``ruupaa loke... saddaa loke... gandhaa loke... rasaa loke... pho.t.thabbaa loke... dhammaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] ``cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m loke... sotavi~n~naa.na.m loke... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m loke... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m loke... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m loke... manovi~n~naa.na.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] ``cakkhusamphasso ^a^V2.0231^ea^ loke... sotasamphasso loke... ghaanasamphasso loke... jivhaasamphasso ^a^P2.0309^ea^ loke... kaayasamphasso loke... manosamphasso loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] ``cakkhusamphassajaa ^a^M2.0247^ea^ vedanaa loke... sotasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... manosamphassajaa vedanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha ^a^T2.0345^ea^ nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] ``ruupasa~ncetanaa loke... saddasa~ncetanaa loke... gandhasa~ncetanaa loke... rasasa~ncetanaa loke... pho.t.thabbasa~ncetanaa loke... dhammasa~ncetanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] ``ruupavitakko loke... saddavitakko loke... gandhavitakko loke... rasavitakko loke... pho.t.thabbavitakko loke... dhammavitakko loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^V2.0232^ea^, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodha.m {dukkhanirodho (syaa0)} ariyasacca.m? yo tassaayeva ^a^T2.0346^ea^ ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo.

[03] ``saa ^a^M2.0248^ea^ kho panesaa, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa kattha pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, kattha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati? ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.

[03] ``ki~nca loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m? cakkhu loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati. sota.m loke...pe0... ghaana.m loke... jivhaa loke... kaayo loke... mano loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.

[03] ``cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m loke... sotavi~n~naa.na.m loke... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m loke... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m loke... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m loke... manovi~n~naa.na.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.

[03] ``cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa loke... sotasamphassajaa vedanaa loke ^a^T2.0347^ea^... ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... manosamphassajaa vedanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.

[03] ``ruupasa~ncetanaa ^a^M2.0249^ea^ loke... saddasa~ncetanaa loke... gandhasa~ncetanaa loke... rasasa~ncetanaa loke... pho.t.thabbasa~ncetanaa loke... dhammasa~ncetanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
